Item_Ocean_Harvest_023.source: Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_024.name: Ambergris
Item_Ocean_Harvest_024.description: A secretion with a special flavor, which exudes a surprisingly wonderful fragrance after dilution.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_024.source: Commonly found in the Grand Sea, where Umbra Whales are active. You can follow Umbra Whales and wait for it to be produced. Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher in Innars to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_025.name: Neon Material
Item_Ocean_Harvest_025.description: Biologically secreted fluorescent substances will even make you shine after you eat them.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_025.source: Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_026.name: Slime
Item_Ocean_Harvest_026.description: Please avoid direct contact during collection as it is difficult to clean the stain.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_026.source: Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_028.name: Tentacle
Item_Ocean_Harvest_028.description: Tentacles that are soft to the touch, which may contain small amounts of toxins.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_028.source: Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_029.name: Poison Sac
Item_Ocean_Harvest_029.description: A poison sac that stores toxins. It's fine to look at it, but do not lick.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_029.source: Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_030.name: Stingray Mouthparts
Item_Ocean_Harvest_030.description: A sharp mouthpiece that can tear the enemy apart. Not something that you want to mess with.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_030.source: Mouthparts regularly shed by stingrays. Commonly found in the Grand Sea, where stingrays are active. You can follow stingrays and wait for it to be shed. Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher in Innars to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_031.name: Turtle Horn
Item_Ocean_Harvest_031.description: If you can't eat it directly, grind it into powder and consume it with water. Merchants will always find a way to sell.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_031.source: Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_032.name: Turtle Spine
Item_Ocean_Harvest_032.description: An effective weapon that the dragon-necked turtle uses for passive defense.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_032.source: Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_033.name: Swordfish Fin
Item_Ocean_Harvest_033.description: Spikes are sharp as a sword and powerful when charging.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_033.source: Search for swordfish in the Grand Sea. Dropped upon luring swordfish into ramming a reef. Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher in Innars to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_034.name: Cuttlebone
Item_Ocean_Harvest_034.description: The inner shell of the gray cuttle, which has high medicinal value.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_034.source: Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_035.name: Skull Shark Skeleton
Item_Ocean_Harvest_035.description: It's hard to imagine how evolution could bring machinery and biology together.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_035.source: Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_036.name: Skull Shark Tooth
Item_Ocean_Harvest_036.description: On average, skull sharks replace their teeth once a week, and it sounds like they never have to go to the dentist.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_036.source: Teeth regularly shed by skull sharks. Commonly found in the Grand Sea, where skull sharks are active. You can follow skull sharks and wait for it to be shed. Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher in Innars to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_037.name: Skull Shark Egg
Item_Ocean_Harvest_037.description: With a thick egg sheath, signs of life become visible when you look at it against the light.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_037.source: Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_038.name: Conch Meat
Item_Ocean_Harvest_038.description: The fresh conch meat is rich and smooth. This delicious food is a must-have appetizer.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_038.source: Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_039.name: Small Hard Shell
Item_Ocean_Harvest_039.description: A hard shell that gets stronger when it is smaller in size.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_039.source: Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_040.name: Shoddy Single Horn
Item_Ocean_Harvest_040.description: A shoddy single horn that offers no value.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_040.source: The single horn that adult phantom dolphins will regenerate periodically.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_041.name: Shed Single Horn
Item_Ocean_Harvest_041.description: A naturally shed single horn with a flawless look.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_041.source: A horn periodically shed and replaced by adult phantom dolphins. Commonly found in the Grand Sea, where phantom dolphins are active. You can follow phantom dolphins and wait for it to be shed. Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher in Innars to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_042.name: Grayspace Wing Membrane
Item_Ocean_Harvest_042.description: The wing membrane that ripples in the sea can bring great horror.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_042.source: Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_043.name: Sea Meme
Item_Ocean_Harvest_043.description: Genetic information that organisms have evolved to adapt to the deep-sea environment.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_043.source: Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_044.name: Filth
Item_Ocean_Harvest_044.description: The filth hidden inside the swamp has no special value.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_044.source: Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_045.name: Fanged Mackerel Fangs
Item_Ocean_Harvest_045.description: Dense spiral entrenched teeth that can tear the prey apart.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_045.source: Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_046.name: Electric Storage Sac
Item_Ocean_Harvest_046.description: Contains high voltage current. Please apply some special measures before touching.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_046.source: Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_047.name: Large Hard Shell
Item_Ocean_Harvest_047.description: A large hard shell that can host marine organisms and is very strong.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_047.source: Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_048.name: Snout Snail Tusk
Item_Ocean_Harvest_048.description: The teeth of snout snails are incredibly hard.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_048.source: Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_049.name: Snout Snail Wings
Item_Ocean_Harvest_049.description: Thin wings that flow in the sea, seem to have special kinetic energy.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_049.source: Search for snout snails in the Grand Sea. Dropped upon defeating a snout snail using its weakness. Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher in Innars to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_050.name: Disintegrated Gravel
Item_Ocean_Harvest_050.description: Disintegrated debris after the volcanic eruption. They hit the prey with a strong heat flow that impacted the prey.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_050.source: Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_051.name: Disintegrated Core
Item_Ocean_Harvest_051.description: The disintegrated core that supports Haboela's actions, which offers great research value.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_051.source: Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_052.name: Haboela's Giant Horn
Item_Ocean_Harvest_052.description: Haboela's iconic horn. Acquiring it will show your strength.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_052.source: Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_054.name: Elementia
Item_Ocean_Harvest_054.description: It seems to be a special organ that reacts to various elements, and is also an unsolved mystery about deep sea Abyssants.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_054.source: Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_055.name: Cave Coral
Item_Ocean_Harvest_055.source: Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_056.name: Disc Coral
Item_Ocean_Harvest_056.description: Layers of coral. Seems to be common.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_056.source: Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_057.name: Conch
Item_Ocean_Harvest_057.source: Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_058.name: Algae
Item_Ocean_Harvest_058.description: The seaweed that drifts with the tide seems to be carefree.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_058.source: Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_059.name: Shell
Item_Ocean_Harvest_059.source: Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_060.name: Rock Conch
Item_Ocean_Harvest_060.description: Conch that is unique to submarine volcanic hot springs.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_060.source: Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_061.name: Red Shell
Item_Ocean_Harvest_061.description: Shellfish that is unique to submarine volcanic hot springs.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_061.source: Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_062.name: Filamentous Hygrobacterium
Item_Ocean_Harvest_062.description: Spectral blue fungi dropped from grove fungus.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_062.source: Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_063.name: Glandular Filaments
Item_Ocean_Harvest_063.description: Spider silk secreted by Abyssant: Nakya. Very resilient.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_063.source: Can be used in Appointed Research: Deepsea Exploration. Submit it to Matthieu the exploration researcher to obtain rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_Quest1.name: High-spec Sensor
Item_Ocean_Harvest_Quest1.description: High-specification parts with ultra-high sensitivity, essential for the production of special equipment.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_Quest1.source: Submit it to Innars Resource Dealer Ranni for rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_Quest2.name: Pressure Control Unit
Item_Ocean_Harvest_Quest2.description: Essential unit for submarine machinery, which can be automatically adjusted according to the pressure to protect the operation of the equipment.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_Quest2.source: Submit it to Innars Resource Dealer Ranni for rewards.

Item_Ocean_Harvest_Quest3.name: Resilient Film
Item_Ocean_Harvest_Quest3.description: Extremely tough membrane-like material that can withstand high-pressure environments.
Item_Ocean_Harvest_Quest3.source: Submit it to Innars Resource Dealer Ranni for rewards.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_001.name: Begonia
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_001.description: A colorful and alluring flower with petals that are often used as a seasoning.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_002.name: Sorrel
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_002.description: A common plant rich in trace elements, that's a perfect ingredient for tea or soup.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_003.name: Peach
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_003.description: A specialty peach that's nutritious, juicy, sweet, and delicious.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_004.name: Bamboo Shoots
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_004.description: A bamboo shoot that has been immediately dug out upon emerging from the ground. An earthen smell still lingers on it.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_005.name: Black Crow's Feather
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_005.description: The whistling from it cutting through the wind seems audible as you gaze upon it.
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_005.source: Item required for the upgrade of certain smart servants.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_006.name: Zhuyan Scale Mail
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_006.description: The patterns on the scale mail make it obvious that it was no ordinary civilization behind its creation.
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_006.source: Item required for the upgrade of certain smart servants.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_007.name: Graystone
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_007.description: A peculiar ore from Domain 9. An essential material used in the production of certain alloy devices.
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_007.source: Item required for the upgrade of certain smart servants.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_008.name: Red Ore
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_008.description: A peculiar ore from Domain 9. Its bright crimson hue is eerily reminiscent of blood.
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_008.source: Item required for the upgrade of certain smart servants.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_009.name: Sky Crystal
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_009.description: A peculiar ore from Domain 9. Its crystal-clear appearance sparkles brightly in the sunlight.
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_009.source: Item required for the upgrade of certain smart servants.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_010.name: Umbra Rock
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_010.description: A peculiar ore from Domain 9. Its unusual texture grants it a strange color.
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_010.source: Item required for the upgrade of certain smart servants.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_011.name: Standard Lamellar Armor
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_011.description: A small, standard-style lamellar armor that offers pretty good defensive performance.
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_011.source: Item required for the upgrade of certain smart servants.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_012.name: Green Jade
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_012.description: Unique to Ignisville, it is green on the outside and white on the inside. Smooth like jade, it has a crunchy mouthfeel and is slightly sweet, from whence it gets its name: Green Jade.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_013.name: Colorful Scale
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_013.description: A large scale that reflects various colors in light.
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_013.source: Can be traded at Tianhe Bazaar.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_014.name: Sorghum
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_014.description: A herbaceous plant, highly adaptable. It was consumed as a stable food in times of food shortage.
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_014.source: Can be traded at Tianhe Bazaar.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_015.name: Green Plum
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_015.description: Mildly sweet, it promotes the secretion of saliva and slakes thirst. Often consumed as a snack by those who like sour.
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_015.source: Can be traded at Tianhe Bazaar.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_016.name: Ginseng
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_016.description: Warm in nature and sweet with a touch of bitterness, it tonifies vital energy, restores veins, strengthens the spleen, nourishes the lungs, promotes the secretion of body fluid, and soothes the nerves.
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_016.source: Can be traded at Tianhe Bazaar.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_017.name: Lingzhi
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_017.description: A precious medicinal material that grows only in a few regions. It supports the healthy energy, and nourishes and strengthens the body.
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_017.source: Can be traded at Tianhe Bazaar.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_018.name: Jadestone
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_018.description: A piece of rough jadestone just mined from the mountains. It can be processed and made into various vessels.
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_018.source: Can be traded at Tianhe Bazaar.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_019.name: Roughstone
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_019.description: A piece of raw ore, a necessity for forging and smelting.
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_019.source: Can be traded at Tianhe Bazaar.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_020.name: Raw Crystal
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_020.description: A piece of rough crystal, it needs to be processed and polished before it can be made into various articles.
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_020.source: Can be traded at Tianhe Bazaar.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_021.name: Shellstone
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_021.description: A piece of rock that grows from the shell on a beast's back.
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_021.source: Can be traded at Tianhe Bazaar.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_022.name: Beast Bone
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_022.description: A bone of a wild beast that seems to also possess a special medicinal effect.
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_022.source: Can be traded at Tianhe Bazaar.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_023.name: Beast Hide
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_023.description: Animal hide that can be processed into various leather products.
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_023.source: Can be traded at Tianhe Bazaar.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_024.name: Silk Cocoon
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_024.description: The silkworm has long turned into a moth and took off, leaving behind an empty cocoon.
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_024.source: Can be traded at Tianhe Bazaar.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_025.name: Salt
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_025.description: The salt extracted from the brine crystallization in the mine is an important raw material used in both cooking and production.
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_025.source: Can be traded at Tianhe Bazaar.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_026.name: Brocade Rice
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_026.description: A stable food for the people of Domain 9, also used to brew alcoholic drinks.
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_026.source: Can be traded at Tianhe Bazaar.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_027.name: Medicinal Herbs
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_027.source: Can be traded at Tianhe Bazaar.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_028.name: Weapon License
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_028.description: A key system that grants permission to use weapons.
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_028.source: Item required for the upgrade of certain smart servants.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_029.name: Taotie Essence Pellet
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_029.description: The attached energy body is said to have formed from the residual energy of the eaten organism.
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_029.source: Item required for the upgrade of certain smart servants.

Item_Jiuyu_Mine_01.name: Dark Essence
Item_Jiuyu_Mine_01.description: A crystal formed on the surface from leaking leyline energy. Affected by the environment, it produces a lattice that tends to reflect more purple light, from whence it gets its name. It is a low-energy source.
Item_Jiuyu_Mine_01.source: Item required for the upgrade of certain smart servants.

Item_Jiuyu_Mine_02.name: Ginger Essence
Item_Jiuyu_Mine_02.description: A crystal formed through energy leaking to the surface from leylines. Easily affected by the environment, these produce a lattice that reflects more yellow light, from whence it gets its name. It is a high-energy source.
Item_Jiuyu_Mine_02.source: Item required for the upgrade of certain smart servants.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_001.name: Perfect Ascension Elixir
Item_Jiuyu_Market_001.description: A beverage brewed with selected grains and a small amount of scarce ingredients. Its price sure reflects its outstanding quality.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_001.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_002.name: Bamboo Leaf Brew
Item_Jiuyu_Market_002.description: The ingredients are wrapped inside bamboo leaves to ferment. The resulted drink thus has the fragrance of bamboo, mellow and good for the health.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_002.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_003.name: Maiden's Fragrance
Item_Jiuyu_Market_003.description: It has been a traditional custom for over a thousand years that when a family gives birth to a daughter, they will host a banquet where this beverage is served to neighbors and friends, hence the name.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_003.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_004.name: White Jade Dew
Item_Jiuyu_Market_004.description: A drink carefully brewed with top-quality mountain spring water, refreshing and fragrant at a very reasonable price.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_004.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_005.name: Herbal Marrow Brew
Item_Jiuyu_Market_005.description: Fifteen different herbs are prepared and processed in combination with the bones of beasts to make this drink. There's a hint of bitterness from the herbs. It is believed to be good for the body, prolong life, nourish vital energy, and preserve the health.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_005.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_006.name: Tusu Wine
Item_Jiuyu_Market_006.description: Tusu originally refers to a kind of broad-leaved grass, which is surprisingly not used in this drink but an inspiration for the trademark.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_006.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_007.name: Fruity Rice Punch
Item_Jiuyu_Market_007.description: A drink made with a variety of fruits and sweet rice, a favorite among children in Domain 9.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_007.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_008.name: Enlightenment Tablet
Item_Jiuyu_Market_008.description: It appears to be a tablet but is actually a large number of nano-droids that will automatically screen and treat lesions as soon as they get inside. However, they are unable to tackle severe diseases.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_008.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_009.name: Wang's Dragon Amrita
Item_Jiuyu_Market_009.description: One dose of this top-secret recipe of the Wang clan is said to be able to renew life for the dying for another hour.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_009.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_010.name: Herbal Longevity Tonic
Item_Jiuyu_Market_010.description: An oral solution made of all natural herbal essence extracts. Take it and start to feel energetic and strong again.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_010.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_011.name: Bone Plaster
Item_Jiuyu_Market_011.description: Cover the affected area with it and the medicine will slowly penetrate into the skin, effectively easing the pain.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_011.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_012.name: Golden Vein Ointment
Item_Jiuyu_Market_012.description: Promoting blood circulation and removing blood stasis, relaxing tendons and activating collaterals, it's effective against injuries from falls, fractures, contusions, and strains.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_012.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_013.name: Fast-Acting Heart Capsule
Item_Jiuyu_Market_013.description: It can effectively protect the blood vessels by promoting blood circulation and maintaining a healthy heart rate.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_013.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_014.name: Rejuvenation Compound
Item_Jiuyu_Market_014.description: The pill carefully made using a compound formula can restore your complexion to a certain extent.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_014.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_015.name: Moon Glow Satin
Item_Jiuyu_Market_015.description: This design colored using Brocade House's special secret dyes can reflect unique patterns under the moonlight. Each bolt of it is said to be different, extremely scarce resulting in a long wait time after ordering.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_015.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_016.name: Limpid Cicada Wings
Item_Jiuyu_Market_016.description: This fabric made of silk soaked in Brocade House's secret formula is light and cool, perfect for hot summer days.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_016.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_017.name: Minghai Linen
Item_Jiuyu_Market_017.description: The silk material with an exquisite pattern is personally designed and produced by Master Minghai, suitable for all kinds of clothing.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_017.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_018.name: Spirit Beast Fleece
Item_Jiuyu_Market_018.description: The flannelette woven with animal fleece provides excellent thermal protection.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_018.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_019.name: Summer Floral Brocade
Item_Jiuyu_Market_019.description: Elaborately dyed brocade with a complex pattern specially for summer wear, silky and refreshing, comfortable and highly durable.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_019.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_020.name: Jade Yarn
Item_Jiuyu_Market_020.description: This plain yarn is commonly used by ordinary people to make curtains or other clothing.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_020.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_021.name: Mercerized Cotton
Item_Jiuyu_Market_021.description: This fabric is commonly used by ordinary people in Domain 9, warm and comfortable, easy to dye and very cost-effective.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_021.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_022.name: Titabalt Longsword
Item_Jiuyu_Market_022.description: A standard long sword made of a recently developed rare alloy. Light, sharp, practical, and beautiful, often carried by a guard of honor.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_022.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_023.name: Blackflame Censer
Item_Jiuyu_Market_023.description: An average looking incense burner, but it can actually control the shape of the smoke thanks to its extremely complicated internal structure. It can enhance one's quality of life and relax one's mood when used at home.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_023.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_024.name: Composite Stone Slate
Item_Jiuyu_Market_024.description: A marble spliced stone slab, often chosen as a floor material for relatively solemn places.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_024.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_025.name: Jade Smithing Bench
Item_Jiuyu_Market_025.description: Smithing benches are commonly found in jade shops for processing various ores and jade materials. However, since opening aggregates became a popular pastime, smithing benches are made more and more exquisitely these days to meet the needs of metaphysics.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_025.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_026.name: Agarwood Box
Item_Jiuyu_Market_026.description: A box made of agarwood with an exquisite pattern, it exudes a refreshing fragrance.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_026.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_027.name: Beasthide Bag
Item_Jiuyu_Market_027.description: A purse made of animal fur. Cheap, durable, and trendy in style.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_027.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_028.name: Forging Hammer
Item_Jiuyu_Market_028.description: A small hammer for forging, but many people also use it to hit other things and charge accordingly.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_028.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_029.name: Shengwen Carved Dracojade Box
Item_Jiuyu_Market_029.description: A jade container with a very exquisite pattern. You know it's expensive at first glance.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_029.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_030.name: Emerald Fan
Item_Jiuyu_Market_030.description: The perfect choice of color and texture together with an ingenious design created this most desirable shape.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_030.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_031.name: Two-Sided Jade Pendant
Item_Jiuyu_Market_031.description: A pendant carved out of a fine piece of jade with the most exquisite techniques, a perfect accessory for a respectable man.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_031.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_032.name: Auspicious Animal Seal
Item_Jiuyu_Market_032.description: A seal engraved with various fabled auspicious animals. Rarely used these days, it's pursued by many literati to add to their private collection or to make their personal seal.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_032.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_033.name: Crystal Bangle
Item_Jiuyu_Market_033.description: A crystal bangle, clear and translucent but not selling very well due to its cheap glass look.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_033.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_034.name: Jadestone Tea Set
Item_Jiuyu_Market_034.description: A tea set made of jade, not so much for drinking tea but to admire and appreciate.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_034.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Jiuyu_Market_035.name: Exquisite Rock Carving
Item_Jiuyu_Market_035.description: A white marble carving of a carp jumping over the dragon gate. A pair of it makes a fine gift.
Item_Jiuyu_Market_035.source: It can be redeemed at Prosperity Pawnshop for dominium.

Item_Vera_GameToken.name: Arcade coupon
Item_Vera_GameToken.description: These coupons obtained from the arcade games in the Mirroria Entertainment Center can be redeemed for amazing gifts.
Item_Vera_GameToken.source: Redeem them for rewards at the Arcade counter.

Item_MentorShipCoin.name: Mentorship Coin
Item_MentorShipCoin.source: Reward currency obtained from Mentorship. Can be exchanged for rewards.

Item_MentorShipCoin_pack.name: Mentorship Coin
Item_MentorShipCoin_pack.source: Reward currency obtained from Mentorship. Can be exchanged for rewards.

Item_Vera_RaceToken.name: Race point
Item_Vera_RaceToken.description: Obtained by participating in group races.
Item_Vera_RaceToken.source: Used to unlock some race cars

Item_Vera_Chip.name: Copper Bloom
Item_Vera_Chip.description: A special token only usable within Joy Square. Use miras to exchange for it at the entrance.
Item_Vera_Chip.source: A token used in the Joy Square.

Item_8v8_coin.name: Critical Point
Item_8v8_coin.description: A specially prepared reward for those who muster up the courage to stare into the Abyss.
Item_8v8_coin.source: Fight in the battle gameplay to get it and exchange it for rewards in the Points Store.

Item_FishCoin.name: Fisherman Token
Item_FishCoin.description: Currency used by fishing professionals to trade their catches, each is one engraved with a different kind of fish.
Item_FishCoin.source: These can be exchanged for goods in the Fishing Store.

Blindbox_coin_03.name: Spring Stamp
Blindbox_coin_03.description: Stamps come with the apricity giftbox. It's always a ritual to collect the stamps and apply them.
Blindbox_coin_03.source: Buy Mystery Boxes to get the spring stamp. The stamp can be used to exchange goods at the Spring Market.

Blindbox_coin_04.name: Proof of Light
Blindbox_coin_04.description: Commemorative coupons for the Liuguang Motorshow. Hope you can find the most desirable treasures there.
Blindbox_coin_04.source: Gifted each time you open the Wheel of Light giftbox. Can be used to redeem items at the Expo Store.

Blindbox_coin_05.name: Exhibition Coupon
Blindbox_coin_05.description: A free coupon given to visitors of the Liuguang Motorshow. All experience is worthy of being remembered.
Blindbox_coin_05.source: A voucher that can be used to exchange for the Meteoric line of vehicles. Collect a certain number of them to exchange for Meteoric vehicles.

Blindbox_coin_06.name: Spring Stamp
Blindbox_coin_06.description: Stamps come with the apricity giftbox. It's always a ritual to collect the stamps and apply them.
Blindbox_coin_06.source: Buy Mystery Boxes to get the spring stamp. The stamp can be used to exchange goods at the Spring Market.

Item_Condiment_01.name: Carbonated water
Item_Condiment_01.description: Pretty bland but gives off a tingling sensation. Probably better when blended with something else.

Item_Condiment_02.name: Soy
Item_Condiment_02.description: One of the popular emergency provisions and the main ingredient for various products. Take it straight and you might get the runs.

Item_Condiment_03.name: Salad dressing
Item_Condiment_03.description: The perfect complement for salads. Few things are better than a perfect salad with the perfect dressing.

Item_Condiment_04.name: Wasabi
Item_Condiment_04.description: A condiment appreciated by those who seem to prefer choking while eating their food... Gak!

Item_Greens010.name: Peat moss
Item_Greens010.description: The best choice for detox, though it has a weird taste.

Item_Greens011.name: Black moss
Item_Greens011.description: Grows on the exposed cliff face. It's edible, at least.

Item_Condiment_05.name: Onion
Item_Condiment_05.description: Nutritious and full of flavor, teary eyes are the price for preparation, though.

Item_Condiment_06.name: Rice
Item_Condiment_06.description: Has a unique aroma after it's cooked. One of the most versatile ingredients in the world.

Item_Condiment_07.name: Milk
Item_Condiment_07.description: A nutrient product of maternal love.

Item_Mushroom_003.name: Raincap
Item_Mushroom_003.description: Sprouts toward the sun only after raining. Supposedly tastes like sunshine.

Item_Mushroom_0031.name: Umbrella mushroom
Item_Mushroom_0031.description: Has a very distinct taste and is incredibly delicious.

Item_Mushroom_0041.name: Treecap
Item_Mushroom_0041.description: Fungi growing on trees. So-so in taste.

Item_Mushroom_0042.name: Woodear fungus
Item_Mushroom_0042.description: What? You never had it before? You're missing out, my friend!

Item_Fishes0051.name: Common taimen
Item_Fishes0051.description: Omnivorous fish with a very long maturity cycle, can grow up to 2 meters.

Item_Milk_003.name: Quality milk
Item_Milk_003.description: A common beverage, ready to drink and may be stored for a while. A nutritious fave.

Item_Fruit_0021.name: Mock strawberry
Item_Fruit_0021.description: A dead ringer for strawberry with a similar flavor.

Item_Meat_006.name: Prime Cut
Item_Meat_006.description: The more the beast moved, the better the meat.

Item_Staples_0031.name: Snowy potato
Item_Staples_0031.description: Tastes great when baked, but eating too much of it won't make you pleasant around other people.

Item_Nuts0031.name: Spire nuts
Item_Nuts0031.description: A special variant of pinecone. Very rare, so get it when you have a chance!

Item_Follows0011.name: Cauliflower
Item_Follows0011.description: Whoa! What a big ole white cabbage!

Item_Greens_0031.name: Broccoflower
Item_Greens_0031.description: Nutritious, and every kid loves it.

Item_Gold.name: Gold
Item_Gold.description: This coin, minted from tin and gold, is currently the most popular currency across the land.

Item_MedalofValor_1.name: Warrior badge I
Item_MedalofValor_1.description: An exquisite badge symbolizing valor, skill, and honor, all of which are not bought, but earned.
Item_MedalofValor_1.source: Obtained from Apophis boss chests, Heirs of Aida enemy drops, and password boxes. For redeeming rewards in the Warrior Store.

Item_MedalofValor_2.name: Warrior badge II
Item_MedalofValor_2.description: An exquisite badge symbolizing valor, skill, and honor, all of which are not bought, but earned.
Item_MedalofValor_2.source: Obtained from Frost Bot boss chests, Ravager enemy drops, and password chests. For redeeming rewards in the Warrior Store.

Blindbox_coin_01.name: Spring Stamp
Blindbox_coin_01.description: Stamps come with the apricity giftbox. It's always a ritual to collect the stamps and apply them.
Blindbox_coin_01.source: Buy Mystery Boxes to get the spring stamp. The stamp can be used to exchange goods at the Spring Market.

Blindbox_coin_02.name: Proof of Light
Blindbox_coin_02.description: Commemorative coupons for the Liuguang Motorshow. Hope you can find the most desirable treasures there.
Blindbox_coin_02.source: Gifted each time you open the Wheel of Light giftbox. Can be used to redeem items at the Expo Store.

mount_006_coin.name: Exhibition Coupon
mount_006_coin.description: A free coupon given to visitors of the Liuguang Motorshow. All experience is worthy of being remembered.
mount_006_coin.source: A voucher that can be used to exchange for the Meteoric line of vehicles. Collect a certain number of them to exchange for Meteoric vehicles.

Item_Reputation1.name: Bounty EXP
Item_Reputation1.description: Made out of special metal and represents the contributions from the wanders of Aida to this planet. Worth endeavoring for.
Item_Reputation1.source: Gain Bounty EXP to raise Bounty level and receive more rewarding Bounty Missions.

Item_Reputation2.name: Banges bounty coin
Item_Reputation2.description: Minted with unique craftsmanship, featuring a relief of an anchor. Can be used to exchange for special items.
Item_Reputation2.source: Can be used as a reward for the bounty hunters who have completed Bounty Missions at Banges Port and to purchase special items from vendors.

Item_Reputation3.name: Navia bounty coin
Item_Reputation3.description: Minted with unique craftsmanship, featuring a relief of a mechanical windmill. Can be used to exchange for special items.
Item_Reputation3.source: Can be used as a reward for the bounty hunters who have completed Bounty Missions in the Navia region and to purchase special items from vendors.

Item_Reputation4.name: Banges bounty coin
Item_Reputation4.description: Minted with unique craftsmanship, featuring a relief of an anchor. Can be used to exchange for special items.
Item_Reputation4.source: Can be used as a reward for the bounty hunters who have completed Bounty Missions at Banges Port and to purchase special items from vendors.

Item_Reputation5.name: Banges bounty coin
Item_Reputation5.description: Minted with unique craftsmanship, featuring a relief of an anchor. Can be used to exchange for special items.
Item_Reputation5.source: Can be used as a reward for the bounty hunters who have completed Bounty Missions at Banges Port and to purchase special items from vendors.

item_GuildMeritorious.name: Merit
item_GuildMeritorious.description: Obtained from Crew events to redeem items in the Crew Store.

Item_Guildcapital.name: Crew Fund
Item_Guildcapital.description: Obtained through daily Crew activities and donations.

Item_Experience.name: EXP
Item_Experience.description: A mysterious yet powerful force for character growth.
Item_Experience.source: Essential for leveling up Wanderers, obtained through various means.

Item_Diamond.name: Tanium
Item_Diamond.description: Stable crystals, most commonly used for energy supply. One of the currencies redeemable for items in the Store.
Item_Diamond.source: Redeemable for items in the Store.

Item_Artifact_updata.name: Omnium alloy
Item_Artifact_updata.description: The latest metal material made from multiple types of metals with Omnium with good hardness, quality, and ductility. Mostly used for refining high-tech weapons and machines.
Item_Artifact_updata.source: For advancing Relics of all levels.

Item_FakeDiamond.name: Dark Crystal
Item_FakeDiamond.description: Contains unstable energy and is sometimes used as a power source. One of the currencies redeemable for items in the Store.
Item_FakeDiamond.source: Redeemable for items in the Store.

item_guild_1.name: Merit
item_guild_1.description: Obtained from Crew events to redeem items in the Crew Store.

item_guild_2.name: Crew Fund
item_guild_2.description: Obtained through daily Crew activities and donations.

item_guild_3.name: Crew honor
item_guild_3.description: Obtained through Crew missions for rewards on the Crew page.

item_ticket_01.name: Proof of Purchase
item_ticket_01.description: From Banges Tech, Matrix chip home delivery available.
item_ticket_01.source: Apply to order Choice Matrices (not usable with Limited Order).

item_Cafe_1.name: Mysterious recipe
item_Cafe_1.description: Meat, veggies, and fruit. When mixed properly, they can orchestrate a delicacy as well.

item_Cafe_2.name: Mysterious recipe
item_Cafe_2.description: Some prefer to cut it into slices and eat it raw. However, it also tastes good when simply cooked.

item_Cafe_3.name: Mysterious recipe
item_Cafe_3.description: Fresh turkey stewed with the right ingredients for a total of forty-nine days...

item_Cafe_4.name: Mysterious recipe
item_Cafe_4.description: A perfect combo of pastry and fruit. Children's favorite.

item_Cafe_5.name: Mysterious recipe
item_Cafe_5.description: A drink made from common fruits.

item_Cafe_100.name: Mysterious ingredient
item_Cafe_100.description: One has to figure out how to cook it themself through research.

StrengthenStone_01.name: Booster Module
StrengthenStone_01.description: A common mechanical part, available in many different sizes.

StrengthenStone_02.name: Advancement Module
StrengthenStone_02.description: A component with aim assist and weapon adjustment system for precision firing.

StrengthenStone_03.name: Booster Module II
StrengthenStone_03.description: A common mechanical part, available in many different sizes.

StrengthenStone_04.name: Advancement Module II
StrengthenStone_04.description: A component with aim assist and weapon adjustment system for precision firing.

EquipFragment.name: Base Chip
EquipFragment.description: Raw material processed through complex procedures for chip production. Redeemable for Matrix chips.
EquipFragment.source: Redeemable for Matrix chips at the Matrix Store.

WeaponFragment.name: Black Gold
WeaponFragment.description: Token forged by smiths from old Omnium weapons. Circulated only in special markets. Redeemable for weapons.
WeaponFragment.source: Redeemable for weapons at the Weapon Store.

Item_Mine001.name: Iron Ore
Item_Mine001.description: One of the most commonly seen metal ores that has a wide variety of usages.

Item_Mine002.name: Tungsten
Item_Mine002.description: A rare ore that can only be found in high altitude localities. Despite its plain appearance, the ore contains massive energy.

Item_Mine003.name: Titanium ore
Item_Mine003.description: A rare ore that only grows on high mountains. It's the ideal material in the view of blacksmiths.

Item_Mine004.name: Striped stone
Item_Mine004.description: A type of ore commonly seen near waterfalls that got its name for the stripes washed out by the current. Although it looks special, it is not good for forging.

Item_Plant001.name: Lilies
Item_Plant001.description: A common plant normally seen around St. Maurice. The flowers are white and pure, so they're often used in important ceremonies.

Item_Plant002.name: Azaleas
Item_Plant002.description: Common flowers that grow on plains and platforms. Judging from their bright color, maybe we can use them to dye hair?

Item_Plant003.name: Violets
Item_Plant003.description: Flowers with a luxury color that grow on high mountains and loved by women.

Item_Plant004.name: Passion fruits
Item_Plant004.description: Fruits grown near rivers and seas with elegant-colored flowers that are good for your lungs and throat.

Item_Mine_fire.name: Firecore
Item_Mine_fire.description: Shards with fire elemental power, give off a slight heat when melted down.

Item_Mine_fire_02.name: Heart of Lava
Item_Mine_fire_02.description: Rare ore containing fire elemental power. The fiery redness is a sufficient proof of the power within.

Item_Mine_fire_03.name: Sunsource
Item_Mine_fire_03.description: Rare ore containing great fire elemental power. You can feel the swelling heat inside just holding it.

Item_Mine_ice.name: Icecore
Item_Mine_ice.description: Shards with ice elemental power, clear as a crystal.

Item_Mine_ice_02.name: Heart of Winter
Item_Mine_ice_02.description: Rare ore with ice elemental power. The high purity ice element within gives it a rich blue appearance.

Item_Mine_ice_03.name: Snowsource
Item_Mine_ice_03.description: Rare ore containing great ice elemental power. A thin cold vapor always shrouds it, like an eternal layer of frost.

Item_Mine_thunder.name: Magcore
Item_Mine_thunder.description: Shards with volt elemental power, glow faintly in the dark.

Item_Mine_thunder_02.name: Heart of Lightning
Item_Mine_thunder_02.description: Rare ore with volt elemental power. Flashes can be seen inside it in good lighting.

Item_Mine_thunder_03.name: Lightningsource
Item_Mine_thunder_03.description: Rare ore containing great volt elemental power, whose surface periodically emits electricity. So handle with care or you'll get zapped.

Item_Mine_physic.name: Rockcore
Item_Mine_physic.description: Extremely hard shards formed under Omnium's influence, with a drab appearance.

Item_Mine_physic_02.name: Heart of Summit
Item_Mine_physic_02.description: Rare and extremely hard ore that requires special Omnium technology to forge.

Item_Mine_physic_03.name: Landsource
Item_Mine_physic_03.description: Whole and hard rare ore. The transparent crystal sometimes emits a tiny unknown pulse like a heartbeat.

Item_Mine_superpower.name: Activator Block
Item_Mine_superpower.description: The ore shard containing altered energy which pulses with an extremely weak life sign...

Item_Mine_superpower_02.name: Fission Crystal
Item_Mine_superpower_02.description: The rare ore containing altered energy which continues to divide and expand like cells.

Item_Mine_superpower_03.name: Proliferating Crystal Cluster
Item_Mine_superpower_03.description: A huge, rare ore rich in altered energy. It seems to be using its own consciousness to seek evolution and will continue to grow if left unchecked.

Item_breakthrough_A1.name: Nano Coating I
Item_breakthrough_A1.description: Coating developed from new technology that slightly improves weapon performance.

Item_breakthrough_A2.name: Nano Coating II
Item_breakthrough_A2.description: Redeveloped coating after more research to improve weapon performance.

Item_breakthrough_A3.name: Nano Coating III
Item_breakthrough_A3.description: Coating developed from exclusive Hykros technology to greatly improve weapon performance.

Item_breakthrough_B1.name: Acidproof Glaze I
Item_breakthrough_B1.description: Acidproof material developed from new technology to slightly improve weapon performance.

Item_breakthrough_B2.name: Acidproof Glaze II
Item_breakthrough_B2.description: Redeveloped glaze after more research to improve weapon performance.

Item_breakthrough_B3.name: Acidproof Glaze III
Item_breakthrough_B3.description: Glaze developed from exclusive Hykros technology to greatly improve weapon performance.

Item_breakthrough_C1.name: Booster Frame I
Item_breakthrough_C1.description: Fortified framework developed from new technology to slightly improve weapon performance.

Item_breakthrough_C2.name: Booster Frame II
Item_breakthrough_C2.description: Redeveloped frame after more research to improve weapon performance.

Item_breakthrough_C3.name: Booster Frame III
Item_breakthrough_C3.description: Fortified framework developed from exclusive Hykros technology to greatly improve weapon performance.

Item_breakthrough_D1.name: Nanofiber Frame I
Item_breakthrough_D1.description: Premium frame developed from new technology to slightly improve weapon performance.

Item_breakthrough_D2.name: Nanofiber Frame II
Item_breakthrough_D2.description: Redeveloped premium frame after more research to improve weapon performance.

Item_breakthrough_D3.name: Nanofiber Frame III
Item_breakthrough_D3.description: Premium framework developed from exclusive Hykros technology to greatly improve weapon performance.

Item_equiptupo_A1.name: Movement Coordination Module
Item_equiptupo_A1.description: An advanced module for coordinating combat stances.
Item_equiptupo_A1.source: An advanced module for augmenting armguards and legguards.

Item_equiptupo_B1.name: Sense Enhancement Module
Item_equiptupo_B1.description: Enhances perception of combat situations. Empowers sharp senses of battle even in heavy armor.
Item_equiptupo_B1.source: An advanced module for augmenting combat engines and eyepieces.

Item_equiptupo_C1.name: Core Control Module
Item_equiptupo_C1.description: Core module used to control the complete set of equipment flexibly and effectively.
Item_equiptupo_C1.source: An advanced module for augmenting handguards and microreactors.

Item_equiptupo_D1.name: Information Processing Module
Item_equiptupo_D1.description: Used for combat information processing. It has adopted the latest chip architecture and offers powerful information processing and computing capabilities.
Item_equiptupo_D1.source: An advanced module for augmenting helmets and exoskeletons.

Item_equiptupo_E1.name: Armor Management Module
Item_equiptupo_E1.description: A key module for efficient armor management.
Item_equiptupo_E1.source: An advanced module for augmenting belts and spaulders.

Item_equiptupo_F1.name: High Speed Transmission Module
Item_equiptupo_F1.description: Machinery module with an ultra-high transmission coefficient that can make unbelievable actions, even under high-speed maneuvers.
Item_equiptupo_F1.source: An advanced module for augmenting armor and sabatons.

Item_equiptupo_coin.name: Augmentation Factor
Item_equiptupo_coin.description: Accumulated experimental data needed for equipment augmentation.
Item_equiptupo_coin.source: Basic materials required to augment equipment.

Item_equiptupo_reroll1.name: Augment Stats Fortification Chip
Item_equiptupo_reroll1.description: A protective chip used to secure augmentation stat data.
Item_equiptupo_reroll1.source: Materials required to secure augmentation stats in equipment augmentation.

Item_equiptupo_reroll2.name: Random Stats Fortification Chip
Item_equiptupo_reroll2.description: A protective chip used to secure random stats.
Item_equiptupo_reroll2.source: Materials required to secure random stats in equipment augmentation.

hardware_001.name: Triangular gear
hardware_001.description: The most essential parts to support the functioning of machines.

hardware_002.name: Alloy round studs
hardware_002.description: Enhanced parts for machines with less weight and increased hardness, and thus have a higher price.

hardware_003.name: Power Core
hardware_003.description: A very expensive high-tech component, safe and efficient because it blocks radiation while supplying massive Omnium energy.

GenePointItem_Attack.name: Originum (Attack)
GenePointItem_Attack.description: A mysterious byproduct of Omnium radiation research that affects the evolution of creatures with a purpose. After years of research and optimization, it can now be safely used on the human body.
GenePointItem_Attack.source: A necessity to activate enhanced Flairs. When a Relic is fully developed, Relics and shards with the same name can be dismantled into Originum.

GenePointItem_Assist.name: Originum (Support)
GenePointItem_Assist.description: A mysterious byproduct of Omnium radiation research that affects the evolution of creatures with a purpose. After years of research and optimization, it can now be safely used on the human body.
GenePointItem_Assist.source: A necessity to activate enhanced Flairs. When a Relic is fully developed, Relics and shards with the same name can be dismantled into Originum.

GenePointItem_Def.name: Originum (Feature)
GenePointItem_Def.description: A mysterious byproduct of Omnium radiation research that affects the evolution of creatures with a purpose. After years of research and optimization, it can now be safely used on the human body.
GenePointItem_Def.source: A necessity to activate enhanced Flairs. When a Relic is fully developed, Relics and shards with the same name can be dismantled into Originum.

Mount_Strengthen_1_1.name: E53 Coolant
Mount_Strengthen_1_1.description: A must for vehicle maintenance, also extends generator or engine life.

Mount_Strengthen_1_2.name: FF79 Alloy Lubricant
Mount_Strengthen_1_2.description: Composite lubricant that lasts longer than ordinary lubricants and is environmentally friendly.

Mount_Strengthen_1_3.name: Power Gears
Mount_Strengthen_1_3.description: Very durable alloy gears able to withstand constant operation. A must for vehicle improvement.

Mount_Strengthen_1_4.name: Leveler
Mount_Strengthen_1_4.description: Necessary component to adjust the balance of a vehicle, maximizing its speed by improving stability.

Mount_Strengthen_2_1.name: Precision Instrument
Mount_Strengthen_2_1.description: Instrument to diagnose vehicle conditions, with greater coverage and precision after rounds of development.

Mount_Strengthen_2_2.name: Shock Absorber
Mount_Strengthen_2_2.description: The most popular anti-shock component currently on the market. The quality makes it a beginning retrofitter's choice.

Mount_Strengthen_2_3.name: Universal Bearing
Mount_Strengthen_2_3.description: A common component for reducing friction between rotating parts. As the most prevalent of its kind, it has different models for different spots.

Mount_Strengthen_2_4.name: Electronic Control Unit
Mount_Strengthen_2_4.description: A component with aim assist and vehicle adjustment system for precision firing.

Mount_Strengthen_3_1.name: Turbocharger
Mount_Strengthen_3_1.description: Advanced turbo system developed by Banges Tech to greatly improve engine performance, thus a popular component for racers.

Mount_Strengthen_3_2.name: High-Performance Transmission
Mount_Strengthen_3_2.description: Component attached to the engine. Most users are thrilled by the sudden acceleration it provides, but its true value lies in the reliable, efficient deceleration.

Mount_Strengthen_3_3.name: Gyroscope
Mount_Strengthen_3_3.description: A component interconnecting major parts, relying on flexible rotations to reduce friction, extend lifespan of parts, and cut down on noise.

Mount_Strengthen_3_4.name: High-Energy Battery
Mount_Strengthen_3_4.description: Advanced Omnium battery developed by Hykros. Safety and efficiency are the biggest selling points.

Mount_Strengthen_4_1.name: Power Core
Mount_Strengthen_4_1.description: A very expensive high-tech component, safe and efficient because it blocks radiation while supplying massive Omnium energy.

Mount_Strengthen_4_2.name: Titanium Housing
Mount_Strengthen_4_2.description: Metal hull for engines. Highly-durable, lightweight, corrosion-resistant, and especially popular in regions with adverse environments.

Mount_Strengthen_4_3.name: Special Hamlin Bearing
Mount_Strengthen_4_3.description: Created by the Crown Mines scientist Hamlin to greatly improve a vehicle's energy efficiency, thus enhancing its performance.

Mount_Strengthen_4_4.name: Type V Engine
Mount_Strengthen_4_4.description: Advanced engine developed by Banges's famous vehicle researcher, Dr. V, who personally oversees the production of every unit, hence its rarity.

gift_Mount_006_skin.name: Windfall Meteor Box
gift_Mount_006_skin.description: Picked it up by chance. Which one of the shining meteors will be inside the palm of your hand?
gift_Mount_006_skin.source:
Open to receive one of the Meteoric line of vehicles. If you obtain a duplicate vehicle, it can be exchanged for 20 exhibition coupons.
Chance to obtain the following vehicles:
Justice Meteor, Nightfeather Meteor, Med Meteor, Rockin' Meteor, Pouncing Cat Meteor, Arena Meteor, Absconder Meteor, Smoothie Meteor, Wishing Meteor, Modular Meteor, Supercomputing Meteor, Frosty Meteor, Snow Rose Meteor, EM Meteor, Glowing Meteor, Windrunner Meteor, Freedom Meteor, Electrovision Meteor, Neon Meteor, Surveyor Meteor, Scuba Meteor, Steady Meteor, Flame Chaser Meteor, Roaming Meteor, Phantasmic Meteor, Inspirational Meteor, DIY Meteor.

choose_Mount_006_skin.name: Meteor Box Reserve
choose_Mount_006_skin.description: In the dazzling rain of stars, there must be one of your destiny.
choose_Mount_006_skin.source:

Justice Meteor, Nightfeather Meteor, Med Meteor, Rockin' Meteor, Pouncing Cat Meteor, Arena Meteor, Absconder Meteor, Smoothie Meteor, Wishing Meteor, Modular Meteor, Supercomputing Meteor, Frosty Meteor, Snow Rose Meteor, EM Meteor, Glowing Meteor, Windrunner Meteor, Freedom Meteor, Electrovision Meteor, Neon Meteor, Surveyor Meteor, Scuba Meteor, Steady Meteor, Flame Chaser Meteor, Roaming Meteor, Phantasmic Meteor, Inspirational Meteor, DIY Meteor.

choose_newbpfinal_linye.name: Shadoweave Box
choose_newbpfinal_linye.source: Choose one from the following rewards: Shadoweave, black gold ×120.

choose_StrengthenStone_01.name: Booster Module Box
choose_StrengthenStone_01.source: Choose one from the following rewards: Booster module, Booster module II

choose_StrengthenStone_02.name: Advancement Module Box
choose_StrengthenStone_02.source: Choose one from the following rewards: Advancement Module, Advancement Module II

choose_weapon_sr_init.name: SR weapon box
choose_weapon_sr_init.source: Open the box and select one of the <purple>SR</> weapons in it.

choose_weapon_ssr_init.name: SSR weapon box
choose_weapon_ssr_init.source: Open the box and select one of the <orange>SSR</> weapons in it: Thunderblades, Rosy Edge, Icewind Arrow, Absolute Zero, Scythe of the Crow, Chakram of the Seas, Negating Cube, Dual EM Stars, or Molten Shield V2.

choose_reactor_orange.name: Fortress microreactor box
choose_reactor_orange.description: A box containing four types of fortress microreactors.

choose_exoskeleton_orange.name: Fortress Exoskeleton Box

choose_Armband1.name: Fortress Bracers Box
choose_Armband1.source: Choose from one of the following equipment: Fortress bracers (Overload), fortress bracers (Glaze), fortress bracers (Burst), fortress bracers (Arc). Compared with the regular fortress bracers, there is a higher possibility for it to have bonus stats like corresponding elemental attack and elemental resistance.

choose_elemine_breakthrough_p1.name: Weapon development material box I
choose_elemine_breakthrough_p1.source: Choose one of the following: Booster frame I, nanofiber frame I, nano coating I, acidproof glaze I, firecore, icecore, magcore, rockcore.

choose_elemine_breakthrough_p2.name: Weapon Development Material Box II
choose_elemine_breakthrough_p2.source: Choose one of the following: Booster frame II, nanofiber frame II, nano coating II, acidproof glaze II, heart of lava, heart of winter, heart of lightning, heart of summit.

choose_elemine_breakthrough_p3.name: Weapon Development Material Box III
choose_elemine_breakthrough_p3.source: Choose one of the following: Booster frame III, nanofiber frame III, nano coating III, acidproof glaze III, sunsource, snowsource, lightningsource, landsource.

choose_research_1.name: Appointed Research Kit Box I
choose_research_1.source: Choose from one of the following: Lost Data Module, Gray Matter Chunks, Solid Bone Fragment, thornfruit.

choose_research_2.name: Appointed Research Kit Box II
choose_research_2.source: Choose from one of the following: Machinery Core, Grayspace Spine, Antelope Antlers.

choose_research_3.name: Appointed Research Kit Box III
choose_research_3.source: Choose from one of the following: Lost Text, Crystamax Core, Behemoth Bones.

Intermediate_choose_research_1.name: Appointed Research Kit Box I

Intermediate_choose_research_2.name: Appointed Research Kit Box II

Intermediate_choose_research_3.name: Appointed Research Kit Box III
Intermediate_choose_research_3.source: Choose from one of the following: Lost Text, Crystamax Core, Behemoth Bones.

choose_research_4.name: Appointed Research Kit Box IV
choose_research_4.source: Choose one of the following: Dragon-necked turtle meat, ink sac, seawater fish fin, cachalot bone, slime, poison sac, turtle horn, squid bones, Grayspace wing membrane, filth, electric storage sac, snout snail tusk, disintegrated gravel, thornfruit, solid bone fragment, gray matter chunks, marzoid ore, orange anemone, large seawater fish meat, squid meat, neon material, tentacle, conch meat, small hard shell, large hard shell, cave coral, algae, red shell, small seawater fish meat, jellyfish, red sea urchin, pink sea urchin, disc coral, conch, or shell.

choose_research_5.name: Appointed Research Kit Box VI
choose_research_5.source: Choose one of the following: Dragon-necked turtle egg, ambergris, stingray mouthparts, turtle spine, swordfish fin, skull shark skeleton, skull shark tooth, shed single horn, sea meme, fanged mackerel fangs, snout snail wings, Haboela's giant horn, filamentous hygrobacterium, antelope antlers, or Grayspace Spine.

choose_research_6.name: Appointed Research Kit Box VII
choose_research_6.source: Choose one of the following: Skull shark egg, disintegrated core, elementia, glandular filaments, behemoth bones, or Crystamax Core.

GashaponTest.name: Lucky Hykros Giftbox
GashaponTest.source: Purchase to obtain one of the following models at random (multiple purchases will not result in duplicate models): Windrunner Meteor, Scuba Meteor, Frosty Meteor, Electrovision Meteor, Healing Meteor.

Item_EquipAttrSelect.name: Data Repeater
Item_EquipAttrSelect.description: This tiny instrument can detect low-level issues during equipment advancement, ensuring the equipment doesn't develop in a way you don't desire.
Item_EquipAttrSelect.source: Preserve one random stat which won't be upgraded during equipment advancement. Costs one per advancement.

Item_EquipUncommonSelect.name: Titan Compiling Module
Item_EquipUncommonSelect.description: As the equipment grade increases, this device can detect and repair minor errors automatically during the equipment upgrade process to prevent the worst-case scenario from happening.
Item_EquipUncommonSelect.source: Remove two rare stats when augmenting the equipment to prevent them from showing up during the augmentation. Consume one whenever the rare stat changes.

Item_EquipUncommonExtension.name: Equipment Amplifier
Item_EquipUncommonExtension.description: The latest universal component from Hykros Equipment Research Institute. Can be used to unlock rare affix slots on equipment, enhancing both the strength and combat performance.
Item_EquipUncommonExtension.source: Used to unlock rare affix slots on equipment.

Item_Vera_Hotel1.name: Freeze Frame: Crisis
Item_Vera_Hotel1.source: Use in the Backpack after purchasing. This decoration can be added to the Mirafleur Hall guest room.

Item_Vera_Hotel2.name: Freeze Frame: Huge Crisis!
Item_Vera_Hotel2.description: At that time, the pair of claws were only 0.01 cm from my hair.

item_activity_time_worldboss_01.name: Frontier Command
item_activity_time_worldboss_01.description: Archon Elric has issued a top command, requesting all appointed Executors to immediately go support the border transit station.
item_activity_time_worldboss_01.source: Allows another attempt on the Mirror Space - Frontier Clash challenge

item_activity_time_voidclone_01.name: Rift Generator
item_activity_time_voidclone_01.description: A device developed to enable more frequent visits to the Void Rift for investigation, capable of generating a spatial pathway to the Void Rift.
item_activity_time_voidclone_01.source: Allows another attempt on the Mirror Space - Void Rift challenge

Item_WormholeEnergy.name: Void Energy
Item_WormholeEnergy.description: The highly efficient energy source collected from the Void. Executors can use it to activate hidden functions when exploring the void, greatly enhancing combat capability.
Item_WormholeEnergy.source: Usable in the Void Abyss. Consume void energy to load Abyssal Tech and gain stat bonuses in the Void Abyss. All void energy obtained in the previous month will be cleared on the first day of every month.

LevyClone_Reset.name: Target Reconstructor
LevyClone_Reset.description: Allows rebuilding defeated targets to be used as a means of improving your ability by challenging them again.
LevyClone_Reset.source: Use it to reset Raid challenge attempts for this week.

LevyClone_time.name: Spatial Reorganizer
LevyClone_time.description: Specific devices that can reassemble known spatial fragments. Use it to freely select fragments to connect together.
LevyClone_time.source: Used to obtain 1,000 Gold. Originally was used to increase the number of Raid rewards by 1.

item_endlessidolum_time.name: Resequencer
item_endlessidolum_time.description: An instrument that increases the number of challenges for Sequential Phantasm stages.
item_endlessidolum_time.source: Use to increase the number of challenges for all Sequential Phantasm stages by 1.

item_endlessidolum_time_0.name: Resequencer: Frost
item_endlessidolum_time_0.description: An instrument that increases the number of challenges for Sequential Phantasm stages.
item_endlessidolum_time_0.source: Use to increase the number of challenges for the Sequential Phantasm stage Chilling Frost by 1.

item_endlessidolum_time_1.name: Resequencer: Ember
item_endlessidolum_time_1.description: An instrument that increases the number of challenges for Sequential Phantasm stages.
item_endlessidolum_time_1.source: Use to increase the number of challenges for the Sequential Phantasm stage Coronal Embers by 1.

item_endlessidolum_time_2.name: Resequencer: Thunder
item_endlessidolum_time_2.description: An instrument that increases the number of challenges for Sequential Phantasm stages.
item_endlessidolum_time_2.source: Use to increase the number of challenges for the Sequential Phantasm stage Thunderous Shout by 1.

item_endlessidolum_time_3.name: Resequencer: Shock
item_endlessidolum_time_3.description: An instrument that increases the number of challenges for Sequential Phantasm stages.
item_endlessidolum_time_3.source: Use to increase the number of challenges for the Sequential Phantasm stage Internal Shock by 1.

item_activity_time_LevyClone_01.name: Space Orientator I
item_activity_time_LevyClone_01.description: A device that traces the trajectory of spacetime transmissions and captures a specific segment, which will be directionally connected to the "Midlevel Control Room" after use.
item_activity_time_LevyClone_01.source: Used to obtain spacetime crystal fragments ×6, spacetime crystal dust ×10, universal combat part II *1, and universal combat part I *5. Originally was used to gain 1 attempt for the Mirror Space - Midlevel Control Room challenge.

item_activity_time_LevyClone_02.name: Space Orientator II
item_activity_time_LevyClone_02.description: A device that traces the trajectory of spacetime transmissions and captures a specific segment, which will be directionally connected to the "Phantasmic Zenith" after use.
item_activity_time_LevyClone_02.source: Used to obtain spacetime crystal fragments ×8, spacetime crystal dust ×14, universal combat part II *1, and universal combat part I *6. Originally was used to gain 1 attempt for the Mirror Space - Phantasmic Zenith challenge.

item_activity_time_LevyClone_03.name: Space Orientator III
item_activity_time_LevyClone_03.description: A device that traces the trajectory of spacetime transmissions and captures a specific segment, which will be directionally connected to the "Shattered Realm" after use.
item_activity_time_LevyClone_03.source: Used to obtain spacetime crystal fragments ×10, spacetime crystal dust ×18, universal combat part II *1, and universal combat part I *7. Originally was used to gain 1 attempt for the Mirror Space - Shattered Realm challenge.

item_activity_time_LevyClone_04.name: Space Orientator IV
item_activity_time_LevyClone_04.description: A device that traces the trajectory of spacetime transmissions and captures specific fragments, which will be directionally connected to the Battle Test Area after use.
item_activity_time_LevyClone_04.source: Used to obtain spacetime crystal fragments ×20, spacetime crystal dust ×20, universal combat part II *3, and universal combat part I *15. Originally was used to gain 1 attempt for the Battle Test Area challenge.

item_transfercard.name: District Orders
item_transfercard.description: A zoning order was secretly issued by Hykros. It can be used to change the server the character is on.
item_transfercard.source: Server transfer free of charge one time.

Item_Homeland_map.name: Artificial Island Survey Drawing
Item_Homeland_map.description: The shape, size, properties, etc., of the Artificial Island are measured, collected, and drawn into a map to facilitate the planning, design, and construction of many buildings on the island.

Blindbox_SpringFestival_2022.name: Apricity Giftbox
Blindbox_SpringFestival_2022.description: Limited-Time giftbox offered to celebrate the arrival of spring. It's always a mixture of anticipation and trepidation when you open the box.
Blindbox_SpringFestival_2022.source: Random box. Low chance of getting: [Outfit] Fruity Candy, \[Outfit] Era, \[Outfit] Forget Me Not, \[Accessory] Layer Cake, \[Accessory] Curtain, \[Accessory] Black Goat Horns, \[Avatar] May All Go Well, \[Avatar Frame] Peace and Joy, \[Chat Bubble] End of the Year.

gift_BigClient_01.name: Wanderer's Welcome Pack
gift_BigClient_01.description: Hope these gifts will send the otter's regards and appreciation to the trailblazer.
gift_BigClient_01.source: Tata's welcome gift for the trailblazer. Contains: gold nucleus ×5, proof of purchase ×5, cluster ×500, gold ×50,000.

gift_BigClient_birthday.name: Wanderer's Birthday Present
gift_BigClient_birthday.description: The otter has prepared a birthday gift for the Trailblazer and looked forward to the day— Happy Birthday!
gift_BigClient_birthday.source: Tata's birthday present for the trailblazer. Contains: red nucleus ×6, special voucher ×6, gold nucleus ×6, proof of purchase ×6, cluster ×666, gold ×50,000.

gift_activity2_Love.name: Cetus Letter
gift_activity2_Love.description: "Packed! Pink! Packed! Blue! Hey! What's the next one!? Hanna! I need some help over here!!!" Melo seems to be having a minor issue with packaging, as whatever color letter paper that comes out of it is not a surprise at all.
gift_activity2_Love.source: Open to obtain a random Letter. Use it for the Sweets Workshop event, which expires on March 4, 2022.

gift_matrix_SR3.name: Frost Bot Matrix Gift
gift_matrix_SR3.source: Contains a random Frost Bot Matrix.

gift_matrix_SR9.source: Contains a random Bai Ling Matrix.

gift_matrix_R7.name: Obstacle Removal Matrix Gift

choose_bag_matrix_sr.name: SR Matrix Free Pick
choose_bag_matrix_sr.source: Use to select one of the following rewards: All Pepper Matrices, all Hilda Matrices, all Ene Matrices, all Bai Ling Matrices, or all Echo Matrices.

bag_matrix_SSR1.name: Meryl Matrix Gift
bag_matrix_SSR1.source: Use to obtain every Meryl Matrix: Meryl: Swordfight Simulation, Meryl: Wake-Up Call, Meryl: Absolute Authority, and Meryl: Detached.

bag_matrix_SSR2.name: Tsubasa Matrix Gift
bag_matrix_SSR2.source: Use to obtain every Tsubasa Matrix: Tsubasa: Weather Vane, Tsubasa: Gravitator, Tsubasa: Drifter, and Tsubasa: Stone Cold.

bag_matrix_SSR3.name: Cocoritter Matrix Gift
bag_matrix_SSR3.source: Use to obtain every Cocoritter Matrix: Cocoritter: Artistic Instinct, Cocoritter: Identity Overlap, Cocoritter: Caregiver, and Cocoritter: Helper.

bag_matrix_SSR4.name: KING Matrix Gift
bag_matrix_SSR4.source: Use to obtain every KING Matrix: KING: Underground Ruler, KING: Live to Fight, KING: Thrillseeker, and KING: One Man Army.

bag_matrix_SSR5.name: Cobalt-B Matrix Gift
bag_matrix_SSR5.source: Use to obtain every Cobalt-B Matrix: Cobalt-B: Sixth Sense, Cobalt-B: Starting Capital, Cobalt-B: Master Artist, and Cobalt-B: Rise and Shine.

bag_matrix_SSR6.name: Claudia Matrix Gift

fragment_FightPet_1.name: Kalka Smart Servant Shard
fragment_FightPet_1.description: An early smart servant model developed by Dr. Claire of Cetus Island. A new smart servant combat module has been tested for it in response to new combat requirements.
fragment_FightPet_1.source: Collect 20 shards to fuse the smart servant, Kalka. Any surplus can be used to advance the smart servant.

fragment_FightPet_2.name: Void Angel Smart Servant Shard
fragment_FightPet_2.description: A multi-purpose smart servant from the Old Federation days that can be used in a variety of situations. A new smart servant combat module has been tested for it in response to new combat requirements.
fragment_FightPet_2.source: Collect 20 shards to fuse the smart servant, Void Angel. Any surplus can be used to advance the smart servant.

fragment_FightPet_3.name: Angela Smart Servant Shard
fragment_FightPet_3.description: A smart servant from the Old Federation days originally intended for use as an entertainment performer. A new smart servant combat module has been tested for it in response to new combat requirements.
fragment_FightPet_3.source: Collect 20 shards to fuse the smart servant, Angela. Any surplus can be used to advance the smart servant.

fragment_FightPet_4.name: Moonrabbit Smart Servant Shard
fragment_FightPet_4.description: A mechanical assistant smart servant developed by Banges Tech. A new smart servant combat module has been tested for it in response to new combat requirements.
fragment_FightPet_4.source: Collect 20 shards to fuse the smart servant, Moonrabbit. Any surplus can be used to advance the smart servant.

fragment_FightPet_5.name: Flame Sparrow Shard
fragment_FightPet_5.description: A mechanical assistant smart servant developed by Banges Tech. A new smart servant combat module has been tested for it in response to new combat requirements.
fragment_FightPet_5.source: Collect 20 shards to fuse the smart servant, Flame Sparrow. Any surplus can be used to advance the smart servant.

fragment_FightPet_6.name: Mi-a: Assistance Smart Servant Shard
fragment_FightPet_6.description: The first encountered smart servant introduced by Shirli back in the Astra Shelter. A quiet one that is really good at taking care of people. A new smart servant combat module has been tested for it.
fragment_FightPet_6.source: Collect 20 shards to fuse the smart servant, Mi-a: Assistance. Any surplus can be used to advance the smart servant.

fragment_FightPet_7.name: Zongyun Smart Servant Shard
fragment_FightPet_7.description: A key product created through collaboration between Tianzhang Pavilion and Niners Heavy Machinery. Its main goal is said to be investing R&D toward the universalization of Madam Qinglong's partner pets.
fragment_FightPet_7.source: Collect 20 shards to fuse the smart servant, Zongyun. Any surplus can be used to advance the smart servant.

fragment_FightPet_8.name: Leia Smart Servant Shard
fragment_FightPet_8.description:
"The 'Ultimate Weapon' series manufactured by Xiling Alliance Co. Ltd., model γ1O-A. Xiling is the sole smart servant supplier to Hykros and is part of the Hykros-Domain 9 Smart Servant Committee. Founded by Ms. Shelly and Ms. Ling Qiao, two of this century's greatest female engineers, the company launched its first mass-produced smart servant in small batches within just a month of its founding. The company is mainly known for its research and production of smart servants, related products, and merchandise. As it moves into the future, the company is focusing more on vertical integration by forming deep connections with famous brands, such as Ultimate Warriors, and creating an original commercial complex. If you're interested in investing, please contact us at * * * - * * * *.
To meet new needs in combat, the Smart Servant Combat Module test has been conducted."
fragment_FightPet_8.source: Collect 20 shards to fuse the smart servant, Leia. Any surplus can be used to advance the smart servant.

fragment_FightPet_9.name: Aurawolf Smart Servant Shard
fragment_FightPet_9.description: A next-generation smart servant developed by Ling Qiao, based on the legends of Domain 9. Its combat module has been tested in response to new combat requirements.
fragment_FightPet_9.source: Collect 20 shards to fuse the smart servant, Aurawolf. Any surplus can be used to advance the smart servant.

fragment_FightPet_10.name: Snowy Smart Servant Shard
fragment_FightPet_10.description: A tiger-themed smart servant that leaves ice crystals in her path. The combat module has been tested in response to new combat requirements.
fragment_FightPet_10.source: Collect 20 shards to fuse the smart servant, Snowy. Any surplus can be used to advance the smart servant.
