fashion_decoration_28_4.description: If sheep go to heaven, where do goats go?

fashion_decoration_29_4.name: White Gauze Eye Mask
fashion_decoration_29_4.description: Originally used as a medical eye mask, it somehow began to be worn as a fashion accessory. Can it really make you look cooler?

fashion_decoration_31_4.name: Black Eye Band
fashion_decoration_31_4.description: A black silk eye cover to guarantee a good night's sleep. Both pleasant and practical, it's one of the most popular accessories for Wanderers. Duplicates are converted to 100 dark crystals and 20,000 gold.

fashion_decoration_32_4.name: Particle Lens
fashion_decoration_32_4.description: Features an ultra-high-performance microcomputer to take photos based on visual distance and intraocular imaging, as well as analyze the composition and structure of all objects before you. Duplicates are converted to 100 dark crystals and 20,000 gold.

fashion_decoration_33_4.name: Windchaser Hairband
fashion_decoration_33_4.description: A fashionable hairband that is very popular in Banges. Sporting a simple shape as well as unique patterns and colors, this item sold out as soon as it hit the shelves.

fashion_decoration_34_4.name: Admiral's Shades
fashion_decoration_34_4.description: Originally made for seafarers, these shades suddenly became popular in Banges due to their unique shape and color, and later a symbol of high fashion.

fashion_decoration_35_bilibili.name: ACE Eye Mask
fashion_decoration_35_bilibili.description: Have you ever been blinded by love?

fashion_decoration_36_haoyou.name: Swimmer's Eye Mask
fashion_decoration_36_haoyou.description: Have you ever been blinded by love?

fashion_decoration_37_jiuyou.name: Series 9 Eye Mask
fashion_decoration_37_jiuyou.description: Have you ever been blinded by love?

fashion_decoration_38_oppo.name: Progressive Professor
fashion_decoration_38_oppo.description: Are you my test subject for today?

fashion_decoration_39_huawei.name: White Gauze Eye Mask
fashion_decoration_39_huawei.description: Originally used as a medical eye mask, it somehow began to be worn as a fashion accessory. Can it really make you look cooler?

fashion_decoration_40_tap.name: TapTap Monocle
fashion_decoration_40_tap.description: It's all blue in front of your eye.

fashion_decoration_43_4.name: Disguise Sunglasses
fashion_decoration_43_4.description: So long as I'm wearing these sunglasses, no one seems to recognize me... Why is that?

fashion_decoration_44_4.name: Steel Lizard Mask
fashion_decoration_44_4.description: I can't explain this to you, because I'm merely just a steel lizard hatchling.

fashion_decoration_47_4.name: Bubblegum
fashion_decoration_47_4.description: We've already secured it, so don't be afraid of blowing too much and breaking it.

fashion_decoration_48_4.name: Rolled Whistle
fashion_decoration_48_4.description: An affordable childhood memory toy. A lovely addition to parties as well.

fashion_decoration_50_4.name: Orange Eyepiece
fashion_decoration_50_4.description: It's capable of many things such as blocking impacts, analyzing battlefield data, protecting you from flashbangs, and more.

fashion_decoration_51_4.name: Pacifier
fashion_decoration_51_4.description: In this day and age, who out of all people isn't a baby?

fashion_decoration_52_4.name: Toot-Toot
fashion_decoration_52_4.description: A decorative face mask that was once popular in Mirroria. Spread the cuteness!

fashion_decoration_53_4.name: Nothing Happened
fashion_decoration_53_4.description: A decorative face mask that was once popular in Mirroria. Blushes hidden no longer!

fashion_decoration_54_4.name: Pile
fashion_decoration_54_4.description: A decorative face mask that was once popular in Mirroria. This model is said to be the best-selling one.

fashion_decoration_55_4.name: Seal
fashion_decoration_55_4.description: A decorative face mask that was once popular in Mirroria. The two colors on it suggest the conflict of dual personalities.

fashion_decoration_56_4.name: Construct
fashion_decoration_56_4.description: A decorative face mask that was once popular in Mirroria. This face mask is in fact, a disguise for body components.

fashion_decoration_57_4.name: Hush
fashion_decoration_57_4.description: A decorative face mask that was once popular in Mirroria. Hush... Only silence from here on out now.

fashion_decoration_58_4.name: Cloak
fashion_decoration_58_4.description: A decorative face mask that was once popular in Mirroria. Conceal your true feelings of the moment.

fashion_decoration_64_4.name: Electric Wave Mask
fashion_decoration_64_4.description: Due to the influence of unknown electric waves, one can't help but put on this mask. It's time to set off in search of your own kind!

fashion_decoration_65_4.name: Monocle of Truth
fashion_decoration_65_4.description: Lies, hypocrisies, crimes... All these beautiful falsehoods are exposed through this glass.

fashion_decoration_66_4.name: Starry Glasses
fashion_decoration_66_4.description: I'm the brightest star in the kindergarten!

fashion_decoration_67_4.name: Radiant Glasses
fashion_decoration_67_4.description: Hot-selling glasses popular among entertainment venues in Mirroria. Supposedly can identify the songs being played and display their titles on the lens. That is just too cool!

fashion_decoration_68_4.name: Hanging Silk
fashion_decoration_68_4.description: There are always some tiny little things with no good values other than being watched.

fashion_decoration_69_4.name: Amplification Goggles
fashion_decoration_69_4.description: Looks familiar... Am I able to see the world in her eyes?

fashion_decoration_70_4.name: Grapes Bubblegum
fashion_decoration_70_4.description: Smells like grapes on the breath.

fashion_decoration_71_4.name: Sunshine Pacifier
fashion_decoration_71_4.description: Vibrant little sun! Grow up quickly!

fashion_decoration_73_4.name: Fisherman's Glasses
fashion_decoration_73_4.description: Will I be more sensitive to the movement of fish once I put these glasses on?

fashion_decoration_75_4.name: Rock Helmet Mask
fashion_decoration_75_4.description: They are used to hiding all emotions.

fashion_decoration_76_4.name: Fawn Mask
fashion_decoration_76_4.description: Who's the pure and harmless fawn?

fashion_decoration_77_4.name: Deep Sea Shark
fashion_decoration_77_4.description: Listen carefully to the call of the deep sea and never refrain from diving into the future unknown.

fashion_decoration_78_4.name: Voice of Myth
fashion_decoration_78_4.description: You have received an interesting radio transmission! It's time to find out what's going on!

fashion_decoration_79_4.name: Proof of Nakya
fashion_decoration_79_4.description: A beautiful red headband, a proof of valor obtained by defeating Abyssant: Nakya.

fashion_decoration_80_4.name: Woofie Mask
fashion_decoration_80_4.description: Who wouldn't like such a cute woofie?

fashion_decoration_81_4.name: Hovering Scanner
fashion_decoration_81_4.description: Capable of scanning the surrounding area in real-time and providing alerts when danger is nearby.

fashion_decoration_82_4.name: Inlaid Gold Ornament
fashion_decoration_82_4.description: A phoenix-inspired ornament, meticulously crafted using ancient inlaid gilding techniques. When resonating with timestamp energy, it begins to hover and sway gracefully.

fashion_decoration_83_4.name: Nightmareguard Vizard
fashion_decoration_83_4.description: A mask that has been recast from Zhuyan's vizard. It's said that the wearer can negate bad omens.

fashion_decoration_86_4.name: Ring of Gluttony
fashion_decoration_86_4.description: An accessory made out of Taotie's armor. Wear it by electromagnetic adsorption.

fashion_decoration_87_4.name: Silver Beach
fashion_decoration_87_4.description: Summer sun is great, but you should keep those UV rays out of your eyes somehow.

fashion_decoration_88_4.name: Ring of Enlightenment
fashion_decoration_88_4.description: An honor from Hykros, it recognizes the Diamond Mentors who have provided the most assistance to novices!

fashion_medal_Test.name: Hovering Scanner
fashion_medal_Test.description: Capable of scanning the surrounding area in real-time and providing alerts when danger is nearby.

fashion_medal_1.name: Bygone Phantasm Star
fashion_medal_1.description: A Commemorative Medal made of Diamonds, with the emblem of Bygone Phantasm in the middle. A reward exclusively for the first place player in a single Bygone Phantasm season.

fashion_medal_2.name: Gold Phantasm Medal
fashion_medal_2.description: A Commemorative Medal made of pure gold, with the emblem of Bygone Phantasm in the middle. A reward exclusively for the second place player in a single Bygone Phantasm season.

fashion_medal_3.name: Silver Phantasm Medal
fashion_medal_3.description: A Commemorative Medal made of fine silver, with the emblem of Bygone Phantasm in the middle. A reward exclusively for the third place player in a single Bygone Phantasm season.

fashion_medal_4.name: Star of Enlightened Mentor
fashion_medal_4.description: Its brilliant starry decorations, a symbol of the Diamond Mentor's status, serve as an accolade for their assistance to others.

fashion_medal_5.name: Star of Bright Mentor
fashion_medal_5.description: Its shiny golden starry decorations, a symbol of the Gold Mentor's status, serve as an accolade for their assistance to others.

fashion_medal_6.name: Star of Splendid Mentor
fashion_medal_6.description: Its shimmering silver starry decorations, a symbol of the Silver Mentor's status, serve as an accolade for their assistance to others.

fashion_medal_7.name: Origin of War Star
fashion_medal_7.description: A Commemorative Medal made of Diamonds, with the emblem of Origin of War in the middle. A reward exclusively for the first place player in a single Origin of War season.

fashion_medal_8.name: Gold Origin Medal
fashion_medal_8.description: A Commemorative Medal made of pure gold, with the emblem of Origin of War in the middle. A reward exclusively for the second place player in a single Origin of War season.

fashion_medal_9.name: Silver Origin Medal
fashion_medal_9.description: A Commemorative Medal made of fine silver, with the emblem of Origin of War in the middle. A reward exclusively for the third place player in a single Origin of War season.

fashion_glider_2_4.name: Orion
fashion_glider_2_4.description: Tired of the Jetpack's look? It's time to add something new to your flight experience!

fashion_glider_3_4.name: Overwatcher
fashion_glider_3_4.description: The journey you once embarked on, and the places you struggled to reach have now become the scenery that you can overlook with a peaceful mind. And the next step is...

fashion_glider_4_4.name: Whitewing Meteor
fashion_glider_4_4.description: A new product from Hykros's Aerodynamics Research Lab. This Jetpack can only be obtained through limited means.

NPF_Energy.name: Fractured Energy
NPF_Energy.description: Fractured energy that can only be used to charge suppressors temporarily.

Item_Gem_001.name: Black Nucleus
Item_Gem_001.description: A dark sphere naturally generated by the unknown influence of Omnium. It glows with a faint purple light, which seems to contain a certain amount of energy.
Item_Gem_001.source: For buying weapons with Special Order

Item_Gem_002.name: Black Nucleus
Item_Gem_002.description: A dark sphere naturally generated by the unknown influence of Omnium. It glows with a faint purple light, which seems to contain a certain amount of energy.
Item_Gem_002.source: For buying selected weapons with black nucleus Special Order.

Item_Gem_003.name: Gold Nucleus
Item_Gem_003.description: A dark sphere, naturally generated by the unknown influence of Omnium. It emits dazzling orange light, indicating that it contains colossal energy.
Item_Gem_003.source: Apply to the purchase of selected weapons with Gold Nucleus Special Order (not usable for Limited Orders).

Item_Gem_004.name: Red Nucleus
Item_Gem_004.description: A dark sphere, naturally generated by the unknown influence of Omnium. It shines with an ominous scarlet light. One can only imagine the tremendous power contained within it.
Item_Gem_004.source: Apply to order weapons with Limited Orders.

Item_Gem_umbrella_fire.name: Red Nucleus: Blazing Whirlpool
Item_Gem_umbrella_fire.description: A dark sphere, naturally generated by the unknown influence of Omnium. It shines with an ominous scarlet light. One can only imagine the tremendous power contained within it.
Item_Gem_umbrella_fire.source: Applies to <Orange>Blazing Whirlpool</> weapon Limited Orders only.

Item_Gem_yulan_ice.name: Red Nucleus (Kind Fist)
Item_Gem_yulan_ice.description: A dark sphere, naturally generated by the unknown influence of Omnium. It shines with an ominous scarlet light. One can only imagine the tremendous power contained within it.
Item_Gem_yulan_ice.source: Applies to <Orange>Kind Fist</> weapon Limited Orders only.

Item_Gem_Zeke_physic.name: Red Nucleus: Shadows of the Past
Item_Gem_Zeke_physic.description: A dark sphere, naturally generated by the unknown influence of Omnium. It shines with an ominous scarlet light. One can only imagine the tremendous power contained within it.
Item_Gem_Zeke_physic.source: Applies to <Orange>Shadows of the Past</> weapon Limited Orders only.

Item_Gem_mimi_thunder.name: Red Nucleus: Dragonhorn
Item_Gem_mimi_thunder.description: A dark sphere, naturally generated by the unknown influence of Omnium. It shines with an ominous scarlet light. One can only imagine the tremendous power contained within it.

Item_Gem_feise_fire.name: Red Nucleus: Elegance & Poise
Item_Gem_feise_fire.description: A dark sphere, naturally generated by the unknown influence of Omnium. It shines with an ominous scarlet light. One can only imagine the tremendous power contained within it.
Item_Gem_feise_fire.source: For <Orange>Elegance & Poise</> Weapon Limited Orders only.

Item_Gem_Linghan_ice.name: Red Nucleus: All Swords as One
Item_Gem_Linghan_ice.description: A dark sphere, naturally generated by the unknown influence of Omnium. It shines with an ominous scarlet light. One can only imagine the tremendous power contained within it.
Item_Gem_Linghan_ice.source: For <Orange>All Swords as One</> Weapon Limited Orders only.

Item_Area2Medicine.name: Anesthetic
Item_Area2Medicine.description: A powerful anesthetic that can render even an elephant comatose with a relatively small dose. A must for surgeons.
Item_Area2Medicine.source: Used for Searching the Depths mission.

Item_PermanentEnergy.name: Mighty Mushroom
Item_PermanentEnergy.description: It contains a huge amount of Omnium essence. Permanently increase max endurance by 25 when consumed.
Item_PermanentEnergy.source: Permanently increase max endurance by 25 when consumed.

Item_bag2.name: 2-Slot backpack expansion device
Item_bag2.description: A portable Omnium storage attachment device.
Item_bag2.source: Permanently increase backpack capacity by 2 slots.

Item_bag4.name: 4-Slot backpack expansion device
Item_bag4.description: A portable Omnium storage attachment device.
Item_bag4.source: Permanently increase backpack capacity by 4 slots.

Item_bag6.name: 6-Slot backpack expansion device
Item_bag6.description: A portable Omnium storage attachment device.
Item_bag6.source: Permanently increase backpack capacity by 6 slots.

Item_q203030_001.name: Custom X-30
Item_q203030_001.description: Myers commissioned outside help to customize this new device. Has a strange shape that most ordinary people cannot comprehend.
Item_q203030_001.source: Used for the Tech Fanatic mission.

Item_q103006.name: Brand New Chip
Item_q103006.description: A brand new chip. Suspected to be Melo's lost language chip.
Item_q103006.source: Used for the Chip Search mission.

Item_q103011_1.name: Hanna's Supplies
Item_q103011_1.source: Supplies hidden away in a hurry. You can return them to Hanna on Cetus Island (-571, -911).

Item_q103011_2.name: Hanna's Supplies
Item_q103011_2.source: Supplies hidden away in a hurry. You can return them to Hanna on Cetus Island (-571, -911).

Item_q103011_3.name: Hanna's Supplies
Item_q103011_3.source: Supplies hidden away in a hurry. You can return them to Hanna on Cetus Island (-571, -911).

Item_q103011_4.name: Hanna's Supplies
Item_q103011_4.source: Supplies hidden away in a hurry. You can return them to Hanna on Cetus Island (-571, -911).

makeup_BackHair_000.name: Misty Rapids
makeup_BackHair_000.description: They say this is a hero's special hairstyle. I think they might be right.

makeup_BackHair_001.name: Eri
makeup_BackHair_001.description: Victory and defeat are determined before the fight even begins.

makeup_BackHair_002.name: Marie
makeup_BackHair_002.description: Say you need my help and I'll try my best to help you.

makeup_BackHair_003.name: Cena
makeup_BackHair_003.description: Whenever you're in danger, I will save you.

makeup_BackHair_004.name: Chiho
makeup_BackHair_004.description: Do you need my help? I won't give up on my friends that easily.

makeup_BackHair_005.name: Chiaki
makeup_BackHair_005.description: Even after I am gone, the beating of my heart will live on.

makeup_BackHair_006.name: Ruka
makeup_BackHair_006.description: Don't delude yourself. I couldn't care less about you! I didn't intend to do that!

makeup_BackHair_007.name: Matthew
makeup_BackHair_007.description: An awe-inspiring heart, shining brightly with pride.

makeup_BackHair_008.name: Rinka
makeup_BackHair_008.description: Just you wait... I'll take care of them in no time!

makeup_BackHair_009.name: Valter
makeup_BackHair_009.description: H-Hello... Oh, I just wanted to come and see you, that's all.

makeup_BackHair_010.name: Shirayuki
makeup_BackHair_010.description: Never give in to fate. Your life is in your hands.

makeup_BackHair_011.name: Moka
makeup_BackHair_011.description: Erm... Can you stay longer with me?

makeup_CenterHair_001.name: Leah
makeup_CenterHair_001.description: Your enemy is my enemy. I will be a trenchant sword for you to wield forevermore.

makeup_CenterHair_002.name: Mizuki
makeup_CenterHair_002.description: I want to be stronger... I don't want to be too weak to fight against all the things I hate in the world, anymore!

makeup_CenterHair_003.name: Elly
makeup_CenterHair_003.description: I don't like the way I am now. I just want you to remember how I used to be.

makeup_CenterHair_004.name: Carleen
makeup_CenterHair_004.description: No matter what suffering we must endure, I will always be with you.

makeup_CenterHair_005.name: Maeve
makeup_CenterHair_005.description: I've made it this far—don't slow me down anymore, okay?

makeup_CenterHair_006.name: Kiyohime
makeup_CenterHair_006.description: Even if no one else does, you understand me, right?

makeup_CenterHair_007.name: Chika
makeup_CenterHair_007.description: Don't give in to the cowardice in your heart! Go all out, for the sake of the mission!

makeup_ForeHair_000.name: White Rose
makeup_ForeHair_000.description: I used to dream of saving the world, but reality soon crushed those foolish ideals.

makeup_ForeHair_001.name: Fafner
makeup_ForeHair_001.description: No matter how powerful the enemy is, I will bring them down! Wait and see!

makeup_ForeHair_002.name: Vivian
makeup_ForeHair_002.description: All my life I suffered for my faith, but now I am finally free.

makeup_ForeHair_003.name: Camilla
makeup_ForeHair_003.description: There is no world in which one can live without faith. Please pray for redemption!

makeup_ForeHair_004.name: Shalltear
makeup_ForeHair_004.description: The perfect way to solve any problem is to take out everyone in your way. Don't you agree?

makeup_ForeHair_005.name: Flandre
makeup_ForeHair_005.description: This is not fate's doing—this is what we have chosen.

makeup_ForeHair_006.name: Rachel
makeup_ForeHair_006.description: I just want to protect my friends. I don't have the energy to worry about anyone else.

makeup_ForeHair_007.name: Julija
makeup_ForeHair_007.description: The truth is clear at a mere glance. If you choose to move on, I will choose to accompany you.

makeup_ForeHair_008.name: Yarreck
makeup_ForeHair_008.description: The more I indulge in pleasure, the more clearly I see that the world is falling apart.

makeup_ForeHair_009.name: Eve
makeup_ForeHair_009.description: I would like to dedicate my life to the world... to use it to maintain peace.

makeup_ForeHair_010.name: Elisha
makeup_ForeHair_010.description: The dark night sky needs not the blazing sun, but the gentle shining stars.

makeup_ForeHair_011.name: Elektra
makeup_ForeHair_011.description: To witness humanity's victory... I will live forever!

makeup_ForeHair_012.name: Louise
makeup_ForeHair_012.description: If no one else wants to, I'll try my best to fight alongside you.

makeup_ForeHair_013.name: Lucia
makeup_ForeHair_013.description: No matter how distant your dream is, try your best to make it come true!

makeup_ForeHair_014.name: Kaoru
makeup_ForeHair_014.description: Let me whisper something to you... I like you the best!

makeup_Hair_000.name: Glazed
makeup_Hair_000.description: A heart like steel and eyes like crystals—invincible across countless battlefields.

makeup_hair_001.name: Flow
makeup_hair_001.description: Mist ripples like water, promising endless friendship.

makeup_Hair_002.name: Seafoam Twintails
makeup_Hair_002.description: A hairstyle popular in Innars. Despite being difficult to style, it is still loved by many.

makeup_Hair_003.name: Yuzu
makeup_Hair_003.description: Is your heart still resolute? Do your eyes still shine with the faith you once had?

makeup_Hair_004.name: Sena
makeup_Hair_004.description: That night, I saw your eyes shining like stars.

makeup_Hair_005.name: Kali
makeup_Hair_005.description: It is thanks to my faith that I've made it this far.

makeup_Hair_006.name: Carleen
makeup_Hair_006.description: I want to end my enemies with one blow... I want to be the strongest in the world.

makeup_Hair_007.name: Reika
makeup_Hair_007.description: A noble temperament can never be restrained.

makeup_Hair_008.name: Jean
makeup_Hair_008.description: Where the sun cannot shine, I seek to cast a ray of light.

makeup_Hair_009.name: Sella
makeup_Hair_009.description: The way they live is the embodiment of beauty and strength.

makeup_Hair_010.name: Rondo
makeup_Hair_010.description: A long poem written haphazardly on a music score.

makeup_Hair_011.name: Seafoam Twintails
makeup_Hair_011.description: A hairstyle popular in Innars. Despite being difficult to style, it is still loved by many.

makeup_Hair_012.name: Cloudcomb Embroidery
makeup_Hair_012.description: Hairstyle specially made up to compliment traditional-style clothing.

makeup_Hair_013.name: Windswept Beginnings
makeup_Hair_013.description: The stronger the sea breeze, the sassier the hair! If we don't take salt into account...

makeup_Eyeball_000.name: Sabbah
makeup_Eyeball_000.description: No matter how similar our experiences are, our perspectives will always remain unique.

makeup_eyeball_001.name: Holy Word
makeup_eyeball_001.description: Please forgive this fickle world. I am willing to dedicate myself to you alone.

makeup_Eyeball_002.name: Snake Eyes
makeup_Eyeball_002.description: Eyes filled with danger and excitement also flicker with temptation.

makeup_Eyeball_003.name: Tranquility
makeup_Eyeball_003.description: Looking up, I can see the night sky, empty like an abyss, and I can feel your quiet presence around me.

makeup_Eyeball_004.name: Pallid
makeup_Eyeball_004.description: Resentment, damnation, and discontent. Evil is in the eyes of the beholder.

makeup_Eyeball_005.name: Heart-shaped
makeup_Eyeball_005.description: Cherish all you meet, and hope for world peace. Isn't that everyone's dream?

makeup_Eyeball_006.name: Heterochromia
makeup_Eyeball_006.description: Two colors, each representing a different facet of the soul.

makeup_Eyeball_008.name: Circles
makeup_Eyeball_008.description: Stare into my eyes too long and you might feel dizzy.

makeup_Eyeball_009.name: Crosses
makeup_Eyeball_009.description: Are these the eyes of the faithful, or the eyes of one completely devoid of faith?

makeup_Eyeball_010.name: Corona
makeup_Eyeball_010.description: When the sun loses its light, your eyes will replace it.

makeup_Eyeball_011.name: Otherworld
makeup_Eyeball_011.description: Fear the unknown, or sink into its bewitching gaze.

makeup_Eyeball_012.name: Tamamo
makeup_Eyeball_012.description: I want to see you carefree and happy, and I want to spoil you rotten!

makeup_Eyeball_013.name: Deep Sea
makeup_Eyeball_013.description: Eyes from the ocean depths, brooding and restrained, yet full of hope for the future.

makeup_Eyeball_014.name: Kitty
makeup_Eyeball_014.description: They say a cat can dilate its pupils whenever it wants. Come and give it a try!

makeup_Eyeball_018.name: Sweet Rose
makeup_Eyeball_018.description: Some say these contact lenses are the same kind as someone extremely famous, but no one dares to verify.

makeup_Eyeball_020.name: The Overlap
makeup_Eyeball_020.description: One must differentiate between the layers of truth and illusions.

makeup_Eyeball_021.name: Anomaly
makeup_Eyeball_021.description: Becoming an anomaly is also a choice.

makeup_Eyeball_022.name: Light Year
makeup_Eyeball_022.description: Even the light in your eyes is out of reach.

makeup_Eyeball_023.name: Night Sky
makeup_Eyeball_023.description: The quiet and deep night sky gazes down at everyone.

makeup_Eyeball_024.name: Shine For You
makeup_Eyeball_024.description: Are the stars in your eyes the anticipation for your dreams, or the blooming of a beautiful idea?

makeup_Eyeball_025.name: Scorching Flame
makeup_Eyeball_025.description: Give everything you have and burn brightly.

makeup_Eyeball_026.name: Amber
makeup_Eyeball_026.description: May everyone in the world be so transparent.

makeup_Eyebrow_000.name: Crescent Tip
makeup_Eyebrow_000.description: They say people with eyebrows like this are smart, and passionate too.

makeup_eyebrow_001.name: Aging Beauty
makeup_eyebrow_001.description: I'm still beautiful... Don't you agree?

makeup_Eyebrow_002.name: Invisible
makeup_Eyebrow_002.description: In a way, it's still visible.

makeup_Eyebrow_004.name: Straight Line
makeup_Eyebrow_004.description: It's very simple—just a straight line.

makeup_Eyebrow_005.name: Chang'e
makeup_Eyebrow_005.description: Look like a goddess, every day.

makeup_Eyebrow_006.name: Black Jade
makeup_Eyebrow_006.description: Such brows should look demure and weak... So, why do they look so strong?

makeup_Eyebrow_007.name: Rolling Hills
makeup_Eyebrow_007.description: As thick as mountains, and as green as hills.

makeup_Eyebrow_008.name: Willow Leaves
makeup_Eyebrow_008.description: Curved eyebrows that look like willow leaves.

makeup_Eyebrow_009.name: River Bend
makeup_Eyebrow_009.description: Like fine flowing water, gentle and pure.

makeup_Eyebrow_010.name: Bright Eyes
makeup_Eyebrow_010.description: Do you feel the allure of my eyes?

makeup_Eyebrow_011.name: Feathered Jade
makeup_Eyebrow_011.description: Warm and steady, and as gentle as a feather.

makeup_Eyebrow_012.name: Flat Peaks
makeup_Eyebrow_012.description: Be flat and simple, just like these eyebrows.

makeup_Eyebrow_013.name: Glaring Eyes
makeup_Eyebrow_013.description: They may look ordinary, but no one knows how deep their anger goes.

makeup_Eyelash_000.name: Moon Princess
makeup_Eyelash_000.description: Like the moonlight—neither dazzling nor cold.

makeup_eyelash_001.name: Deep Sea
makeup_eyelash_001.description: Like the deep sea, they have their own story and the tenderness of a majestic whale.

makeup_Eyelash_002.name: Izumi
makeup_Eyelash_002.description: Like the deepest streams and clearest springs, transparent and refreshing, and embracing all things with grace.

makeup_Eyelash_003.name: Morning Mist
makeup_Eyelash_003.description: Like the morning dew, delicate but ephemeral.

makeup_Eyelash_004.name: Peacock
makeup_Eyelash_004.description: A proud glance belies an insincere heart.

makeup_Eyelash_005.name: Splendor
makeup_Eyelash_005.description: The tenderness of spring, the brightness of summer, the mellowness of autumn, and the freshness of winter—all in one pair of eyes.

makeup_Eyelash_006.name: Fawn
makeup_Eyelash_006.description: Even when frightened, the fawn's hopeful heart shines through.

makeup_Eyelash_007.name: Peach Blossom
makeup_Eyelash_007.description: Smile with your eyes and squint them into two crescent moons. Now, isn't that attractive?

makeup_Eyelash_008.name: Eyes of the Times
makeup_Eyelash_008.description: They all say these are dead fish eyes, but these are the eyes of the times!

makeup_Eyelash_009.name: Raindrops
makeup_Eyelash_009.description: Wherever these eyes cast their gaze, all will be well.

makeup_Eyelash_011.name: Dragon
makeup_Eyelash_011.description: Eyes of the divine, filled with silent dignity.

makeup_Eyelash_013.name: Prominent Brow
makeup_Eyelash_013.description: These ordinary eyes still seem to wind people up.

makeup_Eyelash_014.name: Mandarin Duck
makeup_Eyelash_014.description: Loving eyes, reminding you not to fall into a trap of empty pleasure.

makeup_Eyelash_015.name: Heron
makeup_Eyelash_015.description: Why do these terrifying eyes look so very gentle?

makeup_Eyelash_016.name: Willow Leaves
makeup_Eyelash_016.description: Eyes full of sadness, showing compassion for all living beings.

makeup_Eyelash_017.name: Mischievous Glance
makeup_Eyelash_017.description: Don't stare at me like that. I'll behave.

makeup_Eyelash_018.name: Wide-eyed
makeup_Eyelash_018.description: Wide eyes that stare like little bells.

makeup_Eyelash_019.name: Raised Brow
makeup_Eyelash_019.description: Don't look at me like that! I'll give you whatever you want! Here—take my wallet!

makeup_Eyelash_020.name: Almond
makeup_Eyelash_020.description: Clear, pure eyes that radiate a sense of innocence and simplicity.

makeup_Eyelash_027.name: Vicissitudes
makeup_Eyelash_027.description: The more you experience, the less you feel.

makeup_Eyelash_028.name: Plain Dealer
makeup_Eyelash_028.description: There is no trace of scheming at all in those honest eyes.

makeup_Eyelash_029.name: Under Control
makeup_Eyelash_029.description: You are about to ask, "How do you know what is on my mind?"

makeup_Eyelash_030.name: Heartfelt Gaze
makeup_Eyelash_030.description: Till the end of time his eyes will remain locked with yours.

makeup_Eyelash_031.name: Smart One
makeup_Eyelash_031.description: Did you say idiot? Who's an idiot? Who?

makeup_Eye_000.name: Rainbow
makeup_Eye_000.description: Eyes that reflect the colors of the rainbow.

makeup_eye_001.name: Gray
makeup_eye_001.description: These eyes can see through the gloomy gray world.

makeup_Eye_002.name: Black
makeup_Eye_002.description: They say that these are the eyes of death...

makeup_Eye_003.name: Dark
makeup_Eye_003.description: These eyes can see through the very essence of darkness!

makeup_Eye_004.name: Red
makeup_Eye_004.description: Amid the bloody mist, these eyes have not yet lost their desire for life.

makeup_Eye_005.name: Clear
makeup_Eye_005.description: Clear and simple eyes. How can anyone refuse them?

makeup_Eye_006.name: Silver
makeup_Eye_006.description: Eyes imprinted with a maiden's prayers. Can you answer them?

makeup_Eye_007.name: Colorful
makeup_Eye_007.description: You can see the colors of happiness in these eyes.

makeup_Eye_008.name: R
makeup_Eye_008.description: Just like the sky above, sometimes clear and bright, other times dark and dull.

makeup_Eye_009.name: White
makeup_Eye_009.description: They say you can see hell through these eyes.

Item_Area2BangithFood.name: Half-finished Cafeteria Food
Item_Area2BangithFood.description: All products like this are the same. How could anyone think you can't afford it?

TestFindPath.description: Use it and then find the path.

TestOpenUI.description: Use it and then open the page.

Item_q203041_001.name: Broken Suppressor
Item_q203041_001.description: An item found while searching for Una, the scout who encountered the Ravagers. Spattered with bloodstains and badly worn. The word "Una" is faintly visible on its surface.
Item_q203041_001.source: Used for the Search for Una mission.

Mount_Strengthen_2_5.name: Multitasking Core
Mount_Strengthen_2_5.description: A multitasking core that can significantly boost data processing efficiency.

Item_q203045_001.name: Supply Box
Item_q203045_001.description: The supply box stolen from the Hyenas' camp for the blacksmith, containing fuel, rare ore, and smelting catalysts, among other items. Severely worn, only the letters "S" and "F" can be vaguely recognized.
Item_q203045_001.source: Used for Repairing the Omnium Guards mission.

Item_q203045_002.name: Titanium Driveshaft
Item_q203045_002.description: Titanium driveshaft used to repair Omnium Guards. Perfect for powering an armor's locomotion functions.
Item_q203045_002.source: Used for Repairing the Omnium Guards mission.

Item_q203048_001.name: X-II Armor Booster
Item_q203048_001.description: Mobility device used to repair Omnium Guards. Can be used with various types of armor.
Item_q203048_001.source: Used for Repairing the Omnium Guards mission.

Item_q103036_1.name: Mistbloom
Item_q103036_1.description: Mistbloom, a plant native to Raincaller Island, produces a huge mass of mist once its juice is compressed, making it an essential material for smoke bombs.
Item_q103036_1.source: Used for the Suppressive Fire mission.

Item_q103036_2.name: Smoke Bomb
Item_q103036_2.description: Hanna uses the Mistbloom juice to make a smoke bomb that produces a huge mass of smoke when thrown to block the enemy's vision.
Item_q103036_2.source: Used for the Suppressive Fire mission.

Item_q103042_1.name: Unknown Device
Item_q103042_1.description: Equipment stolen by the Ravagers. Appears to have no definite functionality on the surface.
Item_q103042_1.source: Used for Reap the Rewards mission.

makeup_face_001.name: Boiling Blood
makeup_face_001.description: What's wrong? Looking for a fight? No one messes with me!

makeup_face_002.name: Wound
makeup_face_002.description: This is the proof of your might!

makeup_face_003.name: Crescent Moon
makeup_face_003.description: This crescent moon is the proof of my genius. What I'm saying is, I'm really smart.

makeup_face_004.name: Gushing Love
makeup_face_004.description: I can't describe my love for you, but I can show it.

makeup_face_005.name: Meatball
makeup_face_005.description: This shows that our little cutie loves me! Don't you feel jealous?

makeup_face_006.name: Plaster
makeup_face_006.description: Let's get this party started! Let's do this together!

makeup_face_007.name: Vigorous
makeup_face_007.description: This is a sign of health, and of my optimism.

makeup_face_008.name: Wild Side
makeup_face_008.description: Whether going up a tree or down a river, I can handle it all! It's just in my nature!

makeup_face_009.name: Teardrop
makeup_face_009.description: From now on, sadness no longer needs to be expressed in words.

makeup_face_010.name: Unseasoned
makeup_face_010.description: Don't you dare look down on me by my appearances! I'm really strong!

makeup_face_011.name: Crimson
makeup_face_011.description: I only blush when it's hot... It has nothing to do with you! Don't misunderstand me!

makeup_face_012.name: Blush
makeup_face_012.description: Do you think I look cute?

makeup_face_013.name: Vermilion
makeup_face_013.description: Do you believe in reincarnation? They said that a mole on your face can record the tales of your previous life.

makeup_face_014.name: Simple and Honest
makeup_face_014.description: Don't feel down... The freckles on your face are really cute!

makeup_face_015.name: Vanish
makeup_face_015.description: A mark is as indelible as memory.

makeup_face_016.name: Ruthless
makeup_face_016.description: Fate prints cruel marks on your face.

makeup_face_017.name: Commoner
makeup_face_017.description: Rich in folk flavor, and suitable for those who are exposed to the elements all year round!

makeup_face_018.name: Noble
makeup_face_018.description: A decoration resembling a royal emblem. Go forth, brave adventurer!

makeup_face_019.name: Hunter
makeup_face_019.description: Whether hunter or prey, there is only a thin line between life and death.

makeup_face_020.name: Guard
makeup_face_020.description: Engrave your determination to protect those you love upon you.

makeup_face_021.name: Machinery
makeup_face_021.description: Is this... a screw here? You mean, you're an android!?

makeup_face_022.name: Kitty Cat
makeup_face_022.description: Learn how to meow with me!

makeup_face_023.name: Panda
makeup_face_023.description: All you need now is some bamboo.

makeup_face_024.name: Piglet
makeup_face_024.description: So what if it looks kinda silly? As long as it's cute...

makeup_face_025.name: Tenacious
makeup_face_025.description: These marks are proofs that I have given my all in battle.

makeup_face_026.name: Kiss of Stars
makeup_face_026.description: If we could keep the high spirits at its peak moment...

makeup_face_027.name: No. 1
makeup_face_027.description: All you need is one sticker to make you look trendy. No. 1 reporting!

makeup_face_028.name: No. 2
makeup_face_028.description: All you need is one sticker to make you look trendy. No. 2 reporting!

makeup_face_029.name: No. 3
makeup_face_029.description: All you need is one sticker to make you look trendy. No. 3 reporting!

makeup_face_030.name: No. 4
makeup_face_030.description: All you need is one sticker to make you look trendy. No. 4 reporting!

makeup_face_031.name: No. 5
makeup_face_031.description: All you need is one sticker to make you look trendy. No. 5 reporting!

makeup_face_032.name: Heirs of Aida
makeup_face_032.description: All you need is one sticker to make you look trendy. You won't wear this to Hykros, right?

makeup_face_033.name: Steering Wheel
makeup_face_033.description: All you need is one sticker to make you look trendy. It looks like a certain emblem from afar.

makeup_face_034.name: Wheel
makeup_face_034.description: All you need is one sticker to make you look trendy. One must admit it looks a little like a manhole cover.

makeup_face_035.name: Tunnel
makeup_face_035.description: With this collection of facial markings, all you need is one sticker to make you look trendy and highlight your beauty.

makeup_face_036.name: Stage
makeup_face_036.description: All you need is one sticker to make you look trendy. Thin geometric lines.

makeup_face_037.name: Fork in the Road
makeup_face_037.description: All you need is one sticker to make you look trendy. Divide the triangle into three equal parts.

makeup_face_038.name: Pile
makeup_face_038.description: All you need is one sticker to make you look trendy. Simple but not dull.

makeup_face_039.description: All you need is one sticker to make you look trendy.

makeup_face_040.name: Corner
makeup_face_040.description: One of the new stickers launched in Mirroria by the popular brand, MYSTERY. Going down this road shall eventually bring you back to square one.

makeup_face_041.name: Spikey Spike
makeup_face_041.description: One of the new stickers launched in Mirroria by the popular brand, MYSTERY. Sharp all-round.

makeup_face_042.name: Toast
makeup_face_042.description: One of the new stickers launched in Mirroria by the popular brand, MYSTERY. I desire the entire milky way.

makeup_face_043.name: Interruption
makeup_face_043.description: One of the new stickers launched in Mirroria by the popular brand, MYSTERY. Communication interrupted, please try again later.

makeup_face_044.description: One of the new stickers launched in Mirroria by the popular brand, MYSTERY. We are no different from you guys.

makeup_face_045.name: Crossroad
makeup_face_045.description: One of the new stickers launched in Mirroria by the popular brand, MYSTERY. Say farewell now.

makeup_face_046.name: Bend
makeup_face_046.description: One of the new stickers launched in Mirroria by the popular brand, MYSTERY. You'll always come across sudden diversions.

makeup_face_047.name: Extension Cord
makeup_face_047.description: One of the new stickers launched in Mirroria by the popular brand, MYSTERY. An extension line that peers into the future

makeup_face_048.name: Dash
makeup_face_048.description: One of the new stickers launched in Mirroria by the popular brand, MYSTERY. A sharp turn for the worse.

makeup_face_049.name: Cheelu
makeup_face_049.description: One of the new stickers launched in Mirroria by the popular brand, MYSTERY. A sharp turn for the worse. Twist, turn, and snap.

makeup_face_050.name: Alert
makeup_face_050.description: One of the new stickers launched in Mirroria by the popular brand, MYSTERY. Do not gently approach that fine night.

makeup_face_051.name: Buzz
makeup_face_051.description: One of the new stickers launched in Mirroria by the popular brand, MYSTERY. The mind and the body resonate as one.

makeup_face_052.name: Bright Light
makeup_face_052.description: One of the new stickers launched in Mirroria by the popular brand, MYSTERY. Chasing a little firefly.

makeup_face_053.name: Tribal Mark
makeup_face_053.description: It indicates some kind of... destiny.

makeup_face_054.name: Identification Code
makeup_face_054.description: Even using this marking won't make you one of them.

makeup_face_055.name: Peace Treaty
makeup_face_055.description: Are you sure it won't want to come after you even more because of this?

makeup_face_056.name: Scarlet Stamp
makeup_face_056.description: It leaves you with more than just profound "memories."

makeup_face_057.name: Mystic Butterfly
makeup_face_057.description: A symbol of Crew strength within the Fog Maze!

Item_q203050_001.name: Photo
Item_q203050_001.description: The highest place in the Northern Ring Ranges, overlooking the beautiful scenery of the Blue River and the Omnium Tower. A beautiful snapshot of a beautiful moment.
Item_q203050_001.source: Used for the Gorgeous Starry Sky mission.

Item_stamina_02.name: Vitality booster
Item_stamina_02.source: Increase max vitality by 20 and restore 20 vitality.

Item_birthdaycake.name: Birthday Cake
Item_birthdaycake.description: Serve it and say "happy birthday." Warm wishes are the icing on the cake.

Area2DogMeat.name: Fetid Beast Meat
Area2DogMeat.description: Food reserved for hounds. As unclean as it is malodorous.
Area2DogMeat.source: Used for Searching the Depths mission.

Item_chip_1.name: Type I Chip
Item_chip_1.description: A chip with special functions, developed by Banges Tech. It's said to be used for opening password chest I.

chip_interact_1.name: Type I Chip
chip_interact_1.description: A chip with special functions, developed by Banges Tech. It's said to be used for opening password chest I.

chip_interact_3.name: Type III Chip
chip_interact_3.description: A chip with special functions, developed by Banges Tech. It's said to be used for opening advanced password chests.

Item_chip_4.name: Type III Key
Item_chip_4.description: A special lockpick designed by the Department of Science and Technology of Mirroria. It uses specialized encryption parameters and can be used to unlock the advanced password chests in Vera.

chip_interact_4.name: Type III Key
chip_interact_4.description: A special lockpick designed by the Department of Science and Technology of Mirroria. It uses specialized encryption parameters and can be used to unlock the advanced password chests in Vera.
chip_interact_4.source: Vera advanced password chest activation chip

Item_chip_jiuyu_1.name: Signet I
Item_chip_jiuyu_1.description: A Tai Chi Chest decoder born from timestamp tech. Can be used to unlock Tai Chi Chests.
Item_chip_jiuyu_1.source: A signet used to activate Tai Chi Chests.

Item_chip_jiuyu_2.name: Signet II
Item_chip_jiuyu_2.description: A Tai Chi Chest decoder born from timestamp tech. Can be used to unlock Tai Chi Chests.
Item_chip_jiuyu_2.source: A signet used to activate Tai Chi Chests.

Item_chip_jiuyu_3.name: Signet III
Item_chip_jiuyu_3.description: A Tai Chi Chest decoder born from timestamp tech. Can be used to unlock Tai Chi Chests.
Item_chip_jiuyu_3.source: A signet used to activate Tai Chi Chests.

Item_BossInvasion_chip.name: Conquest Signet
Item_BossInvasion_chip.source: A special signet key produced by Zhen Gong. Can be obtained at Tianhe Bazaar. After defeating powerful enemies, you can use it to obtain higher-level rewards and resources.

Item_q104011.name: G-II Agent
Item_q104011.description: A drug used by Parliament to treat the strange disease afflicting the mine workers.
Item_q104011.source: Used for the Giggs the Rep mission.

item_q105016.name: Turbocharger
item_q105016.description: Used to repair the EM Blaster to break the ice on the Omnium Tower.

item_q105017.name: Component Pack
item_q105017.description: Used to repair the EM Blaster to break the ice on the Omnium Tower.
item_q105017.source: Used for Transport the Components mission.

item_MentorShipDiploma.name: Graduation Certificate
item_MentorShipDiploma.source: A memento for completing mentorship and graduating. It's a symbol of possessing strength that is sufficient to hold your ground alone, so it's time for a new challenge!

item_rewardquest_activity.name: Bounty EXP
item_rewardquest_activity.description: Made out of special metal and represents the contributions from the wanders of Aida to this planet. Worth endeavoring for.
item_rewardquest_activity.source: Gain Bounty EXP to raise Bounty level and receive more rewarding Bounty Missions.

Item_Mine_Area2Task.name: Refined Banges Ore
Item_Mine_Area2Task.description: A specialty of the Banges area. Cannot be refined by most ordinary people.

bookquest_item_001.name: Metal Scraps
bookquest_item_001.description: Rusty metal fragments that look warped and worn.

bookquest_item_002.name: Electronic Instrument Component
bookquest_item_002.description: An unknown electronic component. It is badly damaged. Completely unusable.

bookquest_item_003.name: Dilapidated Electronic Dog
bookquest_item_003.description: A mechanical pet dog exhibiting severe surface wear, though it is still in one piece.

bookquest_item_004.name: Diary Page
bookquest_item_004.description: The torn diary page found in the abandoned house in the fields. You can only make out one small paragraph.

item_q105025.name: Operation Outline: Part One
item_q105025.description: An operation outline written by the Heirs of Aida. You are unable to decipher the words on it.
item_q105025.source: Used for the Operation Outline mission

item_q105026.name: Laser Core
item_q105026.source: A key item for repairing the hovering cannon.

item_q1050151.name: Supply Box
item_q1050151.description: A supply box containing a variety of items.

item_q105061_1.name: Glacial Eel
item_q105061_1.description: The electric eels living in the glacier area are said to have fresh and tender meat that can quickly replenish your energy. You can use them to treat Zeke.
item_q105061_1.source: Used for Back to the Snowfield mission.

item_q105061_2.name: Frosted Berry
item_q105061_2.description: A kind of berry that grows near the glacier, and that is said to emit a bitter chill when consumed. Can be used to treat Zeke.
item_q105061_2.source: Used for Back to the Snowfield mission.

item_q105061_3.name: Frost Crystal
item_q105061_3.description: Crystals like this only form in extremely cold ice caves. Its effect is unknown. Can be used to treat Zeke.
item_q105061_3.source: Used for Back to the Snowfield mission.

Item_PermanentEnergy_2.name: Mighty Mushroom
Item_PermanentEnergy_2.description: Contain enormous Omnium essence. Permanently increase max endurance by 50 when consumed.
Item_PermanentEnergy_2.source: Permanently increase max endurance by 50 when consumed.

Item_q303003_1.name: Unknown Chip
Item_q303003_1.description: Claire gave you a new chip. Its specific function is unknown. Take it to Hopkins and exchange it for Melo's Chip.
Item_q303003_1.source: Used for the Melo's Upgrade Plan (III) mission.

Item_q303003_2.name: Melo's Chip
Item_q303003_2.description: Melo's language chip. Can restore Melo's language function.
Item_q303003_2.source: Used for the Melo's Upgrade Plan (III) mission.

Item_q303005_1.name: Astra Special Blend
Item_q303005_1.description: The specialty coffee of Astra Shelter. It seems to contain a hint of thornmato juice, giving it a strange taste.
Item_q303005_1.source: Used for The Doctor's Coffee (I) mission.

Item_q303005_2.name: Luhn Special Blend
Item_q303005_2.description: A special coffee invented by a Hykrosian named Luhn. Contains a hint of crimson petals, adding a certain sweetness.
Item_q303005_2.source: Used for The Doctor's Coffee (III) mission.

Item_q303005_3.name: Astra Special Blend Formula
Item_q303005_3.description: Outline how to brew Astra Special Blend.
Item_q303005_3.source: Used for The Doctor's Coffee (I) mission.

Item_q303005_4.name: Luhn Special Blend Formula
Item_q303005_4.description: Outline how to brew Luhn Special Blend.
Item_q303005_4.source: Used for The Doctor's Coffee (III) mission.

Item_q303005_5.name: Banges Special Blend
Item_q303005_5.description: This special coffee from Banges Port has the strange taste of stellar soda and potato powder.
Item_q303005_5.source: Used for The Doctor's Coffee (II) mission.

Item_q303005_6.name: Hykros Special Blend
Item_q303005_6.source: Ordinary coffee mixed with hazelnut powder and brewed using a special technique. Has a unique flavor.

Item_q303005_7.name: Banges Special Blend Formula
Item_q303005_7.description: Outline how to brew Banges Special Blend.
Item_q303005_7.source: Used for The Doctor's Coffee (II) mission.

Item_q303005_8.name: Hykros Special Blend Formula
Item_q303005_8.source: Outline how to brew Hykros Special Blend.

Item_q104022.name: Loose Ore
Item_q104022.description: Ore stolen by the Hyenas and scattered all over the ground.

item_q105032.name: Strange Note
item_q105032.description: A strange note. Its meaning is unclear for the time being.
item_q105032.source: A strange note. Its meaning is unclear for the time being.

item_q204300.name: Fresh Tomato
item_q204300.description: Tomatoes you gathered to help Bill before the farm get occupied by the Hyenas. It looks delicious.
item_q204300.source: Used for the Farmyard Fracas mission.

item_q105025_1.name: Operation Outline: Part Two
item_q105025_1.source: An operation outline written by the Heirs of Aida. You are unable to decipher the words on it.

bookquest7_obj5.name: Vehicle Component
bookquest7_obj5.description: An unknown part. It looks like it just fell here.

reward_q201100.name: Sugar Paper
reward_q201100.description: This appears to be something used to entertain children during the event. The event organizers must have missed it...

reward_q2030201.name: Commemorative Medal
reward_q2030201.description:
A commemorative medal awarded after winning multiple Hyena competitions. 
(Some words are engraved on the back: "Crafted by Banges Tech—creating a better future with you and for you.")

Recipe_Cooking_1002.name: Seaweed and egg soup
Recipe_Cooking_1002.source: Outlines how to cook <blue>seaweed and egg soup</>.

Recipe_Cooking_1003.name: Crispy grilled fish
Recipe_Cooking_1003.source: Outlines how to cook <blue>crispy grilled fish</>.

item_activity2_Love_106.name: Echo

item_activity2_Love_106.source: Use it for the Sweets Workshop event, which expires on March 4, 2022.

item_activity3_mould_1.name: Classic mooncake mold

During the event, open Vera password chests and Vera boss password chests, join Mirroria's racing event, participate in Fight the Landlord at Joy Square, play in the Entertainment Center's arcade, and make purchases from Frontier Logistics' terminal to obtain this item at random.
item_activity3_mould_1.source: Required material for making mooncakes during the Fortuitous Stockade event.

Item_PrimaryEnergy_1.name: Composite Energy
Item_PrimaryEnergy_1.description: Primary products of the energy collector, construction material in the Artificial Island region

Item_PrimaryEnergy_2.name: Energy Crystal Dust
Item_PrimaryEnergy_2.description: Miniature energy crystals which are generated when using a suppressor. Possesses slight recovery value.
Item_PrimaryEnergy_2.source: Can be exchanged for goods at the Crystal Dust Store.

Item_PrimaryEnergy_3.name: Energy Crystal Dust
Item_PrimaryEnergy_3.description: Miniature energy crystals which are generated when using a suppressor. Possesses slight recovery value.
Item_PrimaryEnergy_3.source: Can be exchanged for goods in the Crystal Dust Store after reaching Wanderer Level 40.

Item_PrimaryEnergy_4.name: Energy Crystal Dust
Item_PrimaryEnergy_4.description: Miniature energy crystals which are generated when using a suppressor. Possesses slight recovery value.
Item_PrimaryEnergy_4.source: Can be exchanged for goods in the Crystal Dust Store after reaching Wanderer Lv. 50.

Item_PrimaryEnergy_5.name: Spacetime Crystal Dust
Item_PrimaryEnergy_5.description: Crystal dust that escaped from the trajectory of spacetime. Seems to be able to affect the stability of spacetime fragments.
Item_PrimaryEnergy_5.source: Can be used to exchange goods in the Spacetime Store.

Item_PrimaryEnergy_6.name: Spacetime Crystal Fragments
Item_PrimaryEnergy_6.description: These fragments floating in the trajectory of spacetime operations are the products of the collapse of shattered spacetime.
Item_PrimaryEnergy_6.source: Can be used to exchange goods in the Spacetime Store.

Item_LifeCrystal.name: Life Crystal
Item_LifeCrystal.description: Dropped by creatures on the Artificial Island

Item_report_xsj_001.name: Research Report
Item_report_xsj_001.description: Dr. Henry of Hykros seems to know something about the lost research report.
Item_report_xsj_001.source: Dr. Henry of Hykros seems to know something about the lost research report.

Item_Area2BulidMaterials.name: Purification Filter
Item_Area2BulidMaterials.description: A device required for filtering water to meet drinking water standards.

Item_q103005_1.name: Disposable Omnium Battery
Item_q103005_1.description: A battery weapon given to you by Melo. It seems to be suitable for one use only. Used for repelling incoming Ravagers.

Rename.name: Identity Update Card
Rename.description: An identity update card secretly issued by Hykros. Can modify identity information after use.
Rename.source: Each card can only be used once.

Tower_xingyuan0.name: Depleted Astrum
Tower_xingyuan0.description: Depleted Astrum can be used to collect and store Astrum energy.

Title_1_2_9_1.name: Dr. Mega Brain
Title_1_2_9_1.description: Participate in the Crew Mega Brain Test and win first place.

Item_FixTool.name: Repair Tools
Item_FixTool.description: Precious tools used specifically to repair the wind turbine and maintain power generation.

Item_AssistContribution.name: Support points
Item_AssistContribution.description: Awarded to those who helped new Wanderers. Imprinted with an image for mutual support. Join Team Support System to get.
Item_AssistContribution.source: Can be exchanged for goods in the Support Store.

item_Regression_AssistContribution.name: Return Support Points
item_Regression_AssistContribution.description: Awarded to those who helped return Executors. Obtain by teaming up with returning Executors and participating in gameplay.
item_Regression_AssistContribution.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Store

Title_1_2_13_1.name: Flowing Melody
Title_1_2_13_1.description: Achieve 7,500 in note impact training proficiency.

Title_1_3_1_1.name: Commander
Title_1_3_1_1.description: Reach Commander rank in the Apex League.

Title_1_3_1_2.name: Star General
Title_1_3_1_2.description: Reach Star General rank in the Apex League.

Title_1_3_1_3.name: Battle Lord
Title_1_3_1_3.description: Reach Battle Lord rank in the Apex League.

Title_1_3_1_4.name: Grand Marshal
Title_1_3_1_4.description: Reach Grand Marshal rank in the Apex League.

Title_1_3_2_1.name: Gardener
Title_1_3_2_1.description: Kindergartens may not hold their own legends, but vegetable gardens do.

chat_qipao4.name: Together Time
chat_qipao4.description: What's most important is having fun with friends.

chat_qipao5.name: Holiday Fun
chat_qipao5.description: Why don't we spend the rare day off relaxing?

chat_qipao6.name: Crimson Clash
chat_qipao6.description: Speed up, crash, bombard, and explode.

chat_qipao7.name: Gifts Galore
chat_qipao7.description: Gifts left for you by a certain anonymous otter.

chat_qipao8.name: Elemental Aggregation
chat_qipao8.description: Man, the water core is running away again!

chat_qipao9.name: Frozen Past
chat_qipao9.description: Everything lies scattered and broken in the vast white snow.

chat_qipao10.name: Walking with Ene
chat_qipao10.description: Ene is a super fighting robot! That's what you want for a convoy!

chat_qipao11.name: Shelter of the Past
chat_qipao11.description: The breeze is a reminder of the past, yet a participant is missing.

chat_qipao12.name: Under the Thumb
chat_qipao12.description: You can run, but you can't hide from her.

chat_qipao13.name: Proud Blade
chat_qipao13.description: No mercy is the greatest respect she could give to foes begging under her blade.

chat_qipao14.name: Special permissions
chat_qipao14.description: "Freeze, scumbag! Give up now! Bang, bang!"

chat_qipao15.name: Path of the Seeker
chat_qipao15.description: The beautiful life of the past shall reemerge again.

chat_qipao16.name: Hanging amusement park
chat_qipao16.description: Cetus Island amusement park - have fun like never before!

chat_qipao18.name: Moon: Shining Shadow
chat_qipao18.description: May the moon's white light guide you through the dark.

chat_qipao20.name: Top Construction Team
chat_qipao20.description: Top Construction Team exclusive chat bubble

chat_qipao21.name: Dawn: First Light
chat_qipao21.description: The night is darkest before the dawn.

chat_qipao22.name: End of the Year
chat_qipao22.description: This warm lamp embodies thousands of wishes.

chat_qipao23.name: Love
chat_qipao23.description: Record your anxious feelings of love, bit by bit.

chat_qipao24.name: TYP 5
chat_qipao24.description: I won't deny my code name Nemesis, but my real name is, Shirli.

chat_qipao25.name: TYP 2
chat_qipao25.description: Why would you care about the form of the carrier? Getting the job done is the top priority here.

chat_qipao26.name: Past Days
chat_qipao26.description: Circumstances change with the passage of time, but some always remain the same.

chat_qipao27.name: Pawpaw Dreamscape
chat_qipao27.description: If sleep in the cozy Pawpaw House, a good dream is guaranteed.

chat_qipao28.name: Midnight Logic
chat_qipao28.description: At night, the peanuts are said to show some magical features—such as catching an otter that steals the food.

chat_qipao29.name: Pumpkin Party
chat_qipao29.description: Let's party all night long! And have a dream full of pumpkins.

chat_qipao30.name: Vanity of Life
chat_qipao30.description: Do robot Alf dream of electric dorayaki?

chat_qipao31.name: Set Off Again
chat_qipao31.description: Set sail once again and adventure with your partners in the unknown realm.

chat_qipao32.name: A Fighter's Notes
chat_qipao32.description: To improve my combat skills, I'm going to defeat a few more Steel Lizards!

chat_qipao33.name: Phantom in the Mirror
chat_qipao33.description: Whether it's fake or real, the phantom in the mirror was finally shattered.

chat_qipao34.name: Hide-and-Seek Winner
chat_qipao34.description: Not here? Not here either? I've gotta be the winner of this hide-and-seek game!

chat_qipao36.name: Affection Bubble
chat_qipao36.description: The things that I wanted to say are not just dream-talk.

chat_qipao37.name: Floating Paradise
chat_qipao37.description: There are lots of time to take a look around. Why not go to the fountain and make a wish first?

chat_qipao38.name: Dragon Boat Festival
chat_qipao38.description: Fragrance of mugwort, deep in thought.

chat_qipao39.name: Pure White Resonance
chat_qipao39.description: "The pure white core awakens. Now its power intertwines with ones with a heart of valor and justice! Resonate!"

chat_qipao40.name: The Doctor's Assistant
chat_qipao40.description: If only Hanna could do more for the doctor...

chat_qipao41.name: Summer Stream
chat_qipao41.description: Got your Jetboard ready? Let's ride the waves!

chat_qipao42.name: Summer Festival
chat_qipao42.description: Swimming in the pool happily, the fish must be celebrating the festival as well!

chat_qipao43.name: Crackling Sounds
chat_qipao43.description: The bustle of the bazaar comes from the crowds, music from the stalls, the grills, and the night-blooming...

chat_qipao44.name: Innocence
chat_qipao44.description: The characteristics are not completely gone but at least gone by half...

chat_qipao45.name: Fantasy Park
chat_qipao45.description: Exclusive to the Fantasy Park theme event in the Douliu Community.

chat_qipao46.name: Crimson Puzzle
chat_qipao46.description: Finally reaching sister's house after the ordeal, what awaits behind the door is... Sis and Mom?

chat_qipao47.name: Sweet Radiance
chat_qipao47.description: With a mouthful of the refreshing watermelon, even the wind feels a little cooler.

chat_qipao48.name: Refreshing Swim
chat_qipao48.description: Taking a shower after a swim feels clean and refreshing. All the fatigue seems to have been washed away as well.

chat_qipao49.name: Discipline Enforcement
chat_qipao49.description: Hey, you there, your skirt is too short! What? I don't care if you are the Class President!

chat_qipao50.name: Curious Cat
chat_qipao50.description: You can rest assured of her professional competence, but occasionally remind her to curb her overexuberant curiosity...

chat_qipao51.name: Full Moon
chat_qipao51.description: What a wonderful time! May we enjoy many years of Mid-Autumn moons.

chat_qipao52.name: Glimpse
chat_qipao52.description: If you go over the speed limit, Captain Fuwa will teach you a lesson...

chat_qipao53.name: Clock Hand
chat_qipao53.description: The moonlight melody is playing. The minute-hand turns rapidly.

chat_qipao54.name: Golden Fruits

chat_qipao56.name: Fisherman's Dignity
chat_qipao56.description: Mind you, you're talking to a master fisherman.

chat_qipao57.name: Sleep Aid Sequence
chat_qipao57.description: You've asked Mi-a to tell bedtime stories? She'll go on until dawn.

chat_qipao58.description: It's dangerous to try to uncover secrets that should remain a mystery, right?

chat_qipao_66.name: Dragon Fountain
chat_qipao_66.description: After the churning flames have snuffed out, new lands will be born in between.

chat_qipao_68.name: Adventure Memo

chat_qipao_69.name: In Memory of Company
chat_qipao_69.description: Go hand in hand toward the road ahead.

chat_qipao_70.name: Warm Winter's Night

chat_qipao_71.description: Please stay away from me as I said before.

chat_qipao_72.name: Rabbit Year, Luck is Near

chat_qipao_76.name: Brilliant Twilight Moon
chat_qipao_76.description: The sky glazes the sea in a new color.

chat_qipao_77.description: Having such similar tastes means you and I were meant to come together.

chat_qipao_78.name: Dangerous Words

chat_qipao_79.name: Reserved
chat_qipao_79.description: Even if I can't express myself fully, I want to improve, little by little.

chat_qipao_80.description: Crushing everything those lower beings cherish will be a piece of cake.

chat_qipao_81.name: Private Space
chat_qipao_81.description: A rift exclusively for you. Enjoy the solitude.

chat_qipao_82.name: Natural Chasm
chat_qipao_82.description: The wind tests the strength of the grass. Maple leaves redden the entire city.

chat_qipao_84.name: Banshu Escalade

chat_qipao_85.description: The sad wail is but a meaningless imitation, an instinctive cry.

chat_qipao_86.name: Brushed Spring Wind
chat_qipao_86.description: Hearing your words of wisdom, like a gentle breeze they come. A bond between two noble souls, refreshing as the spring sun.

bag_chat_qipao52.name: End-Track Giftbox

bag_chat_qipao71.name: Commitment Giftbox

bag_chat_qipao71.source: Use to receive the avatar frame Fanciful Dreamscape, avatar frame Commitment, and chat bubble Rose Thornvine.

M-sec 2000 Alyss will strike out in Platinum Armor!
Y-You sure this is how the line goes, Captain Fuwa?
bag_chat_qipao75.source: Use to receive the avatar Platinum Armor Strike, avatar frame Platinum Armor Trial, and chat bubble Nascent Wings.

bag_chat_qipao76.name: Combined Effort Giftbox

bag_chat_qipao78.name: Dangerous Words Giftbox
bag_chat_qipao78.description: Sweet nothings uttered to the ear become one.

bag_chat_qipao84.name: Micius Kite Giftbox

bag_chat_qipao84.source: Use to get the avatar Ling Qiao, avatar frame Micius Kite, and chat bubble Banshu Escalade.

bag_chat_qipao87.name: Scholar Giftbox

bag_chat_qipao87.source: Use to get the avatar Scholar, avatar frame Painting, and chat bubble Recitation.

bag_chat_qipao88.source: Use to get the avatar Vermilion Fairy, avatar frame Fairy's Dressing Case, and chat bubble Melodious Echo.

bag_chat_qipao89.name: Maple Girl Giftbox

bag_chat_qipao91.name: Old Friend Giftbox
bag_chat_qipao91.source: Use to get the avatar Old Friend, avatar frame Full Moon, and chat bubble Bright Evening Lights.

bag_chat_qipao97.source: Use to get the avatar Heartsong, avatar frame Vase, and chat bubble Virtual Chat.

bag_chat_qipao100.name: New Life Giftbox

bag_chat_qipao100.source: Use to get the avatar Nemesis: New Life, avatar frame Embracing New Life, and chat bubble Emerging New Life.

bag_chat_qipao101.name: Seaside Beauty Giftbox
bag_chat_qipao101.description: Dance with the sea, embracing with tenderness.
bag_chat_qipao101.source: Use to get the avatar Seaside Beauty, avatar frame Rugged, and chat bubble Icy Stroll.

bag_chat_qipao104.name: Giftbox
bag_chat_qipao104.description: Dance with the sea, embracing with tenderness.
bag_chat_qipao104.source: Use to get the avatar , avatar frame , and chat bubble .

bag_emoji_1.name: Tower of Fantasy Simulacrum Research I

bag_emoji_2.name: Tower of Fantasy Simulacrum Research II
bag_emoji_2.description: Are you looking at the waves? Or at me?
bag_emoji_2.source: Unlock an emote pack that contains 16 chat emotes from the following characters: Lan, Icarus, and Fiona.

bag_emoji_3.name: Tower of Fantasy Simulacrum Research III
bag_emoji_3.description: It's time for Lyra, Tian Lang, and Annabella to come home!

Title_1_3_1_6.description: Reach Elite rank in the Apex League.

Title_1_3_1_7.name: Sergeant
Title_1_3_1_7.description: Reach Sergeant rank in the Apex League.

MonthCard.name: Monthly pass

Area4TimeCapsule.description: An electronic notepad used for taking notes. Famous for its super standby mode.
Area4TimeCapsule.source: Used for the Gus's Discovery mission.

Area4Pretend.description: Not the most subtle work clothes... Wear them in the Crown Mines and risk being attacked by the Hyenas.
Area4Pretend.source: Used for the Righteous Disguise mission.

Item_WorldPuzzle_1.name: Console Components
Item_WorldPuzzle_1.description: Components designed to repair the console.

Item_WorldPuzzle_StrangeMine1.description: Shiny fragments that exude some kind of strange aura.
Item_WorldPuzzle_StrangeMine1.source: Doesn't the debris found near the ore pile seem a little different from ordinary ore?

Item_WorldPuzzle_StrangeMine2.name: Ore Extract
Item_WorldPuzzle_StrangeMine2.source: Used to start the conversion device.

Item_WorldPuzzle_JiuyuMine1.name: Dragonclaw Jade
Item_WorldPuzzle_JiuyuMine1.description: Made of jadestone and handcrafted into the shape of a dragonclaw by Master Mo, it has an unusual radiance flowing all over and can be used to repair the Draconic Tower.

Item_WorldPuzzle_JiuyuMine2.name: Dragontail Jade
Item_WorldPuzzle_JiuyuMine2.description: Made of jadestone and handcrafted to resemble a dragon's tail, it shows complicated craftsmanship and hints some kind of exquisite application method.

Item_WorldPuzzle_JiuyuMine3.name: Dragonbeard Jade
Item_WorldPuzzle_JiuyuMine3.description: Made of jadestone and handcrafted to resemble a dragon's whisker, it shows complicated craftsmanship and hints some kind of exquisite application method.

Item_WorldPuzzle_JiuyuMine4.name: Dragonhorn Jade (Left)
Item_WorldPuzzle_JiuyuMine4.description: Made of jadestone and handcrafted to resemble a dragon's horn, it shows complicated craftsmanship and hints some kind of exquisite application method.

Item_WorldPuzzle_JiuyuMine5.name: Dragonhorn Jade (Right)
Item_WorldPuzzle_JiuyuMine5.description: Made of jadestone and handcrafted to resemble a dragon's horn, it shows complicated craftsmanship and hints some kind of exquisite application method.

Item_ChargerBattery_SpecialAP.name: Charging Component
Item_ChargerBattery_SpecialAP.description: Used to replenish the energy of the Charging Tower.

Item_FireFly_Mist.name: Firefly
Item_FireFly_Mist.description: Glowing fireflies that seem to be of some use
Item_FireFly_Mist.source: Used to light up fog lamps on boats on the Artificial Island

Area4TimeCapsuleA.name: Luhn's Notebook
Area4TimeCapsuleA.description: An electronic notepad used for taking notes. Famous for its super standby mode.

Area4BranchMaterials.name: Transmission Bearing
Area4BranchMaterials.description: A basic transmission device used to reduce machinery wear.
Area4BranchMaterials.source: Used for the Amusement Park Maintenance mission.

Item_Guildconvene.name: Positioning Beacon
Item_Guildconvene.source: Can be used by Crewmates at deputy position and above.

Title_1_2_15_1.name: The Path of Balance
Title_1_2_15_1.description: Achieve 7,500 in gravity ball training proficiency.

AvatarFrame03.name: Shining Star
AvatarFrame03.description: Never envy anyone else's light—you are the most brilliant shining star!

AvatarFrame04.name: Leader of Astra
AvatarFrame04.description: He's the leader of Astra as well as a brother, just one of the countless ordinary folks wanting to protect their family.

AvatarFrame06.name: Pure Illusion
AvatarFrame06.description: "Don't you go anywhere, I'm not done playing yet!"

AvatarFrame07.name: Call of the Dead
AvatarFrame07.description: For your own safety, I don't think you should annoy the lady.

AvatarFrame08.name: Absolute Authority
AvatarFrame08.description: Her order is her will. There's no compromise in her missions.

AvatarFrame12.name: Tower's Core
AvatarFrame12.description: Hope or destruction? Different people hold different perspectives on it.

AvatarFrame13.name: Expert Creator
AvatarFrame13.description: Nobody can go back and redo the past, but you can create a new future from now on.

AvatarFrame14.name: SciFi World
AvatarFrame14.description: SciFi World December 2021 Issue Collaboration Exclusive Rewards.

AvatarFrame15.name: Assistant
AvatarFrame15.description: "Mi-a will send you back to Hykros with a drone if you are defeated."

AvatarFrame16.name: Hanging amusement park
AvatarFrame16.description: Cetus Island amusement park - have fun like never before!

AvatarFrame17.name: Champion Shopkeeper
AvatarFrame17.description: I don't want to be an Executor. I just wanna make dinner with you, Mi-a!

AvatarFrame18.name: Top Construction Team
AvatarFrame18.description: Every single drop of sweat and every single brick... I have to record every engineer's contribution to our construction efforts.

AvatarFrame19.name: Dawn: Morning Light
AvatarFrame19.description: The night is darkest before the dawn.

AvatarFrame20.name: Moon: Crossing Light
AvatarFrame20.description: May the moon's white light guide you through the dark.

AvatarFrame21.name: Peace and Joy
AvatarFrame21.description: The time has come to hang festive lanterns and welcome the coming spring.

AvatarFrame22.name: Tipsy
AvatarFrame22.description: Colorful dreams and intoxicating love, all in one piece of chocolate.

AvatarFrame23.name: Companion
AvatarFrame23.description: Part of the past has become a bubble in memory, but there are still things at hand that can be held tightly and never let go of.

AvatarFrame24.name: Outside Body
AvatarFrame24.description: Isn't it rather superficial to cast judgement on what life is or is not?

AvatarFrame26.name: Knight of Night
AvatarFrame26.description: A silent, vigilant guard, now protecting your machine pod.

AvatarFrame27.name: Pawpaw Treasure
AvatarFrame27.description: How many treasures did Smarty hide in the Pawpaw House? I'm curious.

AvatarFrame28.name: Pumpkin Night
AvatarFrame28.description: Pumpkins, pumpkins, pumpkins! I need more pumpkins!

AvatarFrame29.name: Memories
AvatarFrame29.description: Some things can remind us of our life before the Cataclysm.

AvatarFrame30.name: Gaze Mirroria
AvatarFrame30.description: Fantasies that span across the plane converge here.

AvatarFrame31.name: Steel Lizard Charge
AvatarFrame31.description: Lizards are also a type of dragon, so the Steel Lizard Charge is also a kind of dragon vehicle.

AvatarFrame32.name: Off-Balance Dancer
AvatarFrame32.description: Beneath the gorgeous skirt are crisis, mystery, and fear.

AvatarFrame34.name: Journey Nursery Rhyme
AvatarFrame34.description: Welcome back, Mi-a! Let's continue our journey.

AvatarFrame35.name: Cordate Jellybean
AvatarFrame35.description: Sweetness and love, all hidden in the small jellybeans.

AvatarFrame36.name: Naughty Trails
AvatarFrame36.description: Forget about all your anxieties and worries, and have a good time on Cetus Island!

AvatarFrame37.name: Aroma of Leaves
AvatarFrame37.description: Wrapped in jade and tied with rainbow, you chewy little pudding endearing like snow.

AvatarFrame38.name: Pure White Conversion
AvatarFrame38.description:
"Hey… do you think we can still win this one? The Violet Core is shattered. I guess we can't win this one. The enemy is too powerful."
"Regardless, I still have faith in the Violet Core and ourselves. I believe in the power of valor and justice."
"There's something strange about the Violet Core! Is that... a white light!?"

AvatarFrame39.name: Chief Park Ranger
AvatarFrame39.description: The maintenance of the park is complete! Dear customer, do you wanna join us for a ride?

AvatarFrame40.name: Salty Wave
AvatarFrame40.description: Beach, sand castle, aren't they the best matches for the salty soda?

AvatarFrame41.name: Summer Cool
AvatarFrame41.description: The fishtail swayed lightly, raising a trace of coolness in the heat.

AvatarFrame42.name: Sparkler Bouquet
AvatarFrame42.description: Compared with common bouquets, this exclusive festival decoration not only has sound effects and motion effects, but it also feels hot!

AvatarFrame43.name: Nurse Trainee
AvatarFrame43.description: They may not be experienced, but their sincere wish to help the Astra Shelter has made them shine.

AvatarFrame44.name: Fantasy Park
AvatarFrame44.description: Exclusive to the Fantasy Park theme event in the Douliu Community.

AvatarFrame45.name: Friend Astray
AvatarFrame45.description: Although she got lost on her way to her sister's cabin, she met two gentle but powerful knights and their elf companions.

AvatarFrame46.name: Watermelon Feast
AvatarFrame46.description: Should I slice it or cut it into chunks? Or maybe scoop it up with a spoon!?

AvatarFrame47.name: Attention of the Pool
AvatarFrame47.description: Even if unbeknownst to them, the gravitas of a celebrity is hard to hide...

AvatarFrame48.name: Responsibilities of a Disciplinarian
AvatarFrame48.description: I shall maintain the discipline of Mirroria School!

AvatarFrame49.name: Part-time Job
AvatarFrame49.description: You'll often see her sitting in Mirafleur Hall or at the Security Force entrance. However, in principle, she should stay at the Furnace Core Site, right?

AvatarFrame50.name: Carpe Diem
AvatarFrame50.description: Seize the day. You never know what will happen.

AvatarFrame51.name: Speed Chaser
AvatarFrame51.description: Lighting up your path to the future with my taillights!

AvatarFrame53.name: Annual Harvest
AvatarFrame53.description: Share your great harvest with friends.

AvatarFrame55.name: Fisherman's Honor
AvatarFrame55.description: It took the bait! Such a momentous occasion should be witnessed by everyone.

AvatarFrame56.name: Cleaning Sequence
AvatarFrame56.description: Mi-a cleans as efficiently as any sweeper droid!

AvatarFrame57.name: Blood Moon
AvatarFrame57.description: On a treacherous night such as this, it is not smart to stay outside. Please, guests... Return to the castle and rest.

AvatarFrame58.name: Windchaser
AvatarFrame58.description: Not even the driving gale can keep up with it.

AvatarFrame_60.name: Stylish Straw Hat
AvatarFrame_60.description: Wearing it, you can feel the passing breeze, and establish a deep friendship with your comrades. But there is no style at all. None whatsoever.

AvatarFrame_61.name: One Year of Joy
AvatarFrame_61.description: Get together with your friends and have a merry time.

AvatarFrame_62.name: Cake and Festivities
AvatarFrame_62.description: Otter has prepared a cake with great care. There are also many surprises!

AvatarFrame_63.name: Colorful Time
AvatarFrame_63.description: The collision of inspiration bursts into dreamy colors. Because of you, Mi-a becomes brilliant now.

AvatarFrame_64.name: Stars in the Sea
AvatarFrame_64.description: The ocean has been veiled in darkness for a long time. But, from that day on, lights suddenly began to light up within the void, one-after-another. Since then, the ocean has taken on a new, brighter look.

AvatarFrame_65.name: Dragon's Roar
AvatarFrame_65.description: The roaring dragon breathes fire and devours everything.

AvatarFrame_66.name: Of the Blue Realm
AvatarFrame_66.description: This is the sea, somewhere I call home.

AvatarFrame_67.name: Dream Adventure
AvatarFrame_67.description: You've proven to be the most amazing encounter. Happy Anniversary!

AvatarFrame_68.name: Consensus
AvatarFrame_68.description: The deal is carved in stone.

AvatarFrame_69.name: Reindeer & Bell
AvatarFrame_69.description: The melodic bell tones usher in the full season's blessings.

AvatarFrame_70.name: Commitment
AvatarFrame_70.description: That is our promise to each other.

AvatarFrame_71.name: Rabbit Rally
AvatarFrame_71.description: The New Year's Mi-a is a bunny, a sight so lovely!

AvatarFrame_72.name: Bunny Surprise
AvatarFrame_72.description: Let Dolly offer the first surprise of the new spring!

AvatarFrame_73.name: Primal Judgement
AvatarFrame_73.description: She doesn't care what means are used, as long as the goal is achieved.

AvatarFrame_74.name: Platinum Armor Trial
AvatarFrame_74.description:
"Don't be nervous, Alyss! Relax, don't be so tight!"
"Everybody's watching and waiting for the new form's performance data. I got to treat this seriously..."

AvatarFrame_76.name: Taste of Destiny
AvatarFrame_76.description: To capture a person's heart, you must first capture...

AvatarFrame_77.name: Looming Shadow
AvatarFrame_77.description: Which one of the two shadows is the true self?

AvatarFrame_78.name: Good Manners
AvatarFrame_78.description: Having proper etiquette and knowing what to say doesn't mean someone excels at socializing.

AvatarFrame_79.name: Rearrival
AvatarFrame_79.description: The body is just a vessel. I don't mind looking like this.

AvatarFrame_80.name: Surface Scanner
AvatarFrame_80.description: There are patterns within the void. Find and create orderly rifts to roam between dimensions.

AvatarFrame_81.name: The Wind and the Moat
AvatarFrame_81.description: Wind and waves rush past Domain 9, starting a new chapter.

AvatarFrame_82.name: Vermilion Auspicium
AvatarFrame_82.description: The vermilion flame emblem is one of the symbols of Ignisville.
