AvatarFrame_83.name: Micius Kite
AvatarFrame_83.description: The ingenuity of humans can rival the miracles of nature.

Avatar03.name: Shirli
Avatar03.description: Remember not to burn the food again!

Avatar04.name: Zeke
Avatar04.description: I want to spend my days with my family in peace and quiet, but that's just an unrealistic delusion in the last days.

Avatar05.name: Frigg
Avatar05.description: Perhaps she'd appreciate you if you weren't opposing her?

Avatar06.name: Nemesis
Avatar06.description: Are you Shirli or something else now?

Avatar08.name: Seele
Avatar08.description: The adorable appearance befits the playful cruelty.

Avatar09.name: Tata
Avatar09.description: A lazy smart servant who offers the help you need when necessary.

Avatar10.name: Happy New Year
Avatar10.description: I wanted to personally give this to you—a New Year's gift from Mi-a.

Avatar11.name: May All Go Well
Avatar11.description: I believe these are called "fireworks"...? I wonder if they would look nicer on your Jetpack...

Avatar12.name: Angel Frigg
Avatar12.description: She isn't a demon, after all.

Avatar13.name: Alf
Avatar13.description: Alf looks like a lucky cat! Could it bring me good luck if I hug it every day?

Avatar14.name: Peanut
Avatar14.description: The first-gen smart servant with outstanding performance. Your trustworthy friend.

Avatar16.name: Mad Dimon
Avatar16.description: Mad Dimon, a once-popular electric pet, is now your smart servant companion.

Avatar17.name: Tartarus
Avatar17.description: Its prototype was the most popular children's toy before the Cataclysm. Recently, its manufacturer has invented a brand new smart servant called "Tartarus."

Avatar18.name: Infernal Steel Lizard
Avatar18.description: What are you staring at? Taste my steel lizard tail!

Avatar19.name: Song of the Puppet
Avatar19.description: She was shouting, she was dancing, and she was sobbing.

Avatar20.name: Dolly
Avatar20.description: Dolly is unique to me, and I am unique to Dolly...

Avatar21.name: Mi-a's Dream
Avatar21.description: While asleep, does Mi-a dream about... me and Shirli?

Avatar22.name: Strawberry Afternoon
Avatar22.description: Why does the crow look like a desk?

Avatar23.name: Hanna
Avatar23.description: Welcome to Cetus Island! Let me show you around.

Avatar24.name: Sticky Rice Ball
Avatar24.description: Let me guess, am I holding a sweet dumpling or meat dumpling? Oh, I've got it right!

Avatar25.name: Pure White Core
Avatar25.description: Purple fades as white shines through. It's a new force that can light up the night sky.

Avatar27.name: Celebration Memories
Avatar27.description: Do you remember the funny things that happened at the Graceday Celebration, little goldfish?

Avatar28.name: Summer Celebration Mechanic
Avatar28.description: Testing the new entertainment equipment is for the celebration activities, while she adjusted herself through the celebration.

Avatar29.name: Fledgling
Avatar29.description: This is the first person you meet at the beginning of a new, clean slate journey.

Avatar30.name: Joy Ride
Avatar30.description: Little Red Riding Hood carefully prepared a basket full of snacks and went out to play with her sister!

Avatar31.name: Fruity Summer
Avatar31.description: The essential cooldown for a scorching summer! Mi-a can't resist sweet frozen watermelons!

Avatar32.name: Rare Holiday
Avatar32.description: She needs more rest than she thought. That's not a bad thing, is it?

Avatar33.name: Traveling Shirli
Avatar33.description: The last stop of the journey: Mirroria!

Avatar34.name: Saki Fuwa the Disciplinarian
Avatar34.description: Who would've thought that the anime fangirl at every limited-merch sale would be so strict at school!

Avatar35.name: Reliable Mechanic
Avatar35.description: At least, that's how she refers to herself...

Avatar36.name: End-Track
Avatar36.description: Ride like the wind! Passion is forever young.

Avatar38.name: I'm a fisherman
Avatar38.description: Fishing rods, hooks, lines, protection... and helmets. Why would someone wear a helmet when fishing? Ahem... Anyway, best to be prepared!

Avatar39.name: Chef Mi-a
Avatar39.description: Mi-a is currently executing food preparation sequence, please wait...

Avatar40.name: Puppet
Avatar40.description: No one has seen the face of the heir of Millet Castle. Why did she decide to make an appearance now?

Avatar42.name: Mighty Big Sister
Avatar42.description: Well, at least she used to be.

Avatar43.name: One Year of Company
Avatar43.description: Thank you for your company along the way.

Avatar44.name: Engraved Memories
Avatar44.description: Remember all the scenes along the way and every moment that we spent together.

Avatar45.name: Sunflower
Avatar45.description: Embrace the light and warmth, blooming a warm and brilliant beauty.

Avatar_46.name: Fantasy Trip
Avatar_46.description: Look back and feel the wonder of this adventure. Happy anniversary!

Avatar_47.name: Reindeer & Mi-a
Avatar_47.description: On nights when the winter snow falls, share gifts together with Mi-a!

Avatar_48.name: Fanciful Dreamscape
Avatar_48.description: Will that day come for Zhuque? Is it an extravagant dream or a palpable future?

Avatar_49.name: Rabbit Mi-a
Avatar_49.description: Mi-a has put on a new outfit, go ring in the new year!

Avatar_50.name: Bunny Unleashed
Avatar_50.description: Bunny is unleashed with bunny surprises to wish you a Happy New Year!

Avatar_51.name: Valkyrie
Avatar_51.description: Who knows what hides beneath her casual smile?

Avatar_53.name: Platinum Armor Strike
Avatar_53.description:
M-sec 2000 Alyss will strike out in Platinum Armor!
Y-You sure this is how the line goes, Captain Fuwa?

Avatar_54.name: Combined Effort
Avatar_54.description: Will you listen to me play the arpeggio and feel the dreamlike sea?

Avatar_56.name: Molinia
Avatar_56.description: She doesn't look like her older siblings, whom she admires very much. Maybe that's one reason why she's so self-conscious...

Avatar_57.name: Abyss Dominator
Avatar_57.description: Harrah? I like the name. As you wish, then...

Avatar_58.name: Scylla
Avatar_58.description: Roam through the rifts, sing in the void.

Avatar_59.name: Flaming Finch
Avatar_59.description: Red little balls that can be found everywhere.

Avatar_60.name: Ling Qiao
Avatar_60.description: I'm Ling Qiao from Niners Heavy Machinery. Leave the research and development commissions to me!

QuestItem_h202005.name: Seasoned Pasta
QuestItem_h202005.source: Said to be the favorite of a certain member of the Hyenas. Is this really alright?

Mount_005.name: Dust Wheeler
Mount_005.description: Crude and eye-catching. If it's presence and personality you're after, look no further. However, since someone noticed its antennae look like little feelers, everyone started to think it was rather cute, which in turn attracted more buyers. Duplicates are converted to 100 dark crystals and 20,000 gold.

Mount_006.name: Crimson Meteor
Mount_006.description:
Glamorous! Radiant! It's the brightest crimson star in your vehicle collection!
Note: Crimson Meteor cannot hit triple speed. Please drive carefully.

Mount_007.name: Mechbird
Mount_007.description:
The new vehicle designed and built by Cobalt-B that is both fun and practical.
Cobalt-B had some rather unique names planned, but the marketing department put the kibosh on it: an easy-to-remember name is a good name.

Mount_008.name: Aidan Knight
Mount_008.description: Although this motorcycle is small, it is wholly equipped. Low cost, energy-efficient, with sufficient storage space, it is not only an excellent choice for couriers, but has become popular among traveling merchants in recent years.

Mount_002_a.name: Magnetic Rod
Mount_002_a.description:
This is not for hanging clothes out to dry!

An abandoned tower in the Rusty Belt. Is someone trying to put something on it?

Mount_002_b.name: Maglev Stalker
Mount_002_b.description:
It's not a vacuum robot!

The Vermin Brothers' cherished possession and possibly a future table riser. Low-probability drop from the Vermin Brothers.

Low-probability drop from Venomfang: Echidna in Vera: Sandstorm Grounds, and from Venomfang: Medusa, Venomfang: Stheno, and Venomfang: Euryale in Vera: Quicksand Belt.

Mount_003_a.name: Omnium Beast: Cockpit
Mount_003_a.description:
A comfy cabin that jolts when moving?

The workers on the drilling rig probably missed something.

Mount_003_b.name: Omnium Beast: Left Arm
Mount_003_b.description:
An Omnium-powered left arm of the cyberbeast. Please remain in your cabin and do not ride on the arm.

A gift from Bai Ling for those proficient in puzzle-solving in the shelter.

Mount_003_c.name: Omnium Beast: Right Arm
Mount_003_c.description:
An Omnium-powered right arm of the cyberbeast. Please remain in your cabin and do not ride on the arm.

Behemoths wandering Banges, Navia, and Crown are probably equipped with it. Low-probability drop from Behemoth - Surtur, Behemoth - Bergelmir, Behemoth - Fárbauti, Behemoth - Mimir, and Behemoth - Utgarda.

Low-probability drop from Raging Horn: Sergey in Vera: Rock Pillar Gobi, and from Bugle: Garrette in Vera: Quicksand Belt.

Mount_011_a.name: Voyager Engine
Mount_011_a.description:
"Voyager exclusive!" the user manual warns in a bright font. But it's almost never seen with the component.

The workers on the drilling rig probably missed something.

Mount_011_b.name: Voyager Thruster
Mount_011_b.description:
Compact and versatile with all the essential parts... Actually, every part is essential.

The Four Powers in the Navia region could carry it. Low-probability drop from Four Powers - Okka, Four Powers - Hethlu, Four Powers - Smoli, and Four Powers - Sendyrs.

Low-probability drop from Blast Rock: Fafnir in Vera: Rock Pillar Gobi, and from Boom Rock: Tungchro in Vera: Quicksand Belt.

Mount_011_c.name: Voyager Control Station
Mount_011_c.description:
Control room for the Voyager. It compels you to shout "Onward!" for some reason.

The Heirs of Aida hid stuff in their stronghold on the dock.

Mount_011_d.name: Voyager Hull
Mount_011_d.description:
The first thing you'll want to do is give it a new paint job...

Hykros researchers would leave practical tools in the Ecological Stations in Navia.

Mount_004_a.name: Unicorn Power Core
Mount_004_a.description:
This vehicle engine is patent-pending, so no reverse engineering.

You might find something around the marvelous ore.

Mount_004_b.name: Unicorn Bionic Frame
Mount_004_b.description:
Hykros scholars once had a big fight over the material choice for bionics. The two sides submitted their own papers... So did the side with more papers win?

The dawn of new grounds for the Aida Bastion has come.

Mount_004_c.name: Unicorn Cyberlimbs
Mount_004_c.description:
"Cyberlimbs are cool!"... Wonder how many people that slogan will draw to buy the Monocross.

It's probably exhausting hauling boxes up the tower in Saag Passage.

Mount_004_d.name: Unicorn Head
Mount_004_d.description:
The head is armed with a defensive dagger, which is often treated as an accessory, hence the "Unicorn" moniker. I wonder how the creator feels about that.

Devotees of the Hyenas in the Crown region might carry it. Low-probability drop from Devotee Noah and Devotee Eber.

Low-probability drop from Gilded: Abela in Vera: Sandstorm Grounds, and from Sacred Gold: Carrandi in Vera: Rock Pillar Gobi.

Mount_013.description:
Complete the mission Franz's Gift to use.
A unique cube-shaped vehicle. Its built-in floating power unit allows it to move easily, even on bumpy roads. However, its flashy tape lights make it looks like a moving disco ball, and it is particularly obvious at night.

aige.name: Echo
aige.description: Good or bad? You be the judge.

bailing.name: Bai Ling
bailing.description: Could you stop looking at me like that? You're embarrassing me.

gulan.name: Cobalt-B
gulan.description: Through the blue cobalt glass, we can observe the actual color of the flame of burning metal.

hida.name: Hilda
hida.description: Move your body to the music by the sea. Let your thoughts drift with the waves to the other side.

kekelite.name: Cocoritter
kekelite.description: Sugar, stuffed toys, and all the sweet and gentle things in the world.

kelaodiya.name: Claudia
kelaodiya.description: Come to me if you need any help. I'll do my best.

king.description: I've been told millions of times that there's a fierce look in my eyes. Not sure how much these sunglasses will help with that.

ling.name: Zero
ling.description: Analyzing data. Please don't bother me for now.

saimier.name: Samir
saimier.description: There must be an unsolvable mystery, an endless road, and an unpredictable future.

sifengyuanyu.name: Tsubasa
sifengyuanyu.description: Her eyes wander because she's always on guard for the invisible dangers in the air.

peipei.name: Pepper
peipei.description: Wearing a smile at work is a demand she requires of herself.

wuwan.name: Crow
wuwan.description: As an entertainer, I certainly want your eyes on me all the time.

xiluo.name: Shiro
xiluo.description: Keep your distance and be patient. A gentle reminder: you might get attacked by the kitty claw if you stare at her for too long.

xiuma.name: Huma
xiuma.description: Like a blank piece of paper waiting for you to paint on it.

make.name: Marc
make.description: Every one of us is a unique creation.

baiyuekui.name: Bai Yuekui
baiyuekui.description: All sentient beings share the same pure and perfect spark essence of enlightenment.

Item_Mini_Echo01.name: Acoustic Module A-01
Item_Mini_Echo01.description: A part designed for a special sound-tracing system. Highly concealable.

Item_Mini_Echo02.name: Acoustic Module A-02
Item_Mini_Echo02.description: A part designed for a special sound-tracing system. Highly concealable.

Item_Mini_Echo03.name: Acoustic Module A-03
Item_Mini_Echo03.description: A part designed for a special sound-tracing system. Highly concealable.

item_sharephotocoin.name: Amusement park
item_sharephotocoin.description: Obtained by playing amusement facilities on the Cetus Island. Use them to exchange for Cetus Island exclusive rewards at Enfi on the island.
item_sharephotocoin.source: Exchange for Cetus Island exclusive rewards

SystemTreasureMap.name: Map
SystemTreasureMap.description: According to legend, there once was a hermit who spent his entire life in the wilderness of Domain 9. In his final years, he hid all of his treasures throughout the domain and marked their locations on a map so that they could be discovered by those chosen by fate.

SystemTreasureMap2.name: Map
SystemTreasureMap2.description: According to legend, there once was a hermit who spent his entire life in the wilderness of Domain 9. In his final years, he hid all of his treasures throughout the domain and marked their locations on a map so that they could be discovered by those chosen by fate.

SystemTreasureMap3.name: Map
SystemTreasureMap3.description: According to legend, there once was a hermit who spent his entire life in the wilderness of Domain 9. In his final years, he hid all of his treasures throughout the domain and marked their locations on a map so that they could be discovered by those chosen by fate.

Item_HopkinsOrder.name: Hopkins Order
Item_HopkinsOrder.description: Pass for participation in events like Lost Signal and Dreamscape Challenge.
Item_HopkinsOrder.source: Join the Hopkins Order Event and get it daily.

Title_1_6_1_1.name: Champion Shopkeeper
Title_1_6_1_1.description: Achieve 1,500 revenue in Aida Cafe to unlock

xinshoubuji.name: Rookie Supplies
xinshoubuji.source: Use to obtain the items in the Rookie Supplies, or receive tanium ×60 plus dark crystal ×60 if already obtained.

maoxianlibao.name: Adventure Pack
maoxianlibao.source: Use to obtain the items in the Adventure Pack, or receive tanium ×300 plus dark crystal ×300 if already obtained.

Item_q600410_Probe.name: Probe
Item_q600410_Probe.description: Device launched by Hykros into other dimensions

Title_1_4_2_1.name: Crown of Thorns
Title_1_4_2_1.description: Rank 1 on the server in Bygone Phantasm at the results tally.

Title_1_4_2_2.name: Heroic Trailblazer
Title_1_4_2_2.description: Rank 2 on the server in Bygone Phantasm at the results tally.

Title_1_4_2_3.name: Brave Trailblazer
Title_1_4_2_3.description: Rank 3 on the server in Bygone Phantasm at the results tally.

Title_1_4_2_4.name: Explorer
Title_1_4_2_4.description: Rank 4 or No.5 on the server in Bygone Phantasm at the results tally.

Title_1_4_2_5.name: Footsetter
Title_1_4_2_5.description: Rank 6–10 on the server in Bygone Phantasm at the results tally.

Title_1_4_2_6.name: Disruptor
Title_1_4_2_6.description: Rank 11–100 in Bygone Phantasm at the results tally.

Title_1_4_1_1.name: Crown of Stars
Title_1_4_1_1.description: Rank 1 on the server in Apex League at the results tally.

Title_1_4_1_2.name: Heroic Starchaser
Title_1_4_1_2.description: Rank 2 on the server in Apex League at the results tally.

Title_1_4_1_3.name: Brave Starchaser
Title_1_4_1_3.description: Rank 3 on the server in Apex League at the results tally.

Title_1_4_1_4.name: Rival
Title_1_4_1_4.description: Rank 4 or No.5 on the server in Apex League at the results tally.

Title_1_4_1_5.name: Challenger
Title_1_4_1_5.description: Rank 6–10 on the server in Apex League at the results tally.

Item_FireworkQuest_Mine.name: Fireworks Component
Item_FireworkQuest_Mine.description: Key component for fireworks. Give it to Slayer, and you're guaranteed to see fireworks. You'll only see them sometimes if you don't.

Item_firework.name: Black niter
Item_firework.description: A rare rock from Aida used for making fireworks and not much else.
Item_firework.source: Can be used to activate the fireworks scattered throughout Aesperia.

Item_Incarnation_01.name: Offering points
Item_Incarnation_01.description: Special tokens minted by Hykros to encourage collecting mana bio samples.
Item_Incarnation_01.source: Trade in mana bio samples for offering points that are redeemable for rewards in the Commissary.

Item_manasample.name: Mana bio sample
Item_manasample.description: Unknown biological sample. Store with caution.
Item_manasample.source: Submit mana bio samples for offering points that are redeemable for rewards in the Commissary.

Item_Gashapon_coin_01.name: Cetus Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_01.description: The gachapon coin that carries the best wishes of all the little Smart Servants on Cetus Island will definitely bring good luck!
Item_Gashapon_coin_01.source: Used for the event gachapon of the Cetus Carnival

Item_Gashapon_coin_02.name: Golden Sands Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_02.description: A gachapon coin engraved with a pyramid pattern, bringing the desert into the palm of your hand.
Item_Gashapon_coin_02.source: Used for the event gachapon of the Golden Sands.

Item_Gashapon_coin_03.name: Starry Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_03.description: A gachapon coin engraved with stars, bringing the music of the starry night to your ears.
Item_Gashapon_coin_03.source: Used for the event gachapon of the Wheel of Stars.

Item_Gashapon_coin_04.name: Fantasy Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_04.description: A fantasy gachapon coin. Hold it tight in your hand, so you know it's real.
Item_Gashapon_coin_04.source: Used for the event gachapon of the Wheel of Fantasy

Item_Gashapon_coin_05.name: Wormwood Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_05.description: A gachapon coin with the fragrance of wormwood. It makes for a good collectible probably.
Item_Gashapon_coin_05.source: Used for the event gachapon of the Wormwood's Aroma

Item_Gashapon_coin_06.name: Pure White Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_06.description: A gachapon coin that refracts the light from pure white core. This gachapon coin is also really... an ultimate one!
Item_Gashapon_coin_06.source: Used for the event gachapon of the Pure White

Item_Gashapon_coin_07.name: Seabreeze Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_07.description: A gachapon coin with the salty smell of the sea breeze. It's time to go on a vacation!
Item_Gashapon_coin_07.source: Used for the event gachapon of the Summer Seabreeze

Item_Gashapon_coin_08.name: Memories Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_08.description: Whenever you stop to look, memories come flooding in.
Item_Gashapon_coin_08.source: Used for the event gachapon of the Depths of Memory

Item_Gashapon_coin_09.name: Crimson Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_09.description: A magical item described in the picture book Crimson Tales. It's said to be chocolate-scented?
Item_Gashapon_coin_09.source: Used for the event gachapon of Crimson Ruby.

Item_Gashapon_coin_12.name: Remembrance Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_12.description: A gachapon coin that contains wonderful memories. The summer breeze blew away the youthful worries...
Item_Gashapon_coin_12.source: Used for The Best Years event gachapon

Item_Gashapon_coin_15.name: Pure White Gachapon Coin (Reissue)
Item_Gashapon_coin_15.description: A gachapon coin that refracts the light from pure white core. This gachapon coin is also really... an ultimate one!
Item_Gashapon_coin_15.source: Used for the Pure White (Reissue) event gachapon

Item_Gashapon_coin_16.name: Rosy Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_16.description: A special invitation from the costume party. The danger inside cannot be evaded.
Item_Gashapon_coin_16.source: Used for the Thorned Rose event gachapon.

Item_Gashapon_coin_22.name: Pure White Gachapon Coin (Winter Reissue)
Item_Gashapon_coin_22.description: A gachapon coin that refracts the light from pure white core. This gachapon coin is also really... an ultimate one!
Item_Gashapon_coin_22.source: Used for the Pure White (Winter Reissue) event gachapon.

Item_Gashapon_coin_29.name: Crimson Gachapon Coin (Reissue)
Item_Gashapon_coin_29.description: A magical item described in the picture book Crimson Tales. It's said to be chocolate-scented?
Item_Gashapon_coin_29.source: Used for the Crimson Ruby (Reissue) event gachapon.

Item_Gashapon_coin_34.name: Fantasy Gachapon Coin (Reissue)
Item_Gashapon_coin_34.description: A fantasy gachapon coin. Hold it tight in your hand, so you know it's real.
Item_Gashapon_coin_34.source: Used for the Wheel of Fantasy (Reissue) event gachapon.

Item_Gashapon_coin_35.name: Starry Gachapon Coin (Reissue)
Item_Gashapon_coin_35.description: A gachapon coin engraved with stars, bringing the music of the starry night to your ears.
Item_Gashapon_coin_35.source: Used for the Wheel of Stars (Reissue) event gachapon.

Item_Gashapon_coin_38.name: Pure White Gachapon Coin (Reissue III)
Item_Gashapon_coin_38.description: A gachapon coin that refracts the light from pure white core. This gachapon coin is also really... an ultimate one!
Item_Gashapon_coin_38.source: Used for the Pure White (Reissue III) event gachapon.

Item_Gashapon_coin_40.name: Crimson Gachapon Coin (Reissue II)
Item_Gashapon_coin_40.description: A magical item described in the picture book Crimson Tales. It's said to be chocolate-scented?
Item_Gashapon_coin_40.source: Used for the Crimson Ruby (Reissue II) event gachapon.

Item_Gashapon_coin_41.name: Seabreeze Gachapon Coin (Reissue)
Item_Gashapon_coin_41.description: A gachapon coin with the salty smell of the sea breeze. It's time to go on a vacation!
Item_Gashapon_coin_41.source: Used for the Summer Seabreeze (Reissue) event gachapon.

Item_Gashapon_coin_43.name: Golden Sands Gachapon Coin (Reissue)
Item_Gashapon_coin_43.description: A gachapon coin engraved with a pyramid pattern, bringing the desert into the palm of your hand.
Item_Gashapon_coin_43.source: Used for a Golden Sands (Reissue) event gachapon.

JiuYu_Gashapon_coin_1.name: AI R&D Contract I
JiuYu_Gashapon_coin_1.description: The materials utilized for each order are guaranteed, but due to the variance in workmanship, the product may not be a proper and whole smart servant. Development is not easy, so cherish the encounters you have with each and every smart servant.
JiuYu_Gashapon_coin_1.source: Voucher for issuing an order to a gachapon machine with a smart servant development function.

Item_PetGashaponCoin.name: Smart Servant Customization Contract
Item_PetGashaponCoin.description: A smart servant carefully crafted with the specified materials and strictly following the blueprints. Each and every one is an outstanding smart servant.
Item_PetGashaponCoin.source: Voucher for issuing an order to a gachapon machine with a smart servant development function.

Item_Enlightenment.name: Aidan Coin
Item_Enlightenment.description: Event Currency for Road of Strife
Item_Enlightenment.source: Participate in the Path of Enlightenment event to get it, which can be used to redeem rewards in the Event Store

Item_Enlightenment_02.name: Star scatter
Item_Enlightenment_02.description: Fine shards of stars that refract the light from outer space.
Item_Enlightenment_02.source: Participate in the Starcrossed Sky event to get it, which can be used to redeem rewards in the Event Store

Item_ChildrensDayCoin.name: Bubbles
Item_ChildrensDayCoin.source: Use to redeem rewards from the Event Store

Item_HiveJumpCoin_01.name: Enigmatic Badge
Item_HiveJumpCoin_01.description: The badge given to the HOTTA Studio's Enigmatic Lattice event participants. Come one, come all!
Item_HiveJumpCoin_01.source: Participate in the Enigmatic Lattice event to get it, which can be used to redeem rewards in the Store

Item_TowerDefenceCoin_01.name: Master Coin
Item_TowerDefenceCoin_01.description: An exquisitely designed badge. It represents great honor to warriors.
Item_TowerDefenceCoin_01.source: Participate in the Mega Master Arena event to get it, which can be used to redeem rewards in the Store.

Item_MegaGuruCoin.name: Master Coin
Item_MegaGuruCoin.description: An exquisitely designed badge. It represents great honor to warriors.
Item_MegaGuruCoin.source: Participate in the Mega Master Arena event to get it, which can be used to redeem rewards in the Store.

Item_SummerCoin_01.name: Heat Wave Coin
Item_SummerCoin_01.description: A token obtained from Graceday celebration in Banges Port. The passion of Banges's residents that handcrafted them still remains within them. As Graceday's official currency, they can be exchanged for rewards at the booths in all major markets.
Item_SummerCoin_01.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Event Store.

Item_SummerCoin_02.name: Heat Wave Coin
Item_SummerCoin_02.description: A token obtained from Graceday celebration in Banges Port. The passion of Banges's residents that handcrafted them still remains within them. As Graceday's official currency, they can be exchanged for rewards at the booths in all major markets.
Item_SummerCoin_02.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Event Store.

Item_SummerCoin_03.name: Bamboo Breeze Token
Item_SummerCoin_03.description: A commemorative token made of bamboo. Hold it in your hand and let it cool off the heat.
Item_SummerCoin_03.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Event Store.

Item_SummerCoin_04.name: Shell Coin
Item_SummerCoin_04.description: A token made from carving shells found at the beach. They serve as souvenirs of the summer beach event, and carry the sounds and smells of the sea with them wherever they go.
Item_SummerCoin_04.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Event Store.

Item_IceCrystalCoin.name: Ice Crystal
Item_IceCrystalCoin.description: Commemorative coins containing frost energy made from crystalline ore mined in extremely cold regions. Feels cold to the touch when you hold one. Some also use them as ice for their drinks.
Item_IceCrystalCoin.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Event Store.

Item_MowingCoin.name: Conflict Coupon
Item_MowingCoin.description: A coupon obtained from Conflict Frontline. Exquisitely crafted, it is embedded with an anti-counterfeit chip. Can be exchanged for rewards.
Item_MowingCoin.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Event Store.

Item_MidAutumnCoin_01.name: Juice
Item_MidAutumnCoin_01.description: The bottle is filled with sweet juice.
Item_MidAutumnCoin_01.source: Obtained from participating in the Fruit Escape event. Can be redeemed for rewards at the event store.

Item_JuiceCoin.name: Juice
Item_JuiceCoin.description: The bottle is filled with sweet juice.
Item_JuiceCoin.source: Obtained from participating in the Fruit Escape event. Can be redeemed for rewards at the event store.

Item_AutumnCoin_01.name: Golden Maple Token
Item_AutumnCoin_01.description: Tokens obtained by participating in the autumn activities at the garden party. They carry the unique fragrance of the garden.
Item_AutumnCoin_01.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Event Store.

Item_CountryDay_Coin.name: Rainbow token
Item_CountryDay_Coin.description: A token that is handed out during the carnival in Mirroria. The brilliant lights embedded in each one add a nice touch to the lively atmosphere, but it would have been nicer if they came with batteries that lasted longer...
Item_CountryDay_Coin.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Event Store.

Item_CountryDay_Coin_02.name: Lucky Money
Item_CountryDay_Coin_02.description: Welcome the new year. May you be healthy, wealthy, and lucky!
Item_CountryDay_Coin_02.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Event Store.

Item_Carp.name: Koi
Item_Carp.description: Its scales shine as the fish leaps over the dragon gate.
Item_Carp.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Event Store.

Item_HideAndSeekCoin_01.name: Camo Coin
Item_HideAndSeekCoin_01.description: Increase the value of the currency with camo technology... Something that's not supposed to be done!
Item_HideAndSeekCoin_01.source: Use to redeem rewards from the Hide and Seek Store.

Item_HideAndSeekCoin_02.name: Camo Coin
Item_HideAndSeekCoin_02.description: Increase the value of the currency with camo technology... Something that's not supposed to be done!
Item_HideAndSeekCoin_02.source: Use to redeem rewards from the Hide and Seek Store.

Item_SecretActionCoin.name: Ocean Chip
Item_SecretActionCoin.description: A custom chip that records information about the ocean and continuously updates with each submitted sample.
Item_SecretActionCoin.source: Used to redeem rewards from the Ecological Research Event Store.

Item_SystemTreasureMapCoin.name: Gift Voucher
Item_SystemTreasureMapCoin.description: There must be mysterious treasures hidden in the ocean, why else would there be many treasure-hunting legends?
Item_SystemTreasureMapCoin.source: Used to redeem rewards from The Lost Sea Event Store.

Item_SystemTreasureMapCoin_02.name: Trove Fountain
Item_SystemTreasureMapCoin_02.description: A coin minted from metal with a square hole at its center and a blue data stripe that stores the coin's minting information. It was once widely circulated in Domain 9 and is now being used as a souvenir that can be exchanged for rewards.
Item_SystemTreasureMapCoin_02.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Event Store.

Item_LaserBattleCoin.name: Penannular Jade
Item_LaserBattleCoin.description: Exquisitely crafted rare metal inlaid with a jade stone. Can be exchanged for items.
Item_LaserBattleCoin.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Event Store.

Item_ExplorationBookCoin.name: Green Beetle
Item_ExplorationBookCoin.description: A coin with an insect engraving. Legend has it that they fly back once they are spent, though no one knows where they fly to.
Item_ExplorationBookCoin.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Event Store.

Item_HalloweenPumpkin.name: Trick-or-Treat Pumpkin
Item_HalloweenPumpkin.description: A strange pumpkin of strange shape. Just one look at it will grant you the mysterious power to defeat your enemies.
Item_HalloweenPumpkin.source: Event Item for A Sweet Night of Horror

Item_HalloweenCoin_01.name: Cream Cookie
Item_HalloweenCoin_01.description: Covered in a snowflake-like cream, it's more filling than candy.
Item_HalloweenCoin_01.source: Item for the A Sweet Night of Horror event. It seems that the candy obtained by defeating the White Soul with the magic of friendship can be exchanged for rewards.

Item_HalloweenCoin_02.name: Crackling Hard Candy
Item_HalloweenCoin_02.description: Bulk candy that will crackle and pop in your mouth. Best to eat with your mouth closed.
Item_HalloweenCoin_02.source: Item for the A Sweet Night of Horror event. It seems that the candy obtained by defeating the White Soul with the magic of friendship can be exchanged for rewards.

Item_HalloweenCoin_03.name: Clown Lollipop
Item_HalloweenCoin_03.source: Item for the A Sweet Night of Horror event. It seems that the candy obtained by defeating the White Soul with the magic of friendship can be exchanged for rewards.

Item_HalloweenCoin_04.name: Soft Jelly Candy
Item_HalloweenCoin_04.description: This candy with a crisp coating and melted interior will fill you with happiness when you bite into it.
Item_HalloweenCoin_04.source: Item for the A Sweet Night of Horror event. It seems that the candy obtained by defeating the White Soul with the magic of friendship can be exchanged for rewards.

Item_FollowGhostCoin.name: Candy Apple
Item_FollowGhostCoin.description: Freshly harvested apples, coated with syrup and topped with nuts, perfect for children coming to trick-or-treat.
Item_FollowGhostCoin.source: Can be used to redeem rewards in the Store.

Item_Aida_token.name: Balance Token
Item_Aida_token.description: Has the current ecological environment stabilized?
Item_Aida_token.source: Event item. Can be redeemed for goods at the event store during the event

Item_Aida_token_02.name: Balance Token
Item_Aida_token_02.description: Has the current ecological environment stabilized?
Item_Aida_token_02.source: Event item. Can be redeemed for goods at the event store during the event

Item_Aida_photo_token.name: Encrypted Disk
Item_Aida_photo_token.description: A heavily encrypted disk with critical data. Maybe someone in Hykros can crack it...?
Item_Aida_photo_token.source: Activity item that can be used to exchange goods at the Keepsake Store during the event.

Item_SeizeFlagCoin_01.name: Star sand
Item_SeizeFlagCoin_01.description: The bottle is filled with childhood dreams.
Item_SeizeFlagCoin_01.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Event Store.

Mount_014.name: Heavy Engine
Mount_014.description: A batch of retro yet high-tech heavy engines reclaimed from the ruins of an auto plant. Lighthouse R&D's modifications enable them to speed over winding roads and counterstrike gorgers.

activation1.name: Activation Core I
activation1.description: A rare live bio-sample, with great research value.
activation1.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Event Store.

activation2.name: Revitalized Energy Body
activation2.description: Revitalized energy body from the defeated raiding target. It may be of great interest to the researchers at Hykros.
activation2.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Event Store.

Item_OrienteeringCoin_01.name: Pacemaker Emblem
Item_OrienteeringCoin_01.description: The emblem is given to the HOTTA Studio's Mirroria Tour event participants. Appreciate Mirroria's beauty from a whole new perspective.
Item_OrienteeringCoin_01.source: Can be used to exchange goods in the Mirroria Tour Event Store.

Item_OrienteeringCoin_02.name: Rumble Token
Item_OrienteeringCoin_02.description: Won in Rumble Racing and etched with hubcap patterns, these tokens are redeemable for prizes.
Item_OrienteeringCoin_02.source: Can be used to exchange goods in the Rumble Racing Store.

Item_OrienteeringCoin_03.name: Driftstone
Item_OrienteeringCoin_03.description: Floats in the water, flies in the air! Once, twice, three times... it bounces on the water until it takes flight toward the opposite bank!
Item_OrienteeringCoin_03.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Event Store.

Item_MorePlayerHarmonyCoin.name: Skill Commendation
Item_MorePlayerHarmonyCoin.description: For whose hands masterfully cut through the air, launching strikes like a musician crafts music, this commendation stands to honor their heroic bearing.
Item_MorePlayerHarmonyCoin.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Event Store.

item_GreatRegression_coin.name: Proof of Stellarway
item_GreatRegression_coin.description: Executors returning from the break, I hope all of you haven't forgotten how to fight, and better believe that all efforts shall be rewarded.
item_GreatRegression_coin.source: Can be exchanged for goods at the Stellarway Store.

hopkins1.name: Gold-backed card
hopkins1.description: Apparently accepted as currency at the Banges Black Market.
hopkins1.source: Obtain by joining the Hopkins order event

hopkins2.name: Proof of credit
hopkins2.description: You've got to win Hopkins' trust if you want the best goods from his Black Market. Prove yourself a worthy customer.
hopkins2.source: Obtain by joining the Hopkins order event

Mount006_1_Skin_01.name: Smoothie Meteor
Mount006_1_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Comes with free dessert coupons. Are you sure you don't want to try the new smoothie?
Mount006_1_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle skin — Smoothie Meteor.

Mount006_2_Skin_01.name: Surveyor Meteor
Mount006_2_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
A vehicle made with reference to the appearance of a famous oceanologist. Well, the cute expression, though, could make the oceanologist both hate and love the vehicle at the same time, I guess?
Mount006_2_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle skin — Surveyor Meteor.

Mount006_3_Skin_01.name: Arena Meteor
Mount006_3_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
A small number of past arena audience members wished that he'd leave a small autograph on the vehicle... But it'd probably cost a fortune by doing it on each one.
Mount006_3_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle skin — Arena Meteor.

Mount006_4_Skin_01.name: Absconder Meteor
Mount006_4_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
If he comes to us for the copyright payment, just tell him that the related personnel has already been fired.
Mount006_4_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle skin — Absconder Meteor.

Mount006_5_Skin_01.name: Windrunner Meteor
Mount006_5_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
The performance should be identical to other models, yet it feels faster riding in this one.
Mount006_5_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle skin — Windrunner Meteor.

Mount006_6_Skin_01.name: Freedom Meteor
Mount006_6_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
When will we race on another planet? Freedom Meteor is ready!
Mount006_6_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle skin — Freedom Meteor.

Mount006_7_Skin_01.name: Roaming Meteor
Mount006_7_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Could it be an illusion that I always feel like an ace when I'm on this thing? Or maybe it's not an illusion at all?
Mount006_7_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle skin — Roaming Meteor.

Mount006_8_Skin_01.name: Scuba Meteor
Mount006_8_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Its reinforced hull can adapt to greater pressure underwater... But this was not meant to be operated undersea.
Mount006_8_Skin_01.source: Unlocks the vehicle skin — Scuba Meteor.

Mount006_9_Skin_01.name: Supercomputing Meteor
Mount006_9_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Equipped with a mini supercomputer that can deal with all kinds of road surfaces. It's just sometimes the computer is too small to handle a large amount of calculations, and errors could occur.
Mount006_9_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle skin — Supercomputing Meteor.

Mount006_10_Skin_01.name: Modular Meteor
Mount006_10_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Even a homebody can be a skilled driver thanks to the training they received in racing games.
Mount006_10_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle skin — Modular Meteor.

Mount006_11_Skin_01.name: Nightfeather Meteor
Mount006_11_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Sweeping past the corners like a nightfeather. Are you sure you don't want a race?
Mount006_11_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle skin — Nightfeather Meteor.

Mount006_12_Skin_01.name: Reminiscent Meteor
Mount006_12_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Sit in this beauty and be a bright star shooting across the sky.
Mount006_12_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle skin — Reminiscent Meteor.

Mount006_13_Skin_01.name: Phantasmic Meteor
Mount006_13_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
One could dream of lightning-fast rides in this vehicle.
Mount006_13_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle skin — Phantasmic Meteor.

Mount006_14_Skin_01.name: Steady Meteor
Mount006_14_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
You would unconsciously slow down and drive safely in this one―Hey! What are these little critters doing behind us?
Mount006_14_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle skin — Steady Meteor.

Mount006_15_Skin_01.name: DIY Meteor
Mount006_15_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Did some modifications to it when I happened to see it the other day. Not sure if its performance gets affected...
Mount006_15_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle skin — DIY Meteor.

Mount006_16_Skin_01.name: Rockin' Meteor
Mount006_16_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Its music system has fifty Aida hit songs preloaded. Turn up the tunes, and go for a ride.
Mount006_16_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle skin — Rockin' Meteor.

Mount006_17_Skin_01.name: Justice Meteor
Mount006_17_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Take this buddy with you on your journey of justice and redemption.
Mount006_17_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle skin — Justice Meteor.

Mount006_18_Skin_01.name: Snow Rose Meteor
Mount006_18_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
It's said that you will impress the Queen of Snow Roses if you race and win the championship in this vehicle.
Mount006_18_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle skin — Snow Rose Meteor.

Mount006_19_Skin_01.name: Electrovision Meteor
Mount006_19_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Features fluorescent lights on gold paint to catch everyone's attention.
Mount006_19_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle skin — Electrovision Meteor.

Mount006_20_Skin_01.name: Neon Meteor
Mount006_20_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Whoever drives it will definitely be the brightest neon lighting on the street.
Mount006_20_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle skin — Neon Meteor.

Mount006_21_Skin_01.name: Inspirational Meteor
Mount006_21_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
You could seize inspiration before it disappears when driving around in this vehicle.
Mount006_21_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle skin — Inspirational Meteor.

Mount006_22_Skin_01.name: Miraculous Meteor
Mount006_22_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Restart and seize the future... with you.
Mount006_22_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle skin — Miraculous Meteor.

Mount006_23_Skin_01.name: Glowing Meteor
Mount006_23_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Though this is a vehicle inspired by a rebel, you should still follow the traffic rules while driving it.
Mount006_23_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle skin — Glowing Meteor.

Mount006_24_Skin_01.name: Frosty Meteor
Mount006_24_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Equipped with a powerful fridge and air conditioning. Not a bad idea to refit it as a beverage truck.
Mount006_24_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle skin — Frosty Meteor.

Mount006_25_Skin_01.name: EM Meteor
Mount006_25_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Unlike other vehicles, this one has an extra battery as the backup energy source. One can drive without worrying about running out of energy in Omnium-scarce areas.
Mount006_25_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle skin — EM Meteor.

Mount006_26_Skin_01.name: Pouncing Cat Meteor
Mount006_26_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Its music system was preloaded with sounds of cats in it. This might give you an edge when hunting down rodents. "Kitty is out for hunting! Where is the target? Give an order!"
Mount006_26_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle skin — Pouncing Cat Meteor.

Mount006_27_Skin_01.name: Flame Chaser Meteor
Mount006_27_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Transform into a shooting star on fire that no one can pass in a race.
Mount006_27_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle skin — Flame Chaser Meteor.

Mount006_28_Skin_01.name: Med Meteor
Mount006_28_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Comes with a medical kit for safe journeys.
Mount006_28_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle skin — Med Meteor.

Mount006_29_Skin_01.name: Wishing Meteor
Mount006_29_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
If you happen to see a meteor shower while driving this vehicle, make a wish, and it might come true.
Mount006_29_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle skin — Wishing Meteor.

TFB_drop_2x.name: Joint Supply Chip I
TFB_drop_2x.description: These supplies are prepared for Executors participating in Joint Operations by Hykros. The Executors have a higher chance to obtain advanced equipment after using the chip.
TFB_drop_2x.source: After use, the next 3 times consuming Vitality for opening the Joint Operation Box will double the chance of obtaining elite armor and fortress armor.

TFB_drop_3x.name: Joint Supply Chip II
TFB_drop_3x.description: These supplies are prepared for Executors participating in Joint Operations by Hykros. The Executors have a higher chance to obtain advanced equipment after using the chip.
TFB_drop_3x.source: After use, the next 3 times consuming Vitality for opening the Joint Operation Box will triple the chance of obtaining elite armor and fortress armor.

TFB_drop_4x.name: Joint supply chip III
TFB_drop_4x.description: These supplies are prepared for Executors participating in Joint Operations by Hykros. The Executors have a higher chance to obtain advanced equipment after using the chip.
TFB_drop_4x.source: After use, the next 3 times consuming Vitality for opening the Joint Operation Box will quadruple the chance of obtaining elite armor and fortress armor.

Mount_007_a.name: Mechbird: Head
Mount_007_a.description: "Want me to design the new vehicle? Okay, first, the child-like exterior will attract attention..."

Mount_007_b.name: Mechbird: Torso
Mount_007_b.description: "Trunk space or the radio... I don't want to give up either one..."

Mount_007_c.name: Mechbird: Legs
Mount_007_c.description: "It won't crumble even under a truckload of fallen fruit. Probably."

Mount_007_d.name: Mechbird: Core
Mount_007_d.description: "The newest creation from R&D. I had the kid try it out, and it's surprisingly comfortable."

Title_1_6_1_2.name: Star Pastry Chef
Title_1_6_1_2.description: Unlocks by participating in the Sweets Workshop event.

Item_Fashion_CostVoucher.name: Beauty Beauty Voucher
Item_Fashion_CostVoucher.description: Would you like Celine to help you clean up again?
Item_Fashion_CostVoucher.source: Used to offset expenses incurred when changing the outfit, appearance, etc.

Title_1_1_6_1.name: Island Pioneer
Title_1_1_6_1.description: A title obtained after reaching 100% exploration on Artificial Island.

DevelopLog_1.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 1
DevelopLog_1.description:
Starting log...
It's early in the morning, and Mr. Kolador said there'd been an unusual retracement on the Artificial Island we're developing. How is that possible? He must be making a fuss. Retracement is a core technology of Hykros that only they can master. As an ordinary technician, if I can make it happen...
Um..? There really is a transient unstable retracement, which seems to be related to the spacerift. I gotta fix it quickly. Am I losing my job? Maybe I'm qualified for Hykros now...?

DevelopLog_2.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 2
DevelopLog_2.description:
Starting log...
Today, we've debugged the spacerift on Artificial Island. All was normal, and everything went on smoothly. Mr. Kolador is such a wonderful man, as he didn't give me a hard time due to the rewind incident. However, my friend wasn't as lucky since he was fired by Cobalt-B today. Regardless of how I asked, he refused to tell me the reason. Yet, all that came out of his mouth was the word, moodcard, which I have absolutely no clue about.
It was probably some embarrassing mistake. After all, Cobalt-B holds such a high bar.

DevelopLog_3.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 3
DevelopLog_3.description:
Starting log...
My colleagues have all gone bonkers! These fools have taken advantage of the SSR weapons Hykros provided for the people of Aesperia and started a fight with the Hyenas on the Artificial Island.
You're just technicians, not Executors! So, get back to work! I'm the only one here working my butt off! If you were to read this log of mine, my esteemed Mr. Kolador, I'd hope you'll consider giving me a raise since that's definitely the best way to affirm my value. With that said, should I choose Dual EM Stars or Rosy Edge?

DevelopLog_4.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 4
DevelopLog_4.description:
Starting log...
Last night, I went to Cetus Island on my lonesome to watch the fireworks. Not only was it spectacular, but the music was also wonderful. That's why I proposed to Mr. Kolador that we should set off fireworks all day long on Artificial Island. However, he rejected the romantic proposal on the grounds that it might blow up the island's barrier.
If Dr. Claire requires a staff member who's not just a puppet, I'm willing to join her... Never mind, please delete this paragraph. Mr. Kolador was quite right in what he said. That was thoughtless of me, and there's still so much I have to learn from him.

DevelopLog_5.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 5
DevelopLog_5.description:
Starting log...
Right now, I'm logging with my "little feet," stomping on the keyboard. Hykros's stuff is so unstable! Their weapons went haywire and shrunk me to the size of a needlebee, and I almost got swatted by the Executors!
Development on the Artificial Island will have to be put on hold today. After all, it's too inconvenient for this "tiny me" to work. Mr. Kolador would understand me. Hopefully, Hykros will solve this problem within a week.

DevelopLog_6.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 6
DevelopLog_6.description:
Starting log...
I'm so excited, so excited! You have no idea what I saw today! I met Ms. Bai from the "other planet" in Navia! She was on a mission, but I'm sure she noticed me!
Although she was far away, she must have seen me! Yes, I felt it! Initiate Hykros Special Order, and search for "Alaya"...

DevelopLog_7.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 7
DevelopLog_7.description:
Starting log...
I should be on my vacation now, but there is a new problem with the Artificial Island... So here I am again. Right now, everyone outside the Artificial Island must be setting off fireworks... I could really use a nap right now... a nap... right now... ZZzzz

DevelopLog_8.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 8
DevelopLog_8.description:
Starting log...
The vacation is over, and the Artificial Island is stable for now. I hope Mr. Kolador will give me an extra reward for my performance during the vacation! Besides, I found something suspicious today! It's so suspicious! A colleague of mine came back from his vacation with very thick hair!
He used to be just like me... No, even worse than me! What on earth did he do during the vacation!? Perhaps I should go and ask him about it...

DevelopLog_9.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 9
DevelopLog_9.description:
Starting log...
There has been a minor issue with Banges recently, but Hykros managed the situation well. Now, some Banges residents, including me, are in quarantine. But! Quarantine won't stop me from developing the Artificial Island! Just connect to the Artificial Island server remotely, and I can start the work of love! Ah... the connection is so poor...
Hope everyone in Banges can get better quickly, and for all of Aida to get better, come on!

DevelopLog_10.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 10
DevelopLog_10.description:
Starting log...
The construction of Artificial Island Phase 1 is almost complete. What is most crucial right now is to drive the Hyenas away, and the quickest solution for that would be to request The Executor Order for assistance. Gosh, I'm so clever! Anyways, I'll suggest it to Mr. Kolador right this instant...
I've heard from a friend of Hykros that they've recently gotten hold of Vera's spacetime coordinates. I'd love to be able to head on over there to take a look once I'm done with my work on the Artificial Island...

BreakFate_InnerCoin.name: Break From Destiny coin
BreakFate_InnerCoin.description: An exquisitely designed badge. It represents great honor to warriors.
BreakFate_InnerCoin.source: Can be used to purchase combat supplies.

breakfate_healingposition_continued_1.name: Shield Energy Cell
breakfate_healingposition_continued_1.description: Charges the shield around you with energy to resist the relentless impacts.

breakfate_healingposition_S.name: First Aid Kit
breakfate_healingposition_S.description: A pack with band-aids and bandages inside. Can be used to alleviate some pain.

breakfate_healingposition_M.name: Advanced First Aid Kit
breakfate_healingposition_M.description: A package filled with first-aid supplies to treat wounds.

breakfate_ReviveCoin.name: Rainbow coin
breakfate_ReviveCoin.description: Stand on the colorful lucky clouds to resurrect on the spot.
breakfate_ReviveCoin.source: Can be used to resurrect teammates

fashion_Guidenpc_mia_2.name: Maid Mi-a
fashion_Guidenpc_mia_2.description: Mi-a also looks cute in a maid outfit!

fashion_Guidenpc_mia_4.name: Explorer Mi-a
fashion_Guidenpc_mia_4.description: Mi-a looks cute as an explorer too!

fashion_Guidenpc_mia_6.name: Panda Mi-a
fashion_Guidenpc_mia_6.description: Cute as a button... Are you talking about Mi-a or her backpack?

fashion_Guidenpc_mia_7.name: Cutie Mi-a
fashion_Guidenpc_mia_7.description: Don't take Mi-a's bag and eat it!

fashion_Guidenpc_mia_8.name: Swimsuit Mi-a
fashion_Guidenpc_mia_8.description: Don't forget Mi-a when going to the beach!

fashion_Guidenpc_mia_9.name: Little Sorceress Mi-a
fashion_Guidenpc_mia_9.description: Mi-a would like to turn you into a small pumpkin.

fashion_Guidenpc_mia_10.name: Reindeer Mi-a
fashion_Guidenpc_mia_10.description: Just as described in so many tales, Mi-a had prepared her gifts long beforehand, and eagerly awaited the coming of that night.

fashion_Guidenpc_mia_11.name: Bunny Mi-a
fashion_Guidenpc_mia_11.description: This isn't Dolly! I don't want to hug the wrong one!

fashion_Guidenpc_mia_12.name: Garuda Mi-a
fashion_Guidenpc_mia_12.description: The inspiration for this came from the mythical giant bird Shelly came across in a mysterious ancient book. It looks to be a perfect match for the flying Mi-a.

fashion_Guidenpc_mia_4_1.name: Explorer Mi-a Shard
fashion_Guidenpc_mia_4_1.description: Collect 3 Explorer Mi-a shards to fuse Explorer Mi-a.

chat_dubbing_1.name: Meryl's voice
chat_dubbing_1.source: Meryl's Quick Chat Voice Pack, can be used on the Chat interface and squad quick chat.

chat_dubbing_2.name: Mi-a's Voice
chat_dubbing_2.source: Mi-a's Quick Chat Voice Pack, can be used on the Chat interface and squad quick chat.

chat_dubbing_3.name: Samir's voice
chat_dubbing_3.source: Samir's Quick Chat Voice Pack, can be used on the Chat interface and squad quick chat.

chat_dubbing_4.name: Nemesis Voice
chat_dubbing_4.source: Nemesis's Quick Chat Voice Pack, can be used on the Chat interface and squad quick chat.

chat_dubbing_5.name: Universal Voice (Female)
chat_dubbing_5.source: Universal (Female) Quick Chat Voice Pack, can be used on the Chat interface and squad quick chat.

chat_dubbing_6.name: Universal Voice (Male)
chat_dubbing_6.source: Universal (Male) Quick Chat Voice Pack, can be used on the Chat interface and squad quick chat.

chat_mia_phrase_9.name: Mi-a's Children's Day Voice Pack
chat_mia_phrase_9.source: How does Mi-a get through these childish days? Let's sneak a listen to what Ruby asked Spark to record...

Title_1_4_3_1.name: Sequence Refactor
Title_1_4_3_1.description: Rank 1 in Sequential Phantasm at the results tally.

Title_1_4_3_2.name: Sequence Dominator
Title_1_4_3_2.description: Rank 2 in Sequential Phantasm at the results tally.

Title_1_4_3_3.name: Sequence Guardian
Title_1_4_3_3.description: Rank 3 in Sequential Phantasm at the results tally.

Title_1_4_3_4.name: Sequence Manager
Title_1_4_3_4.description: Rank 4 or 5 in Sequential Phantasm at the results tally.

Title_1_4_3_5.name: Sequence Overseer
Title_1_4_3_5.description: Rank 6–10 in Sequential Phantasm at the results tally.

Island_IdCard_1.name: Institute Key Card
Island_IdCard_1.description: The key card of a research institute. Not sure what exactly is being studied there.

Island_IdCard_2.name: Permission Card: Tyrone
Island_IdCard_2.description: A seemingly brand new permission card, as if not been used much.

Island_IdCard_3.name: Permission Card: Morris
Island_IdCard_3.description: Permission card with many scratches and severe wear marks on the corners. Maybe it was used to pry off something.

Island_IdCard_4.name: Permission Card: Damien
Island_IdCard_4.description: The permission card, once snapped in half, is spliced together by two loops of flimsy tape.

Island_IdCard_4_1.name: Rapid Repair Device
Island_IdCard_4_1.description: A device that can repair the laboratory door. The question is—why is the door broken?

Title_1_1_6_2.name: Island Observer
Title_1_1_6_2.description: A title obtained after reaching 100% exploration on Outer Islands, Artificial Island.

Item_manasample_2.name: Warp Energy Cell
Item_manasample_2.description: A vessel for storing energy for spacerifts, for the adequate preparation for the trip to Vera.
Item_manasample_2.source: Submit warp energy cells to get proofs of contribution, which can be redeemed for rewards at the Journey Store.

Title_1_6_1_5.name: Vera Navigator
Title_1_6_1_5.description: Purchased from the Journey Store during the Vera Orienteering event.

Item_Incarnation_02.name: Proof of Contribution
Item_Incarnation_02.description: The certificate made by the Hykros Logistics Department, which records the efforts and contributions of the Executor.
Item_Incarnation_02.source: An event item. Used to exchange for goods at the Journey Store during the event.

Mount006_30_Skin_01.name: Demonic Meteor
Mount006_30_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Comment from one of the buyers: I heard it's created based on the appearance of a wicked demon, but... aww... I don't care. I just love it.
Mount006_30_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle skin — Demonic Meteor.

Mount006_31_Skin_01.name: Scarlet Meteor
Mount006_31_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
It's said that it can help you forget about your troubles when driving this vehicle.
Mount006_31_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle skin — Scarlet Meteor.

leibei.name: Ruby
leibei.description: Spark and bunnies sent an invitation to the ball. Don't be late!

Title_1_1_7_1.name: Windfighter
Title_1_1_7_1.description: Title for reaching 100% Sandstorm Grounds exploration.

Title_1_1_7_2.name: Windrider
Title_1_1_7_2.description: Title for reaching 100% Sandstorm Grounds: Grayspace area exploration.

Title_1_1_8_1.name: Extreme Climber
Title_1_1_8_1.description: Title for reaching 100% Rock Pillar Gobby exploration.

Title_1_1_8_2.name: Top Climber
Title_1_1_8_2.description: Title for reaching 100% Rock Pillar Gobby: Grayspace area exploration.

Title_1_1_9_1.name: Quicksand Explorer
Title_1_1_9_1.description: Title for reaching 100% Quicksand Belt exploration.

Title_1_1_9_2.name: Quicksand Conqueror
Title_1_1_9_2.description: Title for reaching 100% Quicksand Belt: Grayspace area exploration.

Title_1_1_10_1.name: Mirroria Explorer
Title_1_1_10_1.description: Title for reaching 100% Mirroria District A exploration.

Mount_012_a.name: Jerboa Chassis
Mount_012_a.description: Made of special alloy, it is lightweight but solid. Its super strength makes it the ideal option for a variety of environments.

Mount_012_b.name: Jerboa Power Core
Mount_012_b.description: The power core was developed with cutting-edge energy technology. You never need to worry about the risk of your vehicle breaking down halfway.

douyu_gift_50jd.name: USD 50 JD Card
douyu_gift_50jd.description: This item is a voucher used to claim a physical prize from the Douyu "2.0 Vera Sector" mystery box draw event. Please contact customer service from the Settings screen to access the questionnaire and submit relevant information for prizes. Prizes will be issued outside the game. Redemptions are valid until 00:00, April 30 2022.

douyu_gift_RAZER.name: Razer Death Adder Elite
douyu_gift_RAZER.description: This item is a voucher used to claim a physical prize from the Douyu "2.0 Vera Sector" mystery box draw event. Please contact customer service from the Settings screen to access the questionnaire and submit relevant information for prizes. Prizes will be issued outside the game. Redemptions are valid until 00:00, April 30 2022.

douyu_gift_random.name: Random Peripheral
douyu_gift_random.description: This item is a voucher used to claim a physical prize from the Douyu "2.0 Vera Sector" mystery box draw event. Please contact customer service from the Settings screen to access the questionnaire and submit relevant information for prizes. Prizes will be issued outside the game. Redemptions are valid until 00:00, April 30 2022.

douyu_gift_GTX3080.name: GeForce RTX 3080
douyu_gift_GTX3080.description: This item is a voucher used to claim a physical prize from the Douyu "2.0 Vera Sector" mystery box draw event. For prizes, please contact customer service from the Settings screen to access the questionnaire and submit relevant information. Prizes will be issued outside the game. Redemptions are valid until 00:00 on May 25, 2022.

douyu_gift_iPhone13.name: iPhone 13
douyu_gift_iPhone13.description: This item is a voucher used to claim a physical prize from the Douyu "2.0 Vera Sector" mystery box draw event. For prizes, please contact customer service from the Settings screen to access the questionnaire and submit relevant information. Prizes will be issued outside the game. Redemptions are valid until 00:00 on May 25, 2022.

Mount_015.name: Desert Rider
Mount_015.description: A vehicle for two, designed with bionics and ergonomics in mind. Ride with a companion to kill time while zooming through the scorching desert.

change_role_sex.name: Appearance Change Card
change_role_sex.source: Non-invasive and painless. The opportunity to instantly switch to another life is in your hand. However... the physiological differences may take some time to get used to.

bupoxiao.name: Saki Fuwa
bupoxiao.description: I will attack in Saki Fuwa form.

fragment_Mount012_2_Skin_01.name: Leaper Shard
fragment_Mount012_2_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Jerboa all-terrain vehicles.
It may appear to be customized for a kid, but a Jerboa is a Jerboa!
fragment_Mount012_2_Skin_01.source: Collect 2 shards to unlock the vehicle Leaper

Mount012_1_Skin_01.name: Jumping Smart Servant
Mount012_1_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Jerboa all-terrain vehicles.
It's a customized version for a certain Wanderer and their lady companion. This smart servant must hold special meaning to the pair.
Mount012_1_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle Jumping Smart Servant

Mount012_2_Skin_01.name: Leaper
Mount012_2_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Jerboa all-terrain vehicles.
It may appear to be customized for a kid, but a Jerboa is a Jerboa!

Mount012_3_Skin_01.name: Ultimate Jerboa
Mount012_3_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Jerboa all-terrain vehicles.
It is named the Super Ultimate in hopes that its owner would also have super ultimate justice and valor!

v222003_HOTTAcard_01.name: HOTTA Studio Temporary Staff Card
v222003_HOTTAcard_01.description: The temporary staff card of HOTTA Studio only allows access to certain places. It is engraved with the user's name and personal information. HOTTA Studio, a well-known company in Mirroria, focuses on game development and entertainment services.

v60500_taolesicard_normal.name: Dorothy's Black Card
v60500_taolesicard_normal.description: Dorothy's black card has no spending limit. It can only be used in this bodyguard mission.

v60500_taolesicard_bad.name: Dorothy's Black Card
v60500_taolesicard_bad.description: After hearing Fenrir recount the details of what happened, Dorothy thought that you wouldn't need this card because you like to use cash, so she canceled this card permanently.

v60500_taolesicard_good.name: Dorothy's Black Card
v60500_taolesicard_good.description: Dorothy has decided to give you something extra as thanks for taking care of Fenrir.

v10300_shizhangitem.name: Timestamp
v10300_shizhangitem.description: Timestamps are the power source of the Domain Guards, which can remove the damage reduction ability of the Darkness to help us defeat them. Have you ever wondered what the future looks like without timestamps? Ji Yu did, and that put her into countless restless days and nights.

Item_AbyssWorld_01.name: R&D Permission Card
Item_AbyssWorld_01.description: Permission Card of the department head, used to activate a certain device.

Item_AbyssWorld_02.name: Emergency Response Permission Card
Item_AbyssWorld_02.description: Permission Card of the department head, used to activate a certain device.

Item_AbyssWorld_03.name: Engineering Permission Card
Item_AbyssWorld_03.description: Permission Card of the department head, used to activate a certain device.

Item_AbyssWorld_04.name: Project Administration Permission Card
Item_AbyssWorld_04.description: Permission Card of the department head, used to activate a certain device.

Item_AbyssWorld_05.name: Expedition Permission Card
Item_AbyssWorld_05.description: Permission Card of the department head, used to activate a certain device.

Item_ExpCard_10k.name: Combat Logs Chip I
Item_ExpCard_10k.description: Contains combat logs. Use to get EXP.

Item_ExpCard_100k.name: Combat Logs Chip II
Item_ExpCard_100k.description: Contains combat logs. Use to get EXP.

Item_ExpCard_500k.name: Combat Logs Chip III
Item_ExpCard_500k.description: Contains combat logs. Use to get EXP.

imitation_fashion_26.name: No Fear of the Sun
imitation_fashion_26.description: UV rays are the enemy of all women... But she seems to enjoy bathing in the sunlight.
imitation_fashion_26.source: Unlock the Simulacrum Haute Couture—No Fear of the Sun—and the weapon appearance—Sunny Breeze.

imitation_fashion_26_w.name: Sunny Breeze
imitation_fashion_26_w.description: Taking a vacation between consecutive jobs is worth a change in mood. Just tap a few times on your phone for a change of paint.
imitation_fashion_26_w.source: Unlock the weapon appearance Sunny Breeze

imitation_fashion_22.name: Ultimate Pure White
imitation_fashion_22.description: "Ultimate justice! Ultimate valor! The Ultimate Warriors who give Night City ultimate protection! Elegant, pure, mighty! Super, super ultimate!"
imitation_fashion_22.source: Unlock the Simulacrum Haute Couture—Ultimate Pure White.

imitation_fashion_22_w.name: Pure Innocent Heart
imitation_fashion_22_w.description: The impeccable power has granted Heartstream with a new look.
imitation_fashion_22_w.source: Unlock the weapon appearance Pure Innocent Heart

imitation_fashion_21.name: Crimson Song
imitation_fashion_21.description: The little girl receives the red cloak from her sister. Wow, she gets so excited that she forgets to hide her tail!
imitation_fashion_21.source: Unlock the Simulacrum Haute Couture—Crimson Song.

imitation_fashion_21_w.name: Falling Flames
imitation_fashion_21_w.description: A magical creation that contains mysterious energy in the picture book Crimson Tale. It's also Little Red Riding Hood's closest friend.
imitation_fashion_21_w.source: Unlock the weapon appearance Falling Flames

imitation_fashion_21_bag.name: Crimson Song & Falling Flames
imitation_fashion_21_bag.description: The little girl receives the red cloak from her sister. Wow, she gets so excited that she forgets to hide her tail!
imitation_fashion_21_bag.source: Use to get the Simulacrum Haute Couture—Crimson Song—and the weapon appearance—Falling Flames.

imitation_fashion_17.name: Shirli
imitation_fashion_17.description: It's an image extracted from memories... It's just an illusion.

imitation_fashion_17_w.name: White Dwarf
imitation_fashion_17_w.description: A shining star might look small, but it gives off unimaginable energy.
imitation_fashion_17_w.source: Unlock the weapon appearance White Dwarf

imitation_fashion_10.name: Argent Intuition
imitation_fashion_10.description: It's difficult to find a balance between formal attire and work clothes. Only she insists that true art is a mix of practicality and artistry...
imitation_fashion_10.source: Unlock the Simulacrum Haute Couture—Argent Intuition.

imitation_fashion_10_w.name: Silver Flame Revolver
imitation_fashion_10_w.description: It would be great if I could apply paints of all colors to the flame... but there are still many technical problems to overcome.
imitation_fashion_10_w.source: Unlock the weapon appearance Silver Flame Revolver

imitation_fashion_23.name: Sleek Summer Shade
imitation_fashion_23.description: Even this well-known busy person of Mirroria occasionally enjoys some time off by the exclusive luxury pool.
imitation_fashion_23.source: Unlock the Simulacrum Haute Couture—Sleek Summer Shade.

imitation_fashion_23_w.name: Misty Weave
imitation_fashion_23_w.description: The wind blown by this fan seems cooler than before... Though it may just be the visual effects which make it seem that way?
imitation_fashion_23_w.source: Unlock the weapon appearance Misty Weave

imitation_fashion_23_2.name: Azure Heart
imitation_fashion_23_2.description: "Maybe I would be wearing this if I had gone to Innars for work, rather than stay in Mirroria." Perhaps this is the reality of another universe.
imitation_fashion_23_2.source: Unlock the Simulacrum Haute Couture—Azure Heart.

imitation_fashion_23_w_2.name: Coral Weave
imitation_fashion_23_w_2.description: Even at the bottom of the sea, Coral Weave seems to withstand the current and emit a gentle breeze. Although it may not be as easy to conceal in the darkness as before, its appearance is now far more stunning.
imitation_fashion_23_w_2.source: Unlock the weapon appearance Coral Weave

imitation_fashion_23_bag.name: Sleek Summer Shade & Misty Weave
imitation_fashion_23_bag.description: Even this well-known busy person of Mirroria occasionally enjoys some time off by the exclusive luxury pool.
imitation_fashion_23_bag.source: Use to get the Simulacrum Haute Couture—Sleek Summer Shade—and the weapon appearance—Misty Weave.

imitation_fashion_31.name: Millet Wonderland
imitation_fashion_31.description: A costume that Umi ordered for a fairly formal performance, in which she will play the heir to the Millet Castle and bring fantastic dreams to "guests" that stumble upon this place.
imitation_fashion_31.source: Unlock the Simulacrum Haute Couture—Millet Wonderland.

imitation_fashion_31_w.name: Gloom
imitation_fashion_31_w.description: There are many secrets surrounding the source of the Millet Castle's heir's magical powers.

imitation_fashion_34.name: Ivory Bloom
imitation_fashion_34.description: Thank you for staying courageous and holding my hand, even when faced with danger.
imitation_fashion_34.source: Unlock the Simulacrum Haute Couture—Ivory Bloom.

imitation_fashion_34_w.name: Akaba
imitation_fashion_34_w.description: Vermilion Bird changes its appearance after sensing Zhuque's intent.

imitation_fashion_30.name: Platinum Radiance
imitation_fashion_30.description: Shortly after Alyss's headache was cured, Mirroria Department of Science and Technology discovered previously unknown information in the Unyielding Wing. By reconstructing the data and importing it to the Unyielding Wing, they created a new Platinum Armor Form that differs from Anisoptera or Lepidoptera.
imitation_fashion_30.source: Unlock the Simulacrum Haute Couture—Platinum Radiance.

imitation_fashion_30_w.name: Platinum Wings
imitation_fashion_30_w.description: Unyielding Wing is converted to Platinum Armor Form to make Alyss even mightier.
imitation_fashion_30_w.source: Unlock the weapon appearance Platinum Wings

imitation_fashion_36.name: Starlit Honor
imitation_fashion_36.description: The moon and the stars, just for you.
imitation_fashion_36.source: Unlock the Simulacrum Haute Couture—Starlit Honor.

imitation_fashion_36_w.name: Astraluna
imitation_fashion_36_w.description: The power of the stars and the moon gathers, condenses, and discharges here.

imitation_fashion_37.name: Inkwell Refinement
imitation_fashion_37.description: Seemingly having undergone a prolonged seclusion, perhaps even immersing herself in ink to contemplate the true essence of elegance, Liu Huo reappears before us. Her aura, now visibly enhanced, signifies a deepened understanding of grace... a noticeable transformation.
imitation_fashion_37.source: Unlock the Simulacrum Haute Couture—Inkwell Refinement.

imitation_fashion_37_w.name: Cinnabar
imitation_fashion_37_w.description: As the afterglow emblem encircles the pen, hold it to get overwhelmed by the inspiration from the poem...

imitation_fashion_41.name: Serene Grove
imitation_fashion_41.description: Amidst the clear breeze, within the serene bamboo grove.
imitation_fashion_41.source: Unlock the Simulacrum Haute Couture—Serene Grove.

imitation_fashion_41_w.name: Gilded Cloud
imitation_fashion_41_w.description: Auspicious clouds are drifting across the sky, painting it gold.
imitation_fashion_41_w.source: Unlock the weapon appearance, Gilded Cloud

imitation_fashion_43.name: Summer Frost
imitation_fashion_43.description: Basking under the brilliant sun, summer frost blooms.
imitation_fashion_43.source: Unlock the Simulacrum Haute Couture—Summer Frost.

imitation_fashion_43_w.name: Flowerstream
imitation_fashion_43_w.description: Atop the waves, where snowflakes dance.

imitation_fashion_48.name: Brilliant Eclipse
imitation_fashion_48.description: Continuation and destruction merge into her sole thought.
imitation_fashion_48.source: Unlock the Simulacrum Haute Couture—Brilliant Eclipse.

imitation_fashion_48_w.name: Swan Song
imitation_fashion_48_w.source: Unlock the weapon appearance Swan Song

imitation_fashion_50.name: Zeke
imitation_fashion_50.description: He defines himself by his duties.

imitation_fashion_50_w.name: Fading Shadows
imitation_fashion_50_w.source: Unlock the weapon appearance Fading Shadows

imitation_33.name: Molinia
imitation_33.description: My name is Mo... Moli. Nice to meet you... (Waaah! I couldn't even finish my name right! I wish I had another chance...)

Item_PanelKey_FoxCave.name: Activation Module
Item_PanelKey_FoxCave.source: Can be used to activate the dormant control console.

linye.name: Lin
linye.description: She did allow her fans to use her photos, provided that it was not for commercial purposes, and only minor post-processing was done.

Item_battery.name: Energy Activation Charger
Item_battery.description: Special material used to power machines.
Item_battery.source: Can be used to increase Appointed Research progress.

Title_1_4_5_1.name: Top Ten
Title_1_4_5_1.description: Get in the top ten of Break From Destiny to unlock this title.

fragment_reactor_orange.name: Fortress Microreactor Shard
fragment_reactor_orange.description: A new high-efficiency reactor developed by District 7 R&D that provides stats support.
fragment_reactor_orange.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse one of the following fortress microreactor types: Overload, Burst, Glaze, Arc.

fragment_reactor1_orange.name: Fortress Microreactor Shard (Overload)
fragment_reactor1_orange.description: A new high-efficiency reactor developed by District 7 R&D that provides physical support.
fragment_reactor1_orange.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse the fortress microreactor (Overload)

fragment_reactor2_orange.name: Fortress Microreactor Shard (Glaze)
fragment_reactor2_orange.description: A new high-efficiency reactor developed by District 7 R&D that provides frost support.
fragment_reactor2_orange.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse the fortress microreactor (Glaze)

fragment_reactor3_orange.name: Fortress Microreactor Shard (Burst)
fragment_reactor3_orange.description: A new high-efficiency reactor developed by District 7 R&D that provides flame support.
fragment_reactor3_orange.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse the fortress microreactor (Burst)

fragment_reactor4_orange.name: Fortress Microreactor Shard (Arc)
fragment_reactor4_orange.description: A new high-efficiency reactor developed by District 7 R&D that provides volt support.
fragment_reactor4_orange.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse the fortress microreactor (Arc)

fragment_reactor5_orange.name: Fortress Microreactor Shard (Altered)
fragment_reactor5_orange.description: A new high-efficiency reactor developed by District 7 R&D that provides altered-type support.
fragment_reactor5_orange.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse the fortress microreactor (Altered).

fragment_reactor_purple.name: Elite microreactor shard
fragment_reactor_purple.description: A microreactor equipped by District 7 Executors to fight Grayspace Entities.
fragment_reactor_purple.source: Collect 20 shards to fuse one of the following elite microreactor types: Overload, Burst, Glaze, Arc.

fragment_reactor5_purple.name: Elite Microreactor Shard (Altered)
fragment_reactor5_purple.description: A microreactor equipped by District 7 Executors to fight Grayspace Entities.
fragment_reactor5_purple.source: Collect 20 shards to fuse the elite microreactor (Altered)

fragment_exoskeleton_orange.name: Fortress Exoskeleton Shard
fragment_exoskeleton_orange.description: A new exoskeleton developed by District 7 R&D that provides excellent stat support.
fragment_exoskeleton_orange.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse one of the following fortress exoskeleton types: Overload, Burst, Glaze, and Arc.

fragment_exoskeleton1_orange.name: Fortress Exoskeleton Shard (Overload)
fragment_exoskeleton1_orange.description: A new exoskeleton developed by District 7 R&D that provides physical support.
fragment_exoskeleton1_orange.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse the fortress exoskeleton (Overload).

fragment_exoskeleton2_orange.name: Fortress Exoskeleton Shard (Glaze)
fragment_exoskeleton2_orange.description: A new exoskeleton developed by District 7 R&D that provides frost support.
fragment_exoskeleton2_orange.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse the fortress exoskeleton (Glaze).

fragment_exoskeleton3_orange.name: Fortress Exoskeleton Shard (Burst)
