fragment_exoskeleton3_orange.description: A new exoskeleton developed by District 7 R&D that provides flame support.
fragment_exoskeleton3_orange.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse the fortress exoskeleton (Burst).

fragment_exoskeleton4_orange.name: Fortress Exoskeleton Shard (Arc)
fragment_exoskeleton4_orange.description: A new exoskeleton developed by District 7 R&D that provides volt support.
fragment_exoskeleton4_orange.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse the fortress exoskeleton (Arc).

fragment_exoskeleton_purple.name: Elite Exoskeleton Shard
fragment_exoskeleton_purple.description: An exoskeleton equipped by District 7 Executors to fight Grayspace Entities.
fragment_exoskeleton_purple.source: Collect 20 shards to fuse one of the following elite exoskeleton types: Overload, Burst, Glaze, and Arc.

fragment_choose_matrix_SSR25.name: Haboela Matrix (Shard)
fragment_choose_matrix_SSR25.description: Fuse and use to choose any one Haboela Matrix.
fragment_choose_matrix_SSR25.source: Collect 100 shards to fuse a Haboela Matrix Free Pick.

fragment_choose_matrix_SSR26.name: Scylla Matrix (Shard)
fragment_choose_matrix_SSR26.description: Fuse and use to choose any one Scylla Matrix.
fragment_choose_matrix_SSR26.source: Collect 100 shards to fuse a Scylla Matrix Free Pick.

Title_1_4_4_5.name: Boundless Realm Visitor
Title_1_4_4_5.description: Clear level 15 in the Boundless Realm to unlock.

Title_1_4_4_6.name: Boundless Realm Walker
Title_1_4_4_6.description: Clear level 30 in the Boundless Realm to unlock.

Title_1_4_4_7.name: Boundless Realm Pioneer
Title_1_4_4_7.description: Clear level 45 in the Boundless Realm to unlock.

Title_1_1_11_1.name: Abyss Listener
Title_1_1_11_1.description: Title for reaching 100% Confounding Abyss exploration.

Title_Overseas_1.name: Vanguard Trailblazer
Title_Overseas_1.description: Unlocks by participating in the Live Stream event.

Title_Overseas_2.name: Hykros Observer
Title_Overseas_2.description: A Pioneer who has made outstanding contributions to the promotion of Tower of Fantasy.

Title_Overseas_3.name: Greatest Creator
Title_Overseas_3.description: Unlocked by being selected during the CBT's Submission Event

Title_korea_4.name: Bug Hunter
Title_korea_4.description: Wanderers that participated in CBT and submitted bugs

Title_iw_1.name: Advance Squad
Title_iw_1.description: Obtainable by the first batch of Advance Squad members who arrived on Aida.

Title_tencent_1.name: ToF Enthusiast
Title_tencent_1.description: For the ToF Team's greatest helpers. Thank you for supporting Tower of Fantasy in becoming better and better!

Mount_016.name: Warcart of Tomorrow
Mount_016.description: Once it accelerates to 888 miles per hour, it can break through the time barrier and go to any time period...
Mount_016.source: Unlock the vehicle Warcart of Tomorrow.

xinghuan.name: Lyra
xinghuan.description: I'm simply following Ms. Maidelin's orders, that's all.

gift_monthcard_autouse_overseas.name: Random Monthly Pass Box
gift_monthcard_autouse_overseas.description: Receive one of the following items at random: Gold nucleus, proof of purchase, random SSR Relic shard box, random SR Relic shard box, weapon battery II, weapon battery III, weapon battery IV, Matrix data pack II, Matrix data pack III, and Matrix data pack IV.

MapRadar.name: Radar Detector
MapRadar.description: The latest radar detector developed by the Mirroria Department of Science and Technology. An essential tool for Wanderers.
MapRadar.source: Use to randomly detect an undiscovered World Exploration point, supply pod, Grayspace spatial rift, Grayspace crystal dust, Twilight Zone Secret Box, or Twilight Zone Spacetime Crystal, and generate and record the location's navigation mark.

MapRadarPoint.name: Navigation Beacon
MapRadarPoint.description: A complimentary device to the radar detector. The only choice for Wanderers.
MapRadarPoint.source: Used to display exploration point coordinates.

RoleVoicePackage_1.name: Basic Executor Voice Pack
RoleVoicePackage_1.source: That introvert of an Executor is way chattier than before!?

Mount_017_a.name: Nova Engine
Mount_017_a.description: Don't underestimate its horsepower based on its cute appearance!
Mount_017_a.source: Used to unlock the Nova vehicle.

Mount_017_b.name: Nova Base
Mount_017_b.description: A three-wheeled design, stable and safe. Great for travel, food delivery, cargo transportation, and household essentials!
Mount_017_b.source: Used to unlock the Nova vehicle.

Mount_017_c.name: Nova Hull
Mount_017_c.description: I have to admit that this thing looks like a toy, but it's totally a different story on the manual...
Mount_017_c.source: Used to unlock the Nova vehicle.

fragment_Mount_017_c.name: Nova Shard (Hull)
fragment_Mount_017_c.description: I have to admit that this thing looks like a toy, but it's totally a different story on the manual...
fragment_Mount_017_c.source: Collect 100 shards to fuse Nova (Hull), which can be used to unlock the vehicle Nova.

fragment_Mount_024.name: Taming Potion
fragment_Mount_024.description: A scientific research achievement of the Wildlife Research Institute. Users of this potion tend to become docile.
fragment_Mount_024.source: Collect 7 taming potions to make one taming potion pack, which can be used to unlock the vehicle, Cyox.

choose_ssr_OS.name: SSR Relic Box
choose_ssr_OS.source: Open the box and select one of the <Orange>SSR</> Relics in it: Colossus Arm, Omnium Shield, Type V Armor, Spacetime Rift, Confinement, or Drone.

choose_frag_ssr_OS.name: SSR Relic Shard Box
choose_frag_ssr_OS.source: Open the box and select one of the <Orange>SSR</> Relic shards in it: Colossus Arm shard, Omnium Shield shard, Type V Armor shard, Spacetime Rift shard, Confinement shard, or Drone shard.

Blindbox_EarlySpring_2022_pack.name: Wheel of Light Giftbox
Blindbox_EarlySpring_2022_pack.description: One of the most popular limited-edition giftboxes at the Banges Expo. It's always a mixture of anticipation and trepidation when you open the box.
Blindbox_EarlySpring_2022_pack.source:
Random box.
Extremely low chance of obtaining one of the Meteoric line of vehicles: Justice Meteor, Nightfeather Meteor, Med Meteor, Rockin' Meteor, Pouncing Cat Meteor, Arena Meteor, Absconder Meteor, Smoothie Meteor, Wishing Meteor, Modular Meteor, Supercomputing Meteor, Frosty Meteor, Snow Rose Meteor, EM Meteor, Glowing Meteor, Windrunner Meteor, Freedom Meteor, Electrovision Meteor, Neon Meteor, Surveyor Meteor, Scuba Meteor, Steady Meteor, Flame Chaser Meteor, Roaming Meteor, Phantasmic Meteor, Inspirational Meteor, DIY Meteor, Reminiscent Meteor, Miraculous Meteor
Low chance of obtaining: [Outfit] Midnight, [Outfit] Early Sakura, [Accessory] Demon Holiday, [Accessory] Demon Devotee, [Accessory] Kiss of Stars, [Avatar Frame] Companion, [Chat Bubble] Type-5.

choose_elemine_p1_pack.name: Elemental Ore Shard Box
choose_elemine_p1_pack.description: A box containing a selection of elemental ore shards to choose from.
choose_elemine_p1_pack.source: Choose any piece of elemental ore shard in the box.

tianlang.name: Tian Lang
tianlang.description: I am the owner of the Mirroria Nursery. Don't spill the beans on my alter ego!

AvatarFrame_Overseas_1.name: Greatest Creator
AvatarFrame_Overseas_1.description: Limited reward for outstanding creators during the CBT.

AvatarFrame_Overseas_2.name: Illusory Link
AvatarFrame_Overseas_2.description: Do we exist, or are we just shadows of some parallel universe?

AvatarFrame_tencent_1.name: Creatower
AvatarFrame_tencent_1.description: An outstanding ToF creator. We can tell you love the game!

AvatarFrame_tencent_2.name: Creatower Master
AvatarFrame_tencent_2.description: An extremely professional ToF creator. ToF is grateful to have an inspiration like you!

AvatarFrame_tencent_3.name: Creatower of Fantasy
AvatarFrame_tencent_3.description: A fantastical ToF creator, one who is already one with the team... You are already one with the team, congrats!

Avatar_Overseas_1.name: Zeke: Awakening
Avatar_Overseas_1.description: Maybe ol' Zeke can even be cute sometimes?

Avatar_Overseas_2.name: Shirli: Awakening
Avatar_Overseas_2.description: "Do I look silly to you when I smile?" Some dumb cute girl said so while swinging her fists.

Avatar_korea_1.name: Mi-a: Cute Version
Avatar_korea_1.description: Mi-a is currently executing the dressing sequence, please wait.

Avatar_korea_2.name: Nemesis: Cute Version
Avatar_korea_2.description: I think I had a dream. I saw a lot of things in this dream.

Avatar_korea_3.name: Shirli: Cute Version
Avatar_korea_3.description: Do we wanna go to Cetus Island together?

matrix_show_SSR1_OS.name: Meryl: Matrix
matrix_show_SSR1_OS.source:
Two-set bonus: If HP is less than 30% after being attacked, gain a shield equal to 20%/26%/32%/40% of Max HP for 10 seconds. Cooldown: 90 seconds.
Four-set bonus: Increase Whirlwind's damage by 36%/45%/54%/63% and restore HP equal to 30%/38%/44%/50% of the damage dealt while Whirlwind is active. The maximum HP restored every 0.5 seconds cannot exceed 60%/72%/81%/90% of ATK.

matrix_show_SSR2_OS.name: Tsubasa: Matrix
matrix_show_SSR2_OS.source:
Two-set bonus: Increase damage dealt by 14%/16%/18%/20% when there are no enemies within 4 meters.
Four-set bonus: Upon a headshot or hitting the target with Icewind Arrow: Piercing Shot, increase ATK by 15%/18%/21%/25% for 8 seconds.

matrix_show_SSR3_OS.name: Cocoritter: Matrix
matrix_show_SSR3_OS.source:
Two-set bonus: Increase the healing capability and healing effect received by 10%/12%/14%/16%.
Four-set bonus: When you or your teammates are healed, increase ATK by 12.5%/15%/17.5%/20% for 6 seconds. (Only the highest level's effect is applied when obtained repeatedly.)

matrix_show_SSR4_OS.name: KING: Matrix
matrix_show_SSR4_OS.source:
Two-set bonus: When a target is shattered, grant 8%/10%/12%/14% damage boost for 25 seconds. Only the highest set effect is applied when obtained repeatedly.
Four-set bonus: If there are 2 or more enemies, hits restore HP equal to 14%/18%/22%/26%, not exceeding 36%/42%/48%/54% of ATK every 0.5 seconds.

matrix_show_SSR5_OS.name: Cobalt-B: Matrix
matrix_show_SSR5_OS.source:
Two-set bonus: Increase damage against debuffed targets by 14%/16%/18%/20%.
Four-set bonus: Grant 1 dodge attempt every 3 dodges. Dodge skills inflict burn upon hit, dealing damage equal to 24%/30%/36%/42% of ATK every 0.5 seconds for 4 seconds. (Multiple instances of the dodge skill burn will only trigger damage the first time.)

matrix_show_SSR6_OS.name: Claudia: Matrix
matrix_show_SSR6_OS.source:
Two-set bonus: Increase damage by 13%/17%/20%/23% when hitting a target in mid-air or initiating an aerial attack. Reset double-jump upon hitting the target in mid-air.
Four-set bonus: Hitting an enemy with a skill reduces the cooldowns of all weapon skills by 1.5/2/2.5/3 seconds and increases the damage of discharge skills by 58%/80%/103%/126% for 15 seconds.

matrix_show_SSR7_OS.name: Shiro: Matrix
matrix_show_SSR7_OS.source:
Two-set bonus: Increase both damage and shatter to targets with more than 50% HP by 15%/19%/22.5%/26%.
Four-set bonus: Upon entering battle, gain a 20%/25%/30%/35% damage boost for 35 seconds. Reset 5 seconds after exiting battle.

matrix_show_SSR8_OS.name: Zero: Matrix
matrix_show_SSR8_OS.source:
Two-set bonus: Upon using a discharge skill to switch to the current weapon, gain a shield equal to 150%/200%/250%/300% of ATK for 6 seconds.
Four-set bonus: While the shield is active, you and your teammates deal 16%/20%/24%/28% more damage.

matrix_show_SSR9_OS.name: Samir: Matrix
matrix_show_SSR9_OS.source:
Two-set bonus: Increase damage progressively by 1% upon hitting a target. Stack up to 10/13/16/20 times. Lasts for 1.5 seconds.
Four-set bonus: Increase the volt and crit damage of Dual EM Stars by 16%/22%/30%/40%.

matrix_show_SSR10_OS.name: Huma: Matrix
matrix_show_SSR10_OS.source:
Two-set bonus: Hitting targets with dodge skills inflicts bleed, dealing damage equal to 15%/19%/22.5%/26% of ATK every second for 5 seconds.
Four-set bonus: Reduce ATK of all targets within 8 meters that are taking damage over time by 10%/12%/13%/15%. (Only the highest level's effect is applied when obtained repeatedly.)

matrix_show_SSR11_OS.name: Crow: Matrix
matrix_show_SSR11_OS.source:
Two-set bonus: Increase crit damage to targets with less than 60% HP by 24%/30%/36%/42%.
Four-set bonus: Crits deal additional damage over time equal to 18%/22%/26%/30% of ATK every second for 5 seconds. This effect does not stack.

Title_1_1_10_2.name: Mirroria Pathfinder
Title_1_1_10_2.description: Title for reaching 100% Mirroria District B exploration.

Title_1_1_10_3.name: Mirroria Navigator
Title_1_1_10_3.description: Title for reaching 100% Mirroria District C exploration.

Item_gift_T101008.name: A Screenwriter's Blog
Item_gift_T101008.description: A book that contains the screenwriter's personal experiences. Due to its incredible ability to put its readers to sleep, some use it as a sleeping aid.

Item_gift_T101010.name: Security Force Training Diary
Item_gift_T101010.description: A training manual for special agents of the Security Force. It contains training methods shared by senior members, making it a must-read for new members.

Item_gift_T101015.name: Rider Postcard
Item_gift_T101015.description: A postcard signed by a famous rider.

Item_gift_T101037.name: Umi's Poker Deck
Item_gift_T101037.description: Umi's magic items. I don't seem to notice anything special about them... If you could give them to her, maybe she will teach you a little trick.

Title_Overseas2_7.description: Thank you for helping out new adventurers.

Avatar_Overseas_8.description: Want to taste my boot and chainsaw?

Mount_018.name: Elaphuria
Mount_018.description: When operated at maximum power, the beams from the headlights will leave a dazzling trail. But... it is not safe to exceed the speed limit.

Item_BossCustommadeScore.name: Spiritual Clash Virtual Modules
Item_BossCustommadeScore.description: Produced by the Hykros Combat Simulation Bureau.
Item_BossCustommadeScore.source: Virtual modules constructed in Spiritual Clash can be used to increase the reality of the combat simulation.

Item_YunTaiMarticalCoin.name: Battle Badge
Item_YunTaiMarticalCoin.description: Hone and prove your skills with Yu Lan at the Cloud Arena Martial Arts.
Item_YunTaiMarticalCoin.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Event Store.

Item_ClashRoyaleCoin.name: Proof of Precaution
Item_ClashRoyaleCoin.description: Proof of helping Hykros complete the City Siege drill.
Item_ClashRoyaleCoin.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Event Store.

Item_BreakFateBossCoin.name: Encirclement Coin
Item_BreakFateBossCoin.description: Splurging over a limited time can reverse your fate. This is your reward for helping your friends out of difficulty.
Item_BreakFateBossCoin.source: Can be used to redeem rewards in the Store.

Item_HalfAnniversaryCoin1.name: Jade Coin
Item_HalfAnniversaryCoin1.description: A currency obtained from the Jade Pavilion Fair. The design stands for the expectations that people have for this event, which hasn't been held in a long time. Chant a poem for the beautiful future of Domain 9.
Item_HalfAnniversaryCoin1.source: Can be used to redeem rewards in the Store.

Item_HalfAnniversaryCoin2.name: Jade Ingot
Item_HalfAnniversaryCoin2.description: A currency obtained from the Jade Pavilion Fair. Hand-made by the craftsmen of Domain 9 to look like an ingot, this year's coins are shinier than the ones twelve years ago.
Item_HalfAnniversaryCoin2.source: Can be used to redeem rewards in the Store.

Item_AnniversaryCoin.name: Commemorative Anniversary Medal
Item_AnniversaryCoin.description: Coins made of rare metals and engraved with exquisite patterns, can be worn on the chest as a medallion or exchanged for prizes.
Item_AnniversaryCoin.source: Can be used to redeem rewards in the Store.

Item_manasample_3.name: Neon Energy Pool
Item_manasample_3.description: Limited-time event currency. Used for donation conversion.
Item_manasample_3.source: Limited-time event currency. Used for donation conversion.

Item_Incarnation_03.name: Elite Battle Orders
Item_Incarnation_03.description: The mark of an elite vanguard. An order of battle, a sigil of glory.
Item_Incarnation_03.source: Turn in dynamic timestamps for elite battle orders, which can be exchanged for rewards at the Journey Store.

Item_VeraPoison_001.name: Revelation Seeds
Item_VeraPoison_001.description: Strange tree species that grow in the poisonous areas of the Miasmic Swamp. Different elemental ores create different reactions from the Brood.

Item_VeraPoison_002.name: Germinated Revelation Seeds
Item_VeraPoison_002.description: Sprouting revelation seeds obtained by defeating enemies from broods. They can wipe out the poisonous plants in the Miasmic Swamp.

Avatar_FishKing_007.name: Blue Angelfish
Avatar_FishKing_007.description: A blue fish with white stripes and gold accents. It's hard to believe such a stunning fish even exists!

Avatar_FishKing_008.name: Flashy Angelfish
Avatar_FishKing_008.description: A variant of the fairy fish. Its stripes resemble lightning, making them even rarer.

Avatar_FishKing_009.name: Black Tigerfly Fish
Avatar_FishKing_009.description: This fish with tiger-like markings likes to hide in coral reefs, hence the name.

Avatar_FishKing_010.name: Round Sea Bream
Avatar_FishKing_010.description: Common snapper with round white scales that look like pearls.

Avatar_FishKing_011.name: Blue Surgeonfish
Avatar_FishKing_011.description: There is a sharp thorn at the tail. Be careful not to cut yourself.

Avatar_FishKing_012.name: Purple Puffer
Avatar_FishKing_012.description: The purple patterns on their bodies swell when they're angry.

Avatar_FishKing_013.name: High-Back Fish
Avatar_FishKing_013.description: Their high back give them strong dorsal fins and balance, enabling them to survive the sea without fear of being pushed around by the waves.

Avatar_FishKing_014.name: Green Snapper
Avatar_FishKing_014.description: The cyan back and dark red belly make this snapper highly recognizable.

Avatar_FishKing_015.name: Scarlet Eye
Avatar_FishKing_015.description: A terrifying deep-sea fish characterized by its red eyes.

Avatar_FishKing_016.name: Golden Stripe Puffer
Avatar_FishKing_016.description: With its long body and black tiger-like stripes, it is among the strongest fish in the sea.

Avatar_FishKing_017.name: Bell Fish
Avatar_FishKing_017.description: Their color is as beautiful as a bellflower.

Avatar_FishKing_018.name: Fruit Goby
Avatar_FishKing_018.description: A school of these fish swimming together looks like a cornucopia of fruit and vegetables coming toward you.

Avatar_FishKing_019.name: Fantasy Fish
Avatar_FishKing_019.description: The purple body is coated with creamy white stripes which emit a dazzling light under the sun.

Avatar_FishKing_020.name: Silver Bone
Avatar_FishKing_020.description: Its body is almost completely transparent. You can see its bones.

Avatar_FishKing_021.name: Lemon Yellow
Avatar_FishKing_021.description: It looks like a big lemon from a distance. It shouldn't taste sour, right?

Avatar_FishKing_022.name: Cloudy Angelfish
Avatar_FishKing_022.description: The new variety of fairy fish looks like a painting of a sunset.

Avatar_FishKing_023.name: Red Mane Fish
Avatar_FishKing_023.description: The red dorsal fin is their most distinctive feature, but the patterns elsewhere are more random.

Avatar_FishKing_024.name: Changing Fish
Avatar_FishKing_024.description: The dazzling pattern can change into a variety of colors under the refraction of seawater.

Avatar_FishKing_025.name: Wingless
Avatar_FishKing_025.description: With their bright green appearance, these fish look like they have no eyes. In fact, it is merely a pattern, and their eyes are hidden between the patterns.

Avatar_FishKing_026.name: Sparky Fish
Avatar_FishKing_026.description: Catching this fish was a marvellous surprise. Its white pattern flashing in the sunshine as it came out of the water was dazzling.

Avatar_FishKing_027.name: Maroon Night Goby
Avatar_FishKing_027.description: A rare species of goby. Their neon-lit bodies can be seen roaming around the ocean depths.

Avatar_FishKing_028.name: Midnight Fish
Avatar_FishKing_028.description: Their patterns can be seen even in the deep sea. What could possibly be a more pleasant surprise than catching one under the moonlight?

Avatar_FishKing_029.name: Green-Blue Fish
Avatar_FishKing_029.description: Even the most brilliant turquoise is not as dazzling as they are!

Avatar_FishKing_030.name: Angry Fish
Avatar_FishKing_030.description: As deep-sea fish, they are free to choose how to grow their bodies. The spikes are for defense. Fish growing like into this form can naturally run rampant in the sea.

Avatar_FishKing_031.name: Spiky Sea Bream
Avatar_FishKing_031.description: Outliers among snappers, their bones grow outside of their body. They use their hard bones to defend against their natural enemies. Their hard armor makes them mighty and unyielding, but this one still took the bait.

Avatar_FishKing_032.name: Anchovy
Avatar_FishKing_032.description: Their long, beautiful fins are as majestic as a phoenix's tail.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_001.name: Black Carp
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_001.description: Prefers to live near the bottom of lakes or rivers. It is stout somewhat tubular. Its name comes from the blue-black fins and scales above its white abdomen.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_003.name: Bighead Carp
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_003.description: Named for its wide head and short, rounded snout. The short dorsal fin tends toward the rear half of the spine. The back and spine are relatively dark with irregular black markings.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_004.name: Lanternfish
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_004.description: It has a flat body and separated dorsal fins. Yellowish glands beneath the scales create the golden color.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_008.name: Scarlet Fin
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_008.description: It has a long, flat body, a stout back and abdomen, a continuous dorsal fin, and black fin stripes. It's known for being particularly delicious.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_012.name: Striped Goby
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_012.description: A slender goby with blue stripes, separate dorsal fins, and soft fin spines.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_014.name: Red Dragonfish
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_014.description: While primarily golden in color, its fins are red and its scales have reddish edges. The large, reflective scales almost resemble enchanting rubies.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_015.name: Silver Dragonfish
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_015.description: Its body is greenish-silver, its fins are grayish-blue, and its scales have silvery-white edges with blue-green spots.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_016.name: Golden Dragonfish
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_016.description: Its large, flat body and dazzling golden body give it a highly-prized, majestic appearance. It has a protruding abdomen and whisker-like barbels on the lower jaw.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_020.name: Snakehead
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_020.description: It has a wide, flat head and a cylindrical body that flattens near the end. The fins appear brightly-colored when underwater, but appear pale pink in the air.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_026.name: Cardinalfish
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_026.description: It has a tall, flat, oval body with a blunt snout, a small mouth, and an abnormally raised section just behind the head. Its body is covered with colorful, iridescent patches.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_027.name: Lava Bream
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_027.description: It has an oval body with a blunt snout, small mouth, green-black spine, and red abdomen. Its name comes from its small, burning-red scales.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_028.name: Yellow Mackerel
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_028.description: Its slender, yellow body has lighter-yellow markings on the back and green-blue fins.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_030.name: Vermilion Betta
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_030.description: Its body is reddish-orange with small pectoral fins and a long dorsal fin. The males are brighter and more aggressive.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_031.name: Red Goosehead Goldfish
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_031.description: Its body is short and thick with a continuous dorsal fin. The vivid contrast between its white body and the bright red spot on the top of its head makes it quite popular.

Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_035.name: Koi
Avatar_FishKing_Jiuyu_035.description: It features a strong body and vivid, colorful patterns that are unique to each individual. It is said that they bring good luck.

Title_1_4_7_1.name: Legendary Racer
Title_1_4_7_1.description: Rank 1 on Race Leaderboard at the results tally.

Title_1_4_7_2.name: Epic Racer
Title_1_4_7_2.description: Rank 2 on Race Leaderboard at the results tally.

Title_1_4_7_3.name: Star Racer
Title_1_4_7_3.description: Rank 3 on Race Leaderboard at the results tally.

Title_1_4_7_4.name: Elite Racer
Title_1_4_7_4.description: Rank 4 to 10 on Race Leaderboard at the results tally.

Title_1_1_12_1.name: Miasmic Swamp Seeker
Title_1_1_12_1.description: Title for reaching 100% Miasmic Swamp exploration.

item_SecretAction_101.name: Puncture Sample
item_SecretAction_101.description: Sample Info: Enemies with this sample have 50% increased HP, and they suffer 95% less damage when attacked within 20 meters.
item_SecretAction_101.source: Obtained by defeating enemies with corresponding marks on their heads in Vera: Miasmic Swamp during top-secret operations.

item_SecretAction_102.name: Hardshell Sample
item_SecretAction_102.description: Sample Info: Enemies with this sample have 50% increased HP, and they suffer 95% less damage except when attacked from behind.
item_SecretAction_102.source: Obtained by defeating enemies with corresponding marks on their heads in Vera: Miasmic Swamp during top-secret operations.

item_SecretAction_103.name: Armor Sample
item_SecretAction_103.description: Sample Info: Enemies with this sample have 50% increased HP, and they suffer 95% less damage except when attacked from above.
item_SecretAction_103.source: Obtained by defeating enemies with corresponding marks on their heads in Vera: Miasmic Swamp during top-secret operations.

item_SecretAction_104.name: Mono Sample
item_SecretAction_104.description: Sample Info: Enemies with this sample have 50% increased HP, and they suffer 95% less damage when there are other enemies within a 5-meter radius.
item_SecretAction_104.source: Obtained by defeating enemies with corresponding marks on their heads in Vera: Miasmic Swamp during top-secret operations.

item_SecretAction_105.name: Berserker Sample
item_SecretAction_105.description: Sample Info: Enemies with this sample have 100% increased HP, and they can fully recover HP 15 seconds after they enter battle.
item_SecretAction_105.source: Obtained by defeating enemies with corresponding marks on their heads in Vera: Miasmic Swamp during top-secret operations.

item_SecretAction_106.name: Flamebath Sample
item_SecretAction_106.description: Sample Info: Enemies with this sample have 50% increased HP. Once their HP reaches 0, they can only be defeated with a flame weapon.
item_SecretAction_106.source: Obtained by defeating enemies with corresponding marks on their heads in Vera: Miasmic Swamp during top-secret operations.

item_SecretAction_107.name: Frozen Sample
item_SecretAction_107.description: Sample Info: Enemies with this sample have 50% increased HP. Once their HP reaches 0, they can only be defeated with a frost weapon.
item_SecretAction_107.source: Obtained by defeating enemies with corresponding marks on their heads in Vera: Miasmic Swamp during top-secret operations.

item_SecretAction_108.name: Bolt Sample
item_SecretAction_108.description: Sample Info: Enemies with this sample have 50% increased HP. Once their HP reaches 0, they can only be defeated with a volt weapon.
item_SecretAction_108.source: Obtained by defeating enemies with corresponding marks on their heads in Vera: Miasmic Swamp during top-secret operations.

item_SecretAction_109.name: Resistance Sample
item_SecretAction_109.description: Sample Info: Enemies with this sample have 50% increased HP. Once their HP reaches 0, they can only be defeated with a physical weapon.
item_SecretAction_109.source: Obtained by defeating enemies with corresponding marks on their heads in Vera: Miasmic Swamp during top-secret operations.

wumi.name: Umi
wumi.description: Bang Bang Bang! There you have it. Vera's most mysterious and elegant magician, Umi!

adaptive_matrix_SSR1.name: Meryl Adaptive Matrix
adaptive_matrix_SSR1.description: Adaptive modular Matrix system capable of automatically changing into a desired Matrix.
adaptive_matrix_SSR1.source: After using, you are guaranteed to receive one of the following unobtained Matrices: Meryl: Swordfight Simulation, Meryl: Wake-Up Call, Meryl: Absolute Authority, or Meryl: Detached. If all Matrices listed have already been obtained, you will receive one of them at random.

adaptive_matrix_SSR2.name: Tsubasa Adaptive Matrix
adaptive_matrix_SSR2.description: Adaptive modular Matrix system capable of automatically changing into a desired Matrix.
adaptive_matrix_SSR2.source: After using, you are guaranteed to receive one of the following unobtained Matrices: Tsubasa: Weather Vane, Tsubasa: Gravitator, Tsubasa: Drifter, or Tsubasa: Stone Cold. If all Matrices listed have already been obtained, you will receive one of them at random.

adaptive_matrix_SSR3.source: After using, you are guaranteed to receive one of the following unobtained Matrices: Cocoritter: Artistic Instinct, Cocoritter: Identity Overlap, Cocoritter: Caregiver, or Cocoritter: Helper. If all Matrices listed have already been obtained, you will receive one of them at random.

adaptive_matrix_SSR4.name: KING Adaptive Matrix
adaptive_matrix_SSR4.description: Adaptive modular Matrix system capable of automatically changing into a desired Matrix.
adaptive_matrix_SSR4.source: After using, you are guaranteed to receive one of the following unobtained Matrices: KING: Underground Ruler, KING: Live to Fight, KING: Thrillseeker, or KING: One Man Army. If all Matrices listed have already been obtained, you will receive one of them at random.

adaptive_matrix_SSR7.name: Shiro Adaptive Matrix

adaptive_matrix_SSR7.source: After using, you are guaranteed to receive one of the following unobtained Matrices: Shiro: Isolated, Shiro: Longing for Sea, Shiro: Great Singer, or Shiro: Cat-like. If all Matrices listed have already been obtained, you will receive one of them at random.

adaptive_matrix_SSR8.name: Zero Adaptive Matrix

adaptive_matrix_SSR8.source: After using, you are guaranteed to receive one of the following unobtained Matrices: Zero: Paranormal Calculation, Zero: Terminal Protocol, Zero: Info Sort, or Zero: Survival of Fittest. If all Matrices listed have already been obtained, you will receive one of them at random.

adaptive_matrix_SSR9.name: Samir Adaptive Matrix

adaptive_matrix_SSR9.source: After using, you are guaranteed to receive one of the following unobtained Matrices: Samir: Just Kidding, Samir: Dearly Departed, Samir: Silver Bullet, or Samir: Future Focus. If all Matrices listed have already been obtained, you will receive one of them at random.

adaptive_matrix_SSR10.name: Huma Adaptive Matrix
adaptive_matrix_SSR10.description: Adaptive modular Matrix system capable of automatically changing into a desired Matrix.
adaptive_matrix_SSR10.source: After using, you are guaranteed to receive one of the following unobtained Matrices: Huma: Disoriented, Huma: Blank Slate, Huma: Easy Does It, or Huma: Innocent. If all Matrices listed have already been obtained, you will receive one of them at random.

adaptive_matrix_SSR11.name: Crow Adaptive Matrix
adaptive_matrix_SSR11.description: Adaptive modular Matrix system capable of automatically changing into a desired Matrix.
adaptive_matrix_SSR11.source: After using, you are guaranteed to receive one of the following unobtained Matrices: Crow: Eleventh Dimension, Crow: Formitized, Crow: Dire Survivor, or Crow: Rendition. If all Matrices listed have already been obtained, you will receive one of them at random.

adaptive_matrix_SR6.description: Adaptive modular Matrix system capable of automatically changing into a desired Matrix.
adaptive_matrix_SR6.source: After using, you are guaranteed to receive one of the following unobtained Matrices: Pepper: Assembly Line, Pepper: Surgical Scar, Pepper: Armband, or Pepper: Sleeping Pill. If all Matrices listed have already been obtained, you will receive one of them at random.

adaptive_matrix_SR7.source: After using, you are guaranteed to receive one of the following unobtained Matrices: Hilda: Acumen, Hilda: Dockbred, Hilda: Haggler, or Hilda: Smash Ball. If all Matrices listed have already been obtained, you will receive one of them at random.

adaptive_matrix_SR8.source: After using, you are guaranteed to receive one of the following unobtained Matrices: Ene: Competitive, Ene: Loose Cannon, Ene: Second Life, or Ene: Family Photo. If all Matrices listed have already been obtained, you will receive one of them at random.

adaptive_matrix_SR9.name: Bai Ling Adaptive Matrix
adaptive_matrix_SR9.description: Adaptive modular Matrix system capable of automatically changing into a desired Matrix.
adaptive_matrix_SR9.source: After using, you are guaranteed to receive one of the following unobtained Matrices: Bai Ling: Diverse, Bai Ling: Dissipation, Bai Ling: Fair Trade, or Bai Ling: Nth Power. If all Matrices listed have already been obtained, you will receive one of them at random.

adaptive_matrix_SR12.name: Echo Adaptive Matrix
adaptive_matrix_SR12.description: Adaptive modular Matrix system capable of automatically changing into a desired Matrix.
adaptive_matrix_SR12.source: After using, you are guaranteed to receive one of the following unobtained Matrices: Echo: Until the End, Echo: Post Crisis, Echo: Black or White, or Echo: Homesick. If all Matrices listed have already been obtained, you will receive one of them at random.

Mount_Racing_002.name: Mammoth
Mount_Racing_002.description: This superb car resembles a rushing mammoth when traversing treacherous terrain at high speeds.

Title_1_1_13_1.name: Grand Sea Rover
Title_1_1_13_1.description: Title for reaching 100% Grand Sea exploration.

Title_1_1_15_1.name: Volcano Prospector
Title_1_1_15_1.description: Title for reaching 100% Dragon Breath Volcano exploration.

Title_1_1_16_1.name: Secluded Rock Seeker
Title_1_1_16_1.description: Title for reaching 100% Secluded Rock Cavern exploration.

MountWater1_a.name: Diamond Wings: Engine
MountWater1_a.description: The engine of Diamond Wings, the solo underwater thruster. It is one of the core components.

MountWater1_b.name: Diamond Wings: Frame
MountWater1_b.description: The frame of Diamond Wings, the solo underwater thruster. It is one of the core components.

MountWater1_c.name: Diamond Wings: Booster Fin
MountWater1_c.description: Booster fin of Diamond Wings, the solo underwater thruster. It is one of the core components.

MountWater1_d.name: Diamond Wings: Dorsal Fin
MountWater1_d.description: Dorsal fin of Diamond Wings, the solo underwater thruster. It is one of the core components.

MountWater2_a.name: Vision Sphere: Cabin
MountWater2_a.description: The view is good, but it's better to add a device to scrape off the seaweed that sticks on the window...

MountWater2_b.name: Vision Sphere: Engine
MountWater2_b.description: In fact, when resurfacing, it doesn't contract like a jellyfish every once in a while... It's a machine, after all.

MountWater3.name: Sunfish
MountWater3.description: The way it swims by propelling through the water is lithe and graceful like gliding in the air. Its delicate design allows it to move efficiently without disturbing the undersea creatures.

item_BurgerKing_Whopper.name: Whopper
item_BurgerKing_Whopper.description: A popular product made with a carefully grilled beef patty, crunchy and fresh lettuce, juicy tomato slices, and refreshing pickles.

Avatar_FishKing_033.name: Lightning Eel
Avatar_FishKing_033.description: The slender rainbow figure is so inviting, but danger lurks behind such temptation.

Avatar_FishKing_034.name: Puffy Fish
Avatar_FishKing_034.description: Its puffed-up body serves to display its grand resentment of being caught.

Avatar_FishKing_035.name: Angry Puffy Fish
Avatar_FishKing_035.description: It's only natural to be angry when you get pulled up from the warm waters you call home.

Avatar_FishKing_036.name: Cross Fish
Avatar_FishKing_036.description: It is often used as an ornamental fish because of its beautiful tail.

Avatar_FishKing_037.name: Floppy Fish
Avatar_FishKing_037.description: Many people who do not know better will think that it's just a half-eaten fish put back to the sea.

Avatar_FishKing_038.name: Red Comet
Avatar_FishKing_038.description: Living in warmer waters gives them a reddish color. They swim so fast that they would occasionally wander into shallow water.

Avatar_FishKing_039.name: Lionfish
Avatar_FishKing_039.description: It normally likes to hide in the coral reef. The poisonous spines all over its body are not only dangerous, but also make it easy for the fish to get entangled in the fishing line.

Avatar_FishKing_040.name: Angry Lionfish
Avatar_FishKing_040.description: It prefers warmer waters. The fish struggles harder when it leaves the water, making it more likely to be entangled by the fishing line.

Avatar46.name: Fantasy Trip
Avatar46.description: Look back and feel the wonder of this adventure. Happy anniversary!

yikaluosi.name: Icarus
yikaluosi.description: Forever striving to reach what can never be attained.

Fireworks.name: Flower Frenzy
Fireworks.description: Woosh... Bang! Wishing you wealth and luck under the firework sky.
Fireworks.source: Can be used to make custom fireworks.

Fireworks_used.name: Flower Frenzy (Custom)
Fireworks_used.description: Woosh... Bang! Wishing you wealth and luck under the firework sky.
Fireworks_used.source: Set it off on the firework podium during the event.

feiouna.name: Fiona
feiouna.description: A bright tomorrow must be forged by our hands.

MountWater5.name: Drifter
MountWater5.description: Suitable for calm water, looking very comfortable as it moves quickly while drawing beautiful ripples. It can also handle certain wind speeds and waves. (Only usable on water and the ocean.)

Title_1_1_17_1.name: Dark Source Wanderer
Title_1_1_17_1.description: Title for reaching 100% Dark Source Cave exploration.

Title_1_6_1_7.name: Incense Tracker
Title_1_6_1_7.description: Unlocks through the Candlelight Banquet event.

Title_1_6_1_8.name: Final Nightmare
Title_1_6_1_8.description: Unlocks through the Nightmare's Edge event.

genuonuo.name: Gnonno
genuonuo.description: She looks like she would never lose curiosity about the world and what lies beyond, no matter what happens.

MountWater6.name: Tamed Dragon-neck
MountWater6.description: Domesticated dragon-necked turtles are free to cruise about the Deep Sea. The spines on their shells go through a procedure to ensure that there is no longer any poison to pose any risk. Can only be used in the Deep Sea.

Title_1_6_3_1.name: Endless Expedition
Title_1_6_3_1.description: Unlocks within the time limit every week by clearing the Raid on Challenging difficulty.

Title_1_6_1_9.name: Domain 9 Morning Call
Title_1_6_1_9.description: Unlocks through the Domain 9 Strategics event.

Title_1_6_1_10.name: Forgeborn
Title_1_6_1_10.description: Unlocks in the World Forge event.

Item_JiuYu_YN_001.name: Field Energy (Vermilion)
Item_JiuYu_YN_001.description: Special energy crystals spread throughout Domain 9. Can be used to charge timestamp technologies such as statues.
Item_JiuYu_YN_001.source: Field energy (Vermilion) can be used to upgrade Vermilion Statues, granting additional buffs.

Item_JiuYu_YN_002.name: Field Energy (Azure)
Item_JiuYu_YN_002.description: Special energy crystals spread throughout Domain 9. Can be used to charge timestamp technologies such as statues.
Item_JiuYu_YN_002.source: Field energy (Azure) can be used to upgrade Azure Statues, granting additional buffs.

Item_JiuYu_YN_003.name: Field Energy (Alabaster)
Item_JiuYu_YN_003.description: Special energy crystals spread throughout Domain 9. Can be used to charge timestamp technologies such as statues.
Item_JiuYu_YN_003.source: Field energy (Alabaster) can be used to upgrade Alabaster Statues, granting additional buffs.

Item_JiuYu_YN_004.name: Field Energy (Onyx)
Item_JiuYu_YN_004.description: Special energy crystals spread throughout Domain 9. Can be used to charge timestamp technologies such as statues.
Item_JiuYu_YN_004.source: Field energy (Onyx) can be used to upgrade Onyx Statues, granting additional buffs.

leibiliya.name: Rubilia
leibiliya.description: Form doesn't matter as much as significance.

Mount_019.name: Enigmatic Stag
Mount_019.description: Prototyped after a deer, this vehicle can be powered and piloted through the use of timestamp energy. Its four-legged design renders it well-suited for the mountainous terrain of Domain 9, with the trade-off being a rather bumpy ride.

Mount_020.name: Bionic Hornmane
Mount_020.description: A byproduct of Yuheng's research, these creatures were cultivated using genetic technology to assimilate information on the Darkness obtained in combat. Although it resembles an organic hornmane, it will not attack humans. This has allowed some to use them as mounts.

Mount_020_a.name: Taming Bell
Mount_020_a.description: Necessary for controlling Bionic Hornmanes. Through this device, the hornmane gains the ability to understand and obey instructions.

Mount_020_b.name: Hornmane: Power Core
Mount_020_b.description: Auxiliary exoskeleton energy source of the Bionic Hornmane. Improves durability upon installation.

Mount_021.name: Tamed Tricoon
Mount_021.description: A tricoon tamed from a young age. It is gentle and docile, and can be used as a mount. It is highly intelligent and can understand some human language with training, making it an excellent companion.

Time_artifact_001.name: Cybernetic Arm (3d)
Time_artifact_001.description: Fire a Cybernetic Arm to pull the target in.
Time_artifact_001.source: Fire a Cybernetic Arm to pull the selected target to you, or you to the target. Deal <shuzhi>100%</> damage on hit, <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target, and regenerate weapon charge by <shuzhi>300</>. Can be used to access hard-to-reach areas, and stores up to <shuzhi>2</> charges at a time. Regain <shuzhi>1</> charge every <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

Item_JiuYu_quest_e60020_1.name: Bloody Letter
Item_JiuYu_quest_e60020_1.description: An exquisite letter stained by blood. Feels cold to the touch.
Item_JiuYu_quest_e60020_1.source: Used for the Dark Wretch in the Forest mission.

Item_JiuYu_quest_e60020_2.name: Small Dice
Item_JiuYu_quest_e60020_2.description: A hollow dice with a red bean inside. It seems to be an important thing as it was placed in the pocket closest to the body.
Item_JiuYu_quest_e60020_2.source: Used for the Dark Wretch in the Forest mission.

Item_JiuYu_quest_e60020_3.name: Frosty Wild Super Quartet Bracelet
Item_JiuYu_quest_e60020_3.description: Looks like a crystal bangle sold in the market. It is made of glass and too small. Completely unwearable.
Item_JiuYu_quest_e60020_3.source: " Henceforth, you are a member of the Frosty Wild Super Quartet!"

Item_JiuYu_quest_e60010_4.name: Ruo's Kite
Item_JiuYu_quest_e60010_4.description: Traditional handicraft of Domain 9 handmade by Ruo. A gift for Master Yu Lan.
Item_JiuYu_quest_e60010_4.source: Used for the Boxing Legacy mission.

Item_JiuYu_quest_e60010_1.name: Yu Lan's Hand-Minced Meatballs
Item_JiuYu_quest_e60010_1.description: Handmade by Yu Lan. Mix the meat and seasoning evenly, then pound it and roll it into balls with a delicate and sweet taste.
Item_JiuYu_quest_e60010_1.source: Jump height +100% for 10 minutes after consumption.

Item_JiuYu_quest_e60010_2.name: Yu Lan's Leg-Split Bamboo Rice
Item_JiuYu_quest_e60010_2.description: Handmade by Yu Lan. Gather bamboo split during training, stuff them with some meat and glutinous rice, then cook them. A masterpiece that's both fragrant and delicious.

Item_JiuYu_quest_e60023_1.name: Xiu Chun's Handmade Buns
Item_JiuYu_quest_e60023_1.description: Handmade buns made by Xiu Chun from the steamed bun shop in Yuhua Quarter. Their thin skin, tender filling, freshness, and lack of greasiness make them loved by all the locals.
Item_JiuYu_quest_e60023_1.source: Jump height +50% for 5 minutes after consumption.

Item_JiuYu_quest_e60010_3.name: Yuhua Quarter Tang Hulu
Item_JiuYu_quest_e60010_3.description: Skewer hawthorns on bamboo sticks, then sprinkle on some maltose sugar and sesame. A combination of sweet and sour.

Avatar_85.name: Harrah
Avatar_85.description: The hunter is also the hunted.

Avatar_86.name: Let's Write
Avatar_86.description: Let's write with Liu Huo! Huh? Did I write something wrong?

Avatar_87.name: Scholar
Avatar_87.description: If you stay still, everything will be solid as steel.

Avatar_88.name: Vermilion Fairy
Avatar_88.description: I'm a natural beauty and intelligent beyond compare, and my skill in martial arts is... outstanding! My legend will be passed down for generations throughout the world.

Avatar_89.name: Maple Girl
Avatar_89.description: Named after maple leaves that can be seen anywhere in Ignisville. It's more like a spiritual pursuit of hermitage in the city.

Avatar_90.name: Reed Warrior
Avatar_90.description: I go to school and help out with the housework from Monday through Friday, and I practice martial arts on the weekend. Reed Warrior's daily routine is both disciplined and respectful.

Avatar_92.name: Huang's Arrival
Avatar_92.description: The beautiful and pleasing spring has arrived with Madam Huang.

Avatar_93.name: Zhuyan
Avatar_93.description: Something bad happens every time it appears. Since then, people referred to it as an ancient mythical creature.

Avatar_94.name: Zongyun's Vision
Avatar_94.description: It's got dragon horns and tails.

Avatar_95.name: Excited Tata
Avatar_95.description: National Maritime Museum Collab Rewards. Sun, beach, sea waves, and—new friends from the ocean! Weeeeeeee!

AvatarFrame_86.name: Write 'Em Up
AvatarFrame_86.description: Look beyond the words! The goal is to excel in both writing and martial arts!

AvatarFrame_87.name: Painting
AvatarFrame_87.description: Even though it's been rated as an inferior piece of work, the sentiment it holds is undeniable. To the beloved Ignisville.

AvatarFrame_88.name: Fairy's Dressing Case
AvatarFrame_88.description: To keep your elegancy 24/7, please carry this at all times.

AvatarFrame_89.name: Maple & Jade
AvatarFrame_89.description: The maple leaf dyes the memory, and everyone finds their own path at the end.

AvatarFrame_90.name: In the Name of Warriorhood
AvatarFrame_90.description: It's a long way with heavy burdens to become a warrior. Let's wait and see.

AvatarFrame_91.name: Full Moon Reunion
AvatarFrame_91.description: May we enjoy the beautiful scenery of Jade Pavilion together.

AvatarFrame_92.name: Bamboo Court Clear Skies
AvatarFrame_92.description: The scenery of flowers in bloom under a clear sky is right here.

AvatarFrame_93.name: Bronze Shackles
AvatarFrame_93.description: It is not only power that will be released once it has been unshackled.

AvatarFrame_94.name: Clear Clouds
AvatarFrame_94.description: Watch the clouds return as you ride the azure dragon.

AvatarFrame_95.name: Shy Sprigy
AvatarFrame_95.description: National Ocean Museum Collab Rewards. "Hmm... Ahem..." She is a giant squid and goes by the name, Sprigy.

chat_qipao_87.name: Recitation
chat_qipao_87.description: The next is a poem composed and recited by Liu Huo... Listen up.

chat_qipao_88.name: Melodious Echo
chat_qipao_88.description: Many years later when you look back at this sweaty afternoon under the waterfall, can you still hear those words of encouragement?

chat_qipao_89.name: Ingenious Design
chat_qipao_89.description: The Maple Girl has a pure heart and the demeanor of a noble lady.

chat_qipao_90.name: Chivalrous Essentials
chat_qipao_90.description: A person is a reed with thoughts, and a chivalrous person is someone with a rebellious heart toward destiny and oneself.

chat_qipao_91.name: Bright Evening Lights
chat_qipao_91.description: A beautiful occasion on a full moon night.

chat_qipao_92.name: Forest Whispers
chat_qipao_92.description: Shh! The birds, the beasts, and the flowers are all whispering.

chat_qipao_94.name: Soaring Dragon
chat_qipao_94.description: Words travel fast, on the tongue of a dragon!

chat_qipao_95.name: Shy Sprigy
chat_qipao_95.description: National Ocean Museum Collab Rewards. "Hmm... Ahem..." She is a giant squid and goes by the name, Sprigy.

liuhuo.name: Liu Huo
liuhuo.description: Also known as "The blaze of Ignisville"!

mahjong_back_1.name: Red Maple Dolly
mahjong_back_1.description: Dolly's cuteness can distract the enemy. But don't get distracted yourself!
mahjong_back_1.source: Dolly's cuteness can distract the enemy. But don't get distracted yourself!

mahjong_back_2.name: Zhuque Tile (Limited-Time)
mahjong_back_2.description: The Zhuque tile goes best with snacks!
mahjong_back_2.source: Unlock a Mahjong Tile Background for 7 days. Multiple purchases will extend the validity.

mahjong_back_3.name: Master of Zhen Gong (Limited-Time)
mahjong_back_3.description: The little tile requires much strategy, but despite that, luck is also necessary.
mahjong_back_3.source: Unlock a Mahjong Tile Background for 7 days. Multiple purchases will extend the validity.

mahjong_back_4.name: I Won!? (Limited-Time)
mahjong_back_4.description: I'm calling it a win!! A long hand? What?! 1, 2, 3... 14. So what if I have an extra tile?!
mahjong_back_4.source: Unlock a Mahjong Tile Background for 7 days. Multiple purchases will extend the validity.

mahjong_table_2.name: Visitors from Outside (Limited-Time)
mahjong_table_2.description: Travelers from beyond the celestial gate: are you ready to begin a new adventure?
mahjong_table_2.source: Unlock a Mahjong tabletop for 7 days. Multiple purchases will extend the validity.

mahjong_table_3.name: Summer Break (Limited-Time)
mahjong_table_3.description: Playing with friends by the sea on a bright summer day. All that's missing is an ice-cold drink!
mahjong_table_3.source: Unlock a Mahjong tabletop for 7 days. Multiple purchases will extend the validity.

mahjong_table_4.name: Moonlit Haze (Limited-Time)
mahjong_table_4.description: As the moon bathes the world in its soft, pale glow, it whispers silently to the flowers, stirring them from their dreams.
mahjong_table_4.source: Unlock a Mahjong tabletop for 7 days. Multiple purchases will extend the validity.

cardgame_table_1.name: Lucky Mi-a
cardgame_table_1.description: Lucky Mi-a has red packets for everyone! Come get yours!

cardgame_table_2.name: Visitors from Outside (Limited-Time)
cardgame_table_2.description: Travelers from beyond the celestial gate: are you ready to begin a new adventure?
cardgame_table_2.source: Unlock a Fight the Landlord tabletop for 7 days. Multiple purchases will extend the validity.

cardgame_table_3.source: Unlock a Fight the Landlord tabletop for 7 days. Multiple purchases will extend the validity.

Title_1_9_0_5.description: Obtain by reaching the Diamond Mentor level.

yulan.name: Yu Lan
yulan.description: The path of practice is rather difficult. Are you ready for it?

Mount006_32_Skin_01.name: Starlit Cosmos
Mount006_32_Skin_01.description: Manufactured using Hykros's latest technology, this high-power engine motorbike is a necessity that can only be obtained through limited means.

Title_1_1_22_1.name: Cloudpeak Pursuit
Title_1_1_22_1.description: Title for reaching 100% Cloudpeak Manor exploration.

Avatar_suoni.name: Smart Keeper 2.0
Avatar_suoni.description: Shall I plan your itinerary, Master?

AvatarFrame_suoni.name: Game Time
AvatarFrame_suoni.description: Is there a mode beyond Hard Difficulty?

chat_qipao_suoni.name: Pro Gamer
chat_qipao_suoni.description: Master of the art of games.

mingjing.name: Ming Jing
mingjing.description: Maybe he hasn't changed at all, and it's just that he doesn't realize it yet.

Item_JiuYu_quest_e600400_1.name: Energy Core
Item_JiuYu_quest_e600400_1.description: Zhuyan's energy core contains the power required to start the smart servant.
Item_JiuYu_quest_e600400_1.source: Used for the Heart of the Sparrow mission.

Item_JiuYu_quest_e600400_2.name: Sparrow Shell
Item_JiuYu_quest_e600400_2.description: A lightweight yet sturdy metal shell forged to look like a sparrow.
Item_JiuYu_quest_e600400_2.source: Used for the Heart of the Sparrow mission.

Item_JiuYu_quest_e600400_3.name: Dark Jade Eyes
Item_JiuYu_quest_e600400_3.description: Made from jade, these bird eyes look just like the real thing.
Item_JiuYu_quest_e600400_3.source: Used for the Heart of the Sparrow mission.

Item_e600050_1.name: Mung Bean Rice Cake
Item_e600050_1.description: A specialty of Domain 9, the cake's design and flavor are both very local. Those from Mirroria probably have never eaten something like this.

Item_e600050_2.name: Safeguard Bracelet
Item_e600050_2.description: An accessory available from the Jade Pavilion Fair. Red is a common color on decorations in Domain 9.

Item_e600050_3.name: Modified Safeguard Bracelet
Item_e600050_3.description: Shelly added some mechanical modifications to the safeguard bracelet from the fair. Stay safe!

Item_e600050_4.name: Shelly's Custom Ceramic Bowl
Item_e600050_4.description: A ceramic bowl crafted to Shelly's specifications. The only thing that the craftsman had to say about her choice of graphic was, "ridiculous."

Title_1_4_8_6.name: Fog Reconstructor
Title_1_4_8_6.description: Ranked first place in Crew points during Fog Reconstruction. Valid until the next Crew event starts.

Title_1_4_8_7.name: Fog Remover
Title_1_4_8_7.description: Ranked second place in Crew points during Fog Reconstruction. Valid until the next Crew event starts.

Title_1_4_8_8.name: Fog Declarer
Title_1_4_8_8.description: Ranked third place in Crew points during Fog Reconstruction. Valid until the next Crew event starts.

Title_1_4_8_4.name: Confounding Labyrinth Elimination
Title_1_4_8_4.description: Defeat the final boss in Fog Reconstruction stage 1.

Title_1_4_8_5.name: Etching Maze Cleanup
Title_1_4_8_5.description: Defeat the final boss in Fog Reconstruction stage 2 level 5.

Title_1_8_0_1.name: Taotie's Nemesis
Title_1_8_0_1.description: Rank Top 8 in the Limited-Time Raid at the results tally.

Title_1_8_0_4.name: Gluttony Judgment
Title_1_8_0_4.description: Rank 9–24 in the Limited-Time Raid at the results tally.

Title_1_8_0_5.name: Abstinence Warrior
Title_1_8_0_5.description: Rank 25–100 in the Limited-Time Raid at the results tally.

Mount_Racing_003.name: Bluefrost Bloom
Mount_Racing_003.description: A confidential product from Hykros's Vehicle Research Lab. It incorporates some of the latest technology, which still requires testing. Can only be claimed via limited means.

mimi.name: Mimi Is Here
mimi.description: Hey, hey! Madam Huang is speaking to you!

linghan.name: Ling Han
linghan.description: Ling Han, Chief of the Marshville Domain Guards, reporting in.

Mount_022.name: Floating Bubble
Mount_022.description: Soft, light and most importantly, it's gorgeous! Collect 3 to unlock the National Maritime Museum collab vehicle Floating Bubble.

Mount_023.name: Ink Fox
Mount_023.description: A tamed ink fox, bright, adorable, and very approachable. It can be mounted.

Mount_024.name: Taming Potion Pack
Mount_024.description: A scientific research achievement of the Wildlife Research Institute. Users of this potion tend to become docile.

Item_PermanentCommonAtk25.name: Power Shot
Item_PermanentCommonAtk25.description: A bio-injection developed by Hykros to improve the offensive ability of Executors. After use, all attack is permanently increased.
Item_PermanentCommonAtk25.source: Use it to permanently increase all attack by 25.

Item_PermanentHealth1200.name: Source Shot
Item_PermanentHealth1200.description: A bio-injection developed by Hykros to improve the survivability of Executors. After use, HP is permanently increased.
Item_PermanentHealth1200.source: Use it to permanently increase HP by 1,200.

Avatar_97.name: Heartsong
Avatar_97.description: "Things are looking up." I certainly hope this is more than just empty words of encouragement...

Avatar_98.name: Summer Break
Avatar_98.description: Mi-a is on vacation. Program has been halted!

Avatar_99.name: Shirli: Journey
Avatar_99.description: It's me, Shirli, and I'm looking forward to taking on this journey with you!

Avatar_100.name: Nemesis: New Life
Avatar_100.description: Oh, it's you again, Wanderer. I mean, it's been a while... How have you been lately?

Avatar_101.name: Seaside Beauty
Avatar_101.description: Dance with the sea, embracing with tenderness.

Avatar_102.name: Sparrotail
Avatar_102.description: An elite Domain Guard of Ignisville under the leadership of Zhuque. Each bears distinct fates under their standardized equipment.

Avatar_103.name: Snowy
Avatar_103.description: Snowy, the latest smart servant, reports to you!

AvatarFrame_96.name: Dragon Cloud & Jade Leaf
AvatarFrame_96.description: The dragon soars over the forest as the wind whips over Joltville's moon.

AvatarFrame_97.name: Vase
AvatarFrame_97.description: "She's just a flower they keep around because she looks good." Someone from the last team actually dared to say this, thinking she was out of earshot.

AvatarFrame_98.name: Under the Sunglasses
AvatarFrame_98.description: Putting on filters makes even summer days cool and refreshing!

AvatarFrame_100.name: Embracing New Life
AvatarFrame_100.description: I'm still not quite used to these arms, so I've been practicing how to hug lately...

AvatarFrame_101.name: Rugged
AvatarFrame_101.description: The waves shimmer with the play of light, as radiant as the moon.

AvatarFrame_102.name: In the Name of Zhuque
AvatarFrame_102.description: Every elite member who joins the Sparrotails has taken an oath in the presence of Lady Zhuque.

AvatarFrame_103.name: Ear Touch
AvatarFrame_103.description: These are the ears of a tiger, not a cat!

chat_qipao_96.name: Unstoppable
chat_qipao_96.description: Tianzhang Pavilion will never falter, and neither will I!

chat_qipao_97.name: Virtual Chat
chat_qipao_97.description: How far is it from silent exchange of words on paper to face-to-face communication?

chat_qipao_98.name: Summer Souvenir
chat_qipao_98.description: By the beach, under the parasol, a cool breeze is by my ears, and memories are in my heart.

chat_qipao_100.name: Emerging New Life
chat_qipao_100.description: I'm doing my best to decode the message you sent...

chat_qipao_101.name: Icy Stroll
chat_qipao_101.description: Walk lightly on the beach and feel the icy sensation underfoot.

chat_qipao_102.name: Ignisville Comm Channel
chat_qipao_102.description: This channel is reserved for internal Sparrotail communications only. Unauthorized disclosure is prohibited and will result in legal action.

animated_qipao_1.name: Poetic Inspiration
animated_qipao_1.description: Joy and sorrow, separation and reunion, phases of the moon and sun. With whom can these poetic sentiments be shared?

Item_BigWorldSnow.name: Unmelted Snow
Item_BigWorldSnow.description: A lump of freshly collected snow. Looks very clean.
Item_BigWorldSnow.source: At the very least, it can be used to make a snowman.

Mount025_skin_02.name: Archeagle
Mount025_skin_02.description: A tamed archeagle, gentle and no longer aggressive. Can be used as a vehicle.

Mount025_skin_03.name: Dazzling Archeagle
Mount025_skin_03.description: A tamed dazzling archeagle, gentle and no longer aggressive. Can be used as a vehicle.

Mount025_skin_04.name: Hornfeather
Mount025_skin_04.description: A tamed hornfeather, gentle and no longer aggressive. Can be used as a vehicle.

Mount025_skin_05.name: Crimson Hornfeather
Mount025_skin_05.description: A tamed crimson hornfeather, gentle and no longer aggressive. Can be used as a vehicle.

Mount025_skin_06.name: Nightmare Scourge
Mount025_skin_06.description: A tamed nightmare scourge, gentle and no longer aggressive. Can be used as a vehicle.

Mount025_skin_07.name: Thorny Nightmare Scourge
Mount025_skin_07.description: A tamed thorny nightmare scourge, gentle and no longer aggressive. Can be used as a vehicle.
Mount025_skin_07.source: Unlocks the vehicle, Thorny Nightmare Scourge.

Mount025_skin_08.name: Qilin
Mount025_skin_08.description: A tamed Qilin, gentle and no longer aggressive. Can be used as a vehicle.

linghan_lv2.name: Ling Han: Awakened
linghan_lv2.description: The beast is about to be unleashed, and the fight is upon us.

feise_lv2.name: Fei Se: Awakened
feise_lv2.description: Her eyes are sweet, her gaze so deep, the story of life she sees.

mimi_lv2.name: Mimi: Awakened
mimi_lv2.description: Bamboo births rare blooms. When will they enchant us next?

mingjing_lv2.name: Ming Jing: Awakened
mingjing_lv2.description: The weight of duty is immense, but I shoulder it with a bittersweet resolve.

peipei_lv2.name: Outstanding Nurse Award
peipei_lv2.description: After my nap, I found a tiny cake adorned with heart-shaped cherries on the table—surely, this is the recognition my hard work deserves!

moliniya.name: Travel Application
moliniya.description: No matter how obedient a child is, when pushed to the limit, they might be forced to speak half-truths and lies, right?

TicketCard01.name: Orion Lucky Points: Phase One
TicketCard01.description: Obtain to get one Orion Lucky Card: Phase One scratch-off.

TicketCard02.name: Venus Lucky Points: Phase One
TicketCard02.description: Obtain to get one Venus Lucky Card: Phase One scratch-off.

TicketCard03.name: Orion Lucky Points: Phase Two
TicketCard03.description: Obtain to get one Orion Lucky Card: Phase Two scratch-off.

TicketCard04.name: Venus Lucky Points: Phase Two
TicketCard04.description: Obtain to get one Venus Lucky Card: Phase Two scratch-off.

TicketCard05.name: Orion Lucky Points: Phase Three
TicketCard05.description: Obtain to get one Orion Lucky Card: Phase Three scratch-off.

TicketCard06.name: Venus Lucky Points: Phase Three
TicketCard06.description: Obtain to get one Venus Lucky Card: Phase Three scratch-off.

HXXK_clue.name: Look for clues
HXXK_clue.description: A special clue provided by the Comet Monthly Editorial Department. It assists readers in completing missions and exchanging them for stamps more efficiently.

AvatarFrame_107.name: Silken Plume
AvatarFrame_107.description: Listen! In the hush of night, bats dance and night ravens sing their eerie song. Shadowy feathers drift silently down—was it merely the wind, or something more that whispered along?

chat_qipao_107.name: Adornment Scroll
chat_qipao_107.description: Unfurl the scroll to reveal mysterious writings. Beware, those unreadable characters might contain the secrets of the night.

bag_chat_qipao107.name: Night Mask Giftbox
bag_chat_qipao107.description: Listen! In the hush of night, bats dance and night ravens sing their eerie song. Shadowy feathers drift silently down—was it merely the wind, or something more that whispered along?
bag_chat_qipao107.source: Use to get the avatar Night Mask, avatar frame Silken Plume, and chat bubble Adornment Scroll.

fashion_dress_58_4.name: Silken Adornment
fashion_dress_58_4.description: Screaming pumpkin puppets in a lively masquerade. Wear it to shine in the spotlight on the stage or vanish into the night, leaving behind only a trace of crimson and a whispering breeze.

Hat_73_4_4.name: Crimson Bat
Hat_73_4_4.description: A crimson bat dances with you in the quiet night. Careful not to be spooked.

fashion_decoration_91_4.name: Tiny Devil
fashion_decoration_91_4.description: Beware of the tiny devils lurking in the night. Watch your neck!

Avatar_Overseas_10.name: Ruby: T Pose
Avatar_Overseas_10.description: Lin... Why can't I control... my own hands?

Avatar_Overseas_11.name: Lin: T Pose
Avatar_Overseas_11.description: I can't dance... Like I said, I'm not an idol!

Avatar_korea_4.description: An avatar that commemorates the collaboration between Tower of Fantasy and Sunmi.
Avatar_korea_4.source: Obtained from an official website event.

AvatarFramekr_01.description: An avatar frame that commemorates the collaboration between Tower of Fantasy and Sunmi.
AvatarFramekr_01.source: Obtained from an official website event.

chat_qipao_kr_01.description: A chat bubble that commemorates the collaboration between Tower of Fantasy and Sunmi.
chat_qipao_kr_01.source: Obtained from an official website event.

bag_growup_20_os.description: Unlocks when the Wanderer reaches Lv. 20
bag_growup_20_os.source: Contains: Gold nucleus x10, weapon battery III x5, matrix data pack III x5, weapon development material box I x50, gold x50,000, Lv. 30 growth pack

bag_growup_30_os.description: Unlocks when the Wanderer reaches Lv. 30
bag_growup_30_os.source: Contains: Proof of purchase x10, weapon battery III x10, matrix data pack III x10, weapon development material box I x50, gold x50,000, booster module x20, advancement module x2, Lv. 40 growth pack

bag_growup_40_os.description: Unlocks when the Wanderer reaches Lv. 40

fragment_core_OS_orange.name: Fortress Combat Engine Shard
fragment_core_OS_orange.description: The newest creation from Hykros Equipment R&D. Provides the Executors with stat support.
fragment_core_OS_orange.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse the fortress combat engine.

fragment_visor_OS_orange.name: Fortress Tactics Eyepiece Shard
fragment_visor_OS_orange.description: The newest creation from Hykros Equipment R&D. Provides the Executors with stat support.
fragment_visor_OS_orange.source: Collect 40 to fuse the Fortress Tactics Eyepiece.

fragment_visor_OS_purple.name: Elite Tactics Eyepiece Shard
fragment_visor_OS_purple.description: Standard equipment of the Hykros Special Forces. It has helped them in many difficult tasks.
fragment_visor_OS_purple.source: Collect 20 to fuse the Elite Tactics Eyepiece

item_activity3_food1_os.name: Cocoa Powder
item_activity3_food1_os.description: Exquisite and sweet. Can be obtained by opening chests in Vera and participating in new gameplays, or by purchasing them directly from the Passionate Chocolatier at the Mirroria Food Plaza.

item_activity3_food2_os.name: Powdered Sugar
item_activity3_food2_os.description: Delicate and sweet, perfect for baking goodies. Can be obtained by opening chests in Vera and participating in new gameplays, or by purchasing them directly from the Passionate Chocolatier at the Mirroria Food Plaza.

item_activity3_food3_os.name: Coffee Beans
item_activity3_food3_os.description: Original ingredient used in a popular drink. Can be obtained by opening chests in Vera and participating in new gameplays, or by purchasing them directly from the Passionate Chocolatier at the Mirroria Food Plaza.

item_activity3_food4_os.name: Mint
item_activity3_food4_os.description: Refreshing and delightful. Can be obtained by opening chests in Vera and participating in new gameplays, or by purchasing them directly from the Passionate Chocolatier at the Mirroria Food Plaza.

item_activity3_food5_os.name: Fresh Cream
item_activity3_food5_os.description: Made from milk, and has a dense texture. Can be obtained by opening chests in Vera and participating in new gameplays, or by purchasing them directly from the Passionate Chocolatier at the Mirroria Food Plaza.

item_activity3_food6_os.name: Nuts
item_activity3_food6_os.description: Packed with a variety of nuts. Can be obtained by opening chests in Vera and participating in new gameplays, or by purchasing them directly from the Passionate Chocolatier at the Mirroria Food Plaza.

item_activity3_food7_os.name: Liqueur Filling
item_activity3_food7_os.description: A wine-flavored filling without a hint of alcohol. Can be obtained by opening chests in Vera and participating in new gameplays, or by purchasing them directly from the Passionate Chocolatier at the Mirroria Food Plaza.

item_activity3_mould_1_os.name: Square Mold
item_activity3_mould_1_os.description: A one-use mold used for making handmade chocolates. Can be obtained by opening chests in Vera and participating in new gameplays, or by purchasing them directly from the Passionate Chocolatier at the Mirroria Food Plaza.
item_activity3_mould_1_os.source: An item required to create handmade chocolate during the Passion for Chocolate event.

item_activity3_mould_2_os.name: Circular Mold
item_activity3_mould_2_os.description: A one-use mold used for making handmade chocolates. Can be obtained by opening chests in Vera and participating in new gameplays, or by purchasing them directly from the Passionate Chocolatier at the Mirroria Food Plaza.
item_activity3_mould_2_os.source: An item required to create handmade chocolate during the Passion for Chocolate event.

item_activity3_mould_3_os.name: Heart-shaped Mold
item_activity3_mould_3_os.description: A one-use mold used for making handmade chocolates. Can be obtained by opening chests in Vera and participating in new gameplays, or by purchasing them directly from the Passionate Chocolatier at the Mirroria Food Plaza.
item_activity3_mould_3_os.source: An item required to create handmade chocolate during the Passion for Chocolate event.

AvatarFrame_iw_1.name: Kicking a ball is not just about your legs.

chat_qipao_iw_5.description: Special chat bubble frame for the 2022 Soccer Festival.

fashion_dress_37_4_OS.name: Dawn
fashion_dress_37_4_OS.description: Go far away to witness the miracle.

fashion_dress_40_4_os.name: Dynamic Youth
fashion_dress_40_4_os.description: Rebelliousness and the pursuit of Individuality can't be suppressed. It should be flaunted!

fragment_reactor_OS_orange.name: Fortress Microreactor Shard
fragment_reactor_OS_orange.description: A new high-efficiency reactor developed by District 7 R&D that provides stats support.
fragment_reactor_OS_orange.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse the fortress microreactor.

fragment_reactor_OS_purple.description: A new high-efficiency reactor developed by District 7 R&D that provides stats support.
fragment_reactor_OS_purple.source: Collect 20 shards to fuse the elite microreactor

Item_Vera_Harvest_032_OS.name: Furnace Component
Item_Vera_Harvest_032_OS.description: Even the greatest reactors need screws.
Item_Vera_Harvest_032_OS.source: Can be used in Appointed Research. Submit to Cowell in Vera Tower of Fantasy, Furnace Core Site to obtain rewards.

Item_Vera_Harvest_033_OS.name: Reconstruction Manual
Item_Vera_Harvest_033_OS.description: Internal configuration... what configuration! Read the manual first!
Item_Vera_Harvest_033_OS.source: Can be used in Appointed Research. Submit to Cowell in Vera Tower of Fantasy, Furnace Core Site to obtain rewards.

Item_Vera_Harvest_034_OS.name: Reactor Core
Item_Vera_Harvest_034_OS.description: An exquisite core, an indispensable part of reactor creation.
Item_Vera_Harvest_034_OS.source: Can be used in Appointed Research. Submit to Cowell in Vera Tower of Fantasy, Furnace Core Site to obtain rewards.

Item_Vera_Harvest_032_show_OS.name: Fortress Microreactor
Item_Vera_Harvest_032_show_OS.description: Chance of obtaining the following materials: Reactor core, reconstruction manual, furnace component.
Item_Vera_Harvest_032_show_OS.source: Can be used in Appointed Research. Submit to Cowell in Vera Tower of Fantasy, Furnace Core Site to obtain rewards.

Blindbox_ChristmasBag_weapon_OS.name: Christmas Weapon Lucky Bag
Blindbox_ChristmasBag_weapon_OS.description: In the dazzling rain of stars, there must be one of your destiny.
Blindbox_ChristmasBag_weapon_OS.source:
One of the following locked weapons guaranteed!
Weapons List: Thunderblades, Rosy Edge, Icewind Arrow, Absolute Zero, Scythe of the Crow, Chakram of the Seas, Negating Cube, Dual EM Stars, Molten Shield V2.
If all of the weapons are already owned, opening the lucky bag will randomly give one of the weapons that have not been upgraded to max stars.
If all of the weapons have already been upgraded to max stars, opening the lucky bag will randomly drop one of them.

Blindbox_ChristmasBag_Matrix_OS.name: Crow Matrix Lucky Bag
Blindbox_ChristmasBag_Matrix_OS.description: In the dazzling rain of stars, there must be one of your destiny.
Blindbox_ChristmasBag_Matrix_OS.source:
One of the following locked Matrices guaranteed!
Matrix list: Crow: Eleventh Dimension, Crow: Formitized, Crow: Dire Survivor, Crow: Rendition.
Opening the lucky bag will randomly give one of the Matrices from the list if all of the Matrices are already owned.

Avatar_Overseas_12.name: Tian Lang: T Pose
Avatar_Overseas_12.description: I should maintain my left gauntlet... Wait, why can't I move it?

Avatar_Overseas_13.name: Lyra: T Pose
Avatar_Overseas_13.description: It's okay to not clasp your hands in prayer. A sincere heart is all that's needed.

Avatar_Overseas_14.name: Annabella: T Pose
Avatar_Overseas_14.description: Dear oh dear, how am I going to handle the housework if I can't move my hands?

Title_Overseas_11.name: First Joy
Title_Overseas_11.description: Fishing, cards, and racing. These have always been the meaning of life.

Title_Overseas_12.name: Chess Master
Title_Overseas_12.description: Successfully achieved copper bloom freedom in Joy Square.

Title_Overseas_13.name: Copper Bloom Tycoon
Title_Overseas_13.description: Represents your extreme wealth... even though they're just copper blooms.

choose_attr_equip_orange_os.name: Fortress Stat Equipment Box
choose_attr_equip_orange_os.source: A selection box containing 8 types of fortress equipment.

AvatarFrame_tencentfestival_3.name: Thoughts of Winter
AvatarFrame_tencentfestival_3.description: One can still dream of a white winter in a neon city that never snows.

AvatarFrame_tencentfestival_4.name: New Year's Journey
AvatarFrame_tencentfestival_4.description: Even if you don't have New Year's off, you can still find time to have fun at the garden party.

AvatarFrame56_os.name: Cleaning Sequence
AvatarFrame56_os.description: Mi-a cleans as efficiently as any sweeper droid!

Avatar_tencentfestival_1.name: Annabella: Awakening
Avatar_tencentfestival_1.description: "Master, if you complain about my maid services, I'll—!"

Avatar_tencentfestival_2.name: Cold-Lovin' Mi-a
Avatar_tencentfestival_2.description: Doesn't seeing Mi-a like this make you feel warm inside?

Avatar39_os.name: Chef Mi-a

One of the following locked Matrices is guaranteed!

bag_GreatRegression_operation_FakeDiamon.source: Contains: Universal combat parts III ×30, cluster ×100, gold ×50,000

brush_fire_trial_OS.name: Pine Comet (24h)
brush_fire_trial_OS.description: "No violence please! Real academics wouldn't hit anyone with stationery!" —Rong Jin
brush_fire_trial_OS.source: Unlock the weapon Pine Comet for 24 hours. Obtaining multiple times will extend the validity.

yulan_ice_trial_OS.name: Unity (24h)
yulan_ice_trial_OS.description: Unity, in other words, consolidation. It's the weapon Ji Yu handpicked for Yu Lan, which possesses the latest tech from Domain 9. Please don't be surprised if you witness some miraculous sights after using it with the timestamp.
yulan_ice_trial_OS.source: Unlock a Unity for 7 days. Obtaining multiple times will extend the validity.

Zeke_physic_trial_OS.name: Onyx Tortoise (24h)
Zeke_physic_trial_OS.description: An imposing and sharp greatsword that ordinary people can barely muster the strength to pick up. Its destructive power is juxtaposed by the wide blade and the sense of security it brings.
Zeke_physic_trial_OS.source: Unlock the weapon, Onyx Tortoise, for 24 hours. Obtaining multiple times will extend the validity.

mimi_thunder_trial_OS.name: Azure Dragon (24h)
mimi_thunder_trial_OS.description: A pair of fans that contains enormous energy capable of collapsing mountains and tearing the world apart. When Azure Dragon soars the clouds, the world is buffeted by the wind.
mimi_thunder_trial_OS.source: Unlock the weapon, Azure Dragon, for 24 hours. Obtaining multiple times will extend the validity.

linghan_ice_trial_OS.name: Alabaster Tiger (24h)
linghan_ice_trial_OS.description: With a flourish of sleeves and sword's dance divine, who can fathom the depths of this heart o' mine?
linghan_ice_trial_OS.source: Unlock the weapon, Alabaster Tiger, for 24 hours. Obtaining multiple times will extend the validity.

bag_LizhouOpenSign_1_OS.name: Cloud Giftbox I
bag_LizhouOpenSign_1_OS.description: A special gift from Ignisville Mansion to Executors.
bag_LizhouOpenSign_1_OS.source: Contains: Red nucleus ×1, special voucher ×1, weapon development material box I ×20.

bag_LizhouOpenSign_2_OS.description: A special gift from Ignisville Mansion to Executors.
bag_LizhouOpenSign_2_OS.source: Contains: Dark crystal ×100, cluster ×50, fortress equipment box ×1, gold ×20,000.

bag_LizhouOpenSign_3_OS.description: A special gift from Ignisville Mansion to Executors.
bag_LizhouOpenSign_3_OS.source: Contains: Red nucleus ×1, special voucher ×1, weapon development material box I ×20.

bag_LizhouOpenSign_4_OS.description: A special gift from Ignisville Mansion to Executors.
bag_LizhouOpenSign_4_OS.source: Contains: Dark crystal ×100, cluster ×50, fortress equipment box ×1, gold ×20,000.
