choose_Imitation_PS_DeluxeEdition_OS.name: Simulacrum Deluxe Box
choose_Imitation_PS_DeluxeEdition_OS.source: Open the box and select one of the <orange>SSR</> weapons: Balmung, Venus, Thunderblades, Rosy Edge, Icewind Arrow, Absolute Zero, Scythe of the Crow, Chakram of the Seas, Negating Cube, Dual EM Stars, or Molten Shield V2.

choose_Imitation_PS_UltimateEdition_OS.name: Simulacrum Premium Box
choose_Imitation_PS_UltimateEdition_OS.source: Open the box and select one of the <orange>SSR</> weapons: Vesper, Thunderbreaker, Heartstream, Spark, Venus, Balmung, Guren Blade, Flaming Revolver, Thunderblades, Rosy Edge, Icewind Arrow, Absolute Zero, Scythe of the Crow, Chakram of the Seas, Negating Cube, Dual EM Stars, or Molten Shield V2.

choose_frag_BP9_OS.name: Pass Relic Shard Box IV
choose_frag_BP9_OS.source: Open the box and select one of the <Orange>SSR</> Relic shards in it: Colossus Arm shard, Omnium Shield shard, Type V Armor shard, Spacetime Rift shard, Confinement shard, Drone shard, Hoverboard shard, Type II Couant shard, Overdrive Shot shard, or Thalassic Heart shard.

choose_frag_BP11_OS.name: Pass Relic Shard Box V
choose_frag_BP11_OS.source: Open the box and select one of the <Orange>SSR</> Relic shards in it: Colossus Arm shard, Omnium Shield shard, Type V Armor shard, Spacetime Rift shard, Confinement shard, Drone shard, Hoverboard shard, Type II Couant shard, Overdrive Shot shard, Thalassic Heart shard, or Bubble Gun shard.

choose_frag_ssr_2_OS.name: SSR Relic Shard Box II
choose_frag_ssr_2_OS.source: Open the box and select one of the <Orange>SSR</> Relic shards in it: Colossus Arm shard, Omnium Shield shard, Type V Armor shard, Spacetime Rift shard, Confinement shard, Drone shard, Hologram Projector shard, or Alternate Destiny shard.

choose_frag_ssr_3_OS.name: SSR Relic Shard Box III
choose_frag_ssr_3_OS.source: Open the box and select one of the <Orange>SSR</> Relic shards in it: Colossus Arm shard, Omnium Shield shard, Type V Armor shard, Spacetime Rift shard, Confinement shard, Drone shard, Hologram Projector shard, Alternate Destiny shard, or Mini Pelican shard.

Item_SummerCoin_Overseas2023.name: Heat Wave Coin
Item_SummerCoin_Overseas2023.description: A token obtained from Graceday celebration in Banges Port. The passion of Banges's residents that handcrafted them still remains within them. As Graceday's official currency, they can be exchanged for rewards at the booths in all major markets.
Item_SummerCoin_Overseas2023.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Event Store.

Avatar_Overseas_23.name: Liu Huo: T Pose
Avatar_Overseas_23.description: I believe that one's image is crafted by their own hand. And the writing style I excel at is expressing my thoughts openly with the stroke of my brush!

Avatar_Overseas_24.name: Yu Lan: T Pose
Avatar_Overseas_24.description: The true essence of martial arts lies within!

AvatarFrame_Galaxy_01.name: Galaxy Gamer
AvatarFrame_Galaxy_01.description: Let's explore a new time and space together!

Blindbox_Anniversary_2023_OS.name: Anniversary Wheel of Light Giftbox
Blindbox_Anniversary_2023_OS.description: One of the most popular limited-edition giftboxes at the Banges Expo. It's always a mixture of anticipation and trepidation when you open the box.
Blindbox_Anniversary_2023_OS.source:
Random box.
Extremely low chance of obtaining one of the Meteoric line of vehicles: Justice Meteor, Nightfeather Meteor, Med Meteor, Rockin' Meteor, Pouncing Cat Meteor, Arena Meteor, Absconder Meteor, Smoothie Meteor, Wishing Meteor, Modular Meteor, Supercomputing Meteor, Frosty Meteor, Snow Rose Meteor, EM Meteor, Glowing Meteor, Windrunner Meteor, Freedom Meteor, Electrovision Meteor, Neon Meteor, Surveyor Meteor, Scuba Meteor, Steady Meteor, Flame Chaser Meteor, Roaming Meteor, Phantasmic Meteor, Inspirational Meteor, DIY Meteor, Reminiscent Meteor, Miraculous Meteor
Low chance of obtaining: Dreamy Phantom (Outfit), Rondo (Hairstyle), Kiss of Stars (Accessory), Companion (Avatar Frame), TYPE-5 (Chat Bubble).

Blindbox_Anniversary_2023_OS_pack.description: One of the most popular limited-edition giftboxes at the Banges Expo. It's always a mixture of anticipation and trepidation when you open the box.

choose_equiptupo_OS1.name: Augment Module Box I
choose_equiptupo_OS1.description: A box containing advanced modules designed for the augmentation of specific equipment.
choose_equiptupo_OS1.source: Choose any one augment module in the box: Core control module or movement coordination module.

choose_equiptupo_OS2.name: Augment Module Box II
choose_equiptupo_OS2.description: A box containing advanced modules designed for the augmentation of specific equipment.
choose_equiptupo_OS2.source: Choose any one augment module in the box: Core control module, movement coordination module, or high speed transmission module.

fragment_imitation_fashion_17_OS.name: Shirli Shard
fragment_imitation_fashion_17_OS.description: It's an image extracted from memories... It's just an illusion.
fragment_imitation_fashion_17_OS.source: Collect 4 Shirli shards to fuse the Simulacrum Haute Couture, Shirli.

fragment_imitation_fashion_17_OS_w.name: White Dwarf Shard
fragment_imitation_fashion_17_OS_w.description: A shining star might look small, but it gives off unimaginable energy.
fragment_imitation_fashion_17_OS_w.source: Collect 4 White Dwarf shards to fuse the weapon appearance, White Dwarf.

fragment_Mount_022_OS.name: Floating Bubble Shard
fragment_Mount_022_OS.description: Soft, light, and most importantly, it's gorgeous!
fragment_Mount_022_OS.source: Collect 4 shards to unlock the Floating Bubble vehicle

fragment_Hat_60_4_4_OS.name: Cream Cannon Shard
fragment_Hat_60_4_4_OS.description: Cream, cherries, and donuts... Are you ready for a calorie bomb?
fragment_Hat_60_4_4_OS.source: Collect 4 shards to fuse the Cream Cannon accessory.

fragment_Hat_28_4_4_OS.name: Visible Little Specter Shard
fragment_Hat_28_4_4_OS.description: Is there something on my head? A-Anything?
fragment_Hat_28_4_4_OS.source: Collect 4 shards to fuse the Visible Little Specter accessory.

Avatar_Overseas_25.name: Ming Jing: T Pose
Avatar_Overseas_25.description: I now exist as Ming Jing, and I will carry out all the meanings attached to this name.

AvatarFrame_txAnniversary01.name: Jade Pavilion Rendezvous
AvatarFrame_txAnniversary01.description: This year has been memorable because you were a part of it. Looking forward to an even more exciting second year with you!

AvatarFrame_txAnniversary02.name: Jade Pavilion Rendezvous (Crescent)
AvatarFrame_txAnniversary02.description: This year has been memorable because you were a part of it. Looking forward to an even more exciting second year with you!

AvatarFrame_txAnniversary03.name: Jade Pavilion Rendezvous (Full)
AvatarFrame_txAnniversary03.description: This year has been memorable because you were a part of it. Looking forward to an even more exciting second year with you!

Avatar_Overseas_Anniversary01.name: Windchasing Maiden
Avatar_Overseas_Anniversary01.description: Step on the gas and race ahead.

AvatarFrame_Overseas_Anniversary01.name: Unrestrained Strides
AvatarFrame_Overseas_Anniversary01.description: Sprint like a mammoth. Not even the shadows can keep up.

chat_qipao_Overseas_Anniversary01.name: Set Forth
chat_qipao_Overseas_Anniversary01.description: Set forth, and race through the vast wilderness.

Item_Gashapon_coin_16_OS.name: Rosy Gachapon Coin (Reissue)
Item_Gashapon_coin_16_OS.description: A special invitation from the costume party. The danger inside cannot be evaded.
Item_Gashapon_coin_16_OS.source: Used for the Thorned Rose event gachapon.

Avatar_Overseas_26.name: Huang: T Pose
Avatar_Overseas_26.description: I am Huang, the master of Tianzhang Pavilion, though you may also address me as Madam Qinglong. Now, if there's business, speak. If not, you may take your leave.

Avatar_Overseas_27.name: Fei Se: T Pose
Avatar_Overseas_27.description: Shh... Is this your first time seeing me dance?

AvatarFrame_txshikuang_01.name: Trusted Executor First Pass v3.2
AvatarFrame_txshikuang_01.description: Tower of Fantasy Trusted Executor Limited Version 3.2. Thank you for your outstanding videos!

Title_PlayStation33_os01.name: Wacky Wanderer
Title_PlayStation33_os01.description: Light up Aida with your creativity!

Title_PlayStation33_os02.name: Aida Scholar
Title_PlayStation33_os02.description: Great achievements come from great inspirations

AvatarFrame_PlayStation33_os02.name: Guardian of Aida
AvatarFrame_PlayStation33_os02.description: For the prosperity and peace of Aida.

Avatar_Overseas_28.name: Ling Han: T Pose
Avatar_Overseas_28.description: I am Ling Han, the master of Longjian Pavilion. In Domain 9, they also call me Baihu.

Avatar_tongyong33_os01.name: Count Dracula
Avatar_tongyong33_os01.description: Ha-ha-ha-ha, you're really quite something! I can barely keep my fake teeth from falling out laughing. Hopefully not, as they're not an easy thing to find in the nursery.

Avatar_tongyong33_os02.name: Princess Woodley
Avatar_tongyong33_os02.description: This is a gesture I just learned, and it seems to be very suitable for the current situation.

Avatar_tongyong33_os03.name: Little Spirit
Avatar_tongyong33_os03.description: You'll regret seeing this side of me!!!

Avatar_tongyong33_os04.name: Ms. Jumpy
Avatar_tongyong33_os04.description: Are you intending to scare Ruby like this...

AvatarFrame_txcreatos_07.name: The Azure Forest
AvatarFrame_txcreatos_07.description: A haze of doubts in the green forest.

Avatar_Koreatongyong33_01.name: Firerat
Avatar_Koreatongyong33_01.description: Domain 9 is quite a beautiful place.
